rūpa upajīvi nigama jña hiraṇya paṇyān

original: 5.76cd/ pradhvaṃsam āyānti narāś ca saumyāḥ sālvaiḥ sametāś ca niṣāda^saṅghāḥ//

strīṇām ca garbhān asuraḥ nihanti
subhikṣa kṛt bhādrapade abhyupetaḥ

original: 5.81ab/ hanu^kukṣi^pāyu^bhedā dvir dviḥ sañchardanaṃ ca jaraṇaṃ ca/

analyzed: sasya vimardaḥ mukha ruj nṛpa pīḍā syāt su vṛṣṭiḥ ca

original: 5.85ab/ vāmas tu kukṣi^bhedo yady uttaramārga^saṃsthito rāhuḥ/

original: 8.29cd/ prajāpatiś ca^iti yathottarāṇi śastāni varṣāṇi phalāny *atha^eṣām[K.caiṣām]//
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ ca eti yathā uttarāṇi śastāni varṣāṇi phalāni atha eṣām kca eṣām
niṣpanna śāli ikṣu yava ādi sasyām bhayaiḥ vimuktām upaśānta vairām

original: 8.30cd/ saṃhṛṣṭa^lokāṃ kali^doṣa^muktāṃ kṣatraṃ tadā śāsti ca bhūtadhātrīm//
analyzed: saṃhṛṣṭa lokām kali doṣa muktām kṣatram tadā śāsti ca bhūtadhātrīm

original: 8.31ab/ ādyo +aṅgirāḥ śrīmukha^bhāvasā^āhvau *yuvā sudhāteti[K.yuvātha dhāteti] yuge dvitīye/
analyzed: ādyaḥ aṅgirāḥ yuvā dhātā iti yuge dvitīye

original: 8.31cd/ varṣāṇi pañca^eva yathākrameṇa trīṇy atra śastāni same pare dve//
analyzed: varṣāṇi pañca eva yathākrameṇa trīṇi atra śastāni same pare dve

original: K's tr. ādyavarṣeṣu] nikāma^varṣī devī nirātaṅka^*bhayaś[K.bhayāś] ca lokaḥ/
analyzed: ādya varṣeṣu nikāma varṣī devī ca lokaḥ

original: 8.32cd/ abda^dvaye +antye +api samā suvṛṣṭiḥ kintv atra rogāḥ samara^āgamaś ca//
analyzed: abda dvaye antye api samā su vṛṣṭiḥ kintu atra rogāḥ samara āgamaḥ ca

original: 8.33ab/ śākre yuge pūrvam atha^īśvara^ākhyaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ bahudhānyam āhuḥ/
analyzed: śākre yuge pūrvam atha īśvara ākhyam varṣam dvitīyam bahudhānyam āhuḥ

original: 8.33cd/ pramāthinaṃ vikramam apy *atha^anyad[K.ato +anyad] vṛṣaṃ ca vindyād gurucāra^yogāt//
analyzed: pramāthinam vikramam api atha anyad kataḥ anyat vṛṣam ca vindyāt guru cāra yogāt

original: 8.34ab/ ādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca śubhe tu varṣe kṛta^anukāraṃ kurutaḥ prajānām/
analyzed: ādyam dvitīyam ca śubhe tu varṣe kṛta anukāram kurutaḥ prajānām

original: 8.34cd/ pāpaḥ pramāthī vṛṣa^vikramau tu subhikṣadau roga^bhaya^pradau ca//
analyzed: pāpaḥ pramāthī vṛṣa vikramau tu subhikṣa dau roga bhaya pradau ca

original: 8.35ab/ śreṣṭhaṃ ca caturthasya yugasya pūrvaṃ yac citrabhānuṃ kathayanti varṣam/
analyzed: śreṣṭham ca caturthasya yugasya pūrvam yat citrabhānum kathayanti varṣam

original: 8.35cd/ madhyaṃ dvitīyaṃ tu subhānu^sañjñaṃ roga^pradaṃ mṛtyu^karaṃ *na taṃ ca[K.na tac ca]//
analyzed: madhyam dvitīyam tu subhānu sañjñam roga pradam mṛtyu karam na tam tat ca
tāraṇam tadanu bhūri vāri dam sasya vṛddhi mudita atikmuditam ca pārthivam

original: 8.36cd/ pañcamaṃ vyayam uśanti śobhanaṃ manmatha^prabalam utsava^ākulam//
analyzed: pañcamam vyayam uśanti śobhanam manmatha prabalam utsava ākulam

original: 8.37ab/ tvāṣṭre yuge sarvajid^ādya uktaḥ saṃvatsaro +anyaḥ khalu sarvadhārī/
analyzed: tvāṣṭre yuge sarva jit ādyaḥ uktaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ anyaḥ khalu sarva dhārī

original: 8.37cd/ tasmād virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaś ca śasto dvitīyo +atra bhayāya śeṣāḥ//
analyzed: tasmāt virodhī vikṛtaḥ kharaḥ ca śastaḥ dvitīyaḥ atra bhayāya śeṣāḥ

original: 8.38ab/ nandano +atha vijayo jayas tathā manmatho +asya parataś ca durmukhaḥ/
analyzed: nandanaḥ atha vijayaḥ jayaḥ tathā manmathaḥ asya paratas ca durmukhaḥ

original: 8.38cd/ kāntam atra yuga āditas trayaṃ manmathaḥ sama^phalo +adhamo +aparaḥ//
analyzed: kāntam atra yuge āditas trayam manmathaḥ sama phalaḥ adhamaḥ aparaḥ

original: 8.39ab/ hemalamba iti saptame yuge syād vilambi parato vikāri ca/
analyzed: hema lambaḥ iti saptame yuge syāt vilambi paratas vikāri ca

original: 8.39cd/ śarvarīti tad^anu plavaḥ smṛto vatsaro guru^vaśena pañcamaḥ//
analyzed: śarvarī iti tadanu plavaḥ smṛtaḥ vatsaraḥ guru vaśena pañcamaḥ
pracura pavanā vṛṣṭiḥ abde tu pūrve

original: 8.40b mandaṃ sasyaṃ na bahu^salilaṃ vatsare +ato dvitīye/
analyzed: mandam sasyam na bahu salilam vatsare atas dvitīye
atyudvegaḥ pracura salilaḥ syāt tṛtīyaḥ

original: 8.40d durbhikṣāya plava iti tataḥ śobhano bhūri^toyaḥ//
analyzed: durbhikṣāya plavaḥ iti tatas śobhanaḥ bhūri toyaḥ

original: 8.41ab/ vaiśve yuge *śokahṛd[K.śobhakṛd] ity atha^ādyaḥ saṃvatsaro +ataḥ śubhakṛd dvitīyaḥ/
analyzed: vaiśve yuge śoka hṛd śobha kṛt iti atha ādyaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ atas śubha kṛt dvitīyaḥ

original: 8.41cd/ krodhī tṛtīyaḥ parataḥ krameṇa viśvāvasuś ca^iti parābhavaś ca//
analyzed: krodhī tṛtīyaḥ paratas krameṇa viśvāvasuḥ ca eti parābhavaḥ ca

original: 8.42ab/ pūrvā^parau prīti^karau prajānām eṣāṃ tṛtīyo bahu^doṣado +abdaḥ/
analyzed: pūrva aparau prīti karau prajānām eṣām tṛtīyaḥ bahu doṣa daḥ abdaḥ

original: 8.42cd/ antyau samau kintu parābhave +agniḥ śastra^āmaya^ārtir dvija^go^bhayaṃ ca//
analyzed: antyau samau kintu parābhave agniḥ śastra āmaya ārtiḥ dvija go bhayam ca

original: 8.43ab/ ādyaḥ plavaṅgo navame yuge +abdaḥ syāt kīlako +anyaḥ parataś ca saumyaḥ/
analyzed: ādyaḥ plavaṅgaḥ navame yuge abdaḥ syāt kīlakaḥ anyaḥ paratas ca saumyaḥ
sādhāraṇaḥ rodha kṛt iti atha evaṃkathā abdaḥ śubha pradau kīlaka saumya saṃjñau

original: 8.44ab/ kaṣṭaḥ plavaṅgo bahuśaḥ prajānāṃ sādhāraṇe +alpaṃ jalam ītayaś ca/
analyzed: kaṣṭaḥ plavaṅgaḥ bahuśas prajānām sādhāraṇe alpam jalam ītayaḥ ca

original: 8.44cd/ yaḥ pañcamo rodhakṛd ity atha^abdaś citram jalam tatra ca sasyasampat//
analyzed: yaḥ pañcamaḥ rodha kṛt iti atha abdaḥ citram jalam tatra ca sasya sampad
indra agni daivam daśamam yugam yat paridha avi saṃjñam

original: 8.45cd/ *pramādinaṃ vikramam apy ato +anyat[K.pramādyathānandamataḥ paraṃ yat] syād rākṣasaṃ ca^anala^saṃjñitam ca//
analyzed: pramādinam vikramam api atas param yat syāt rākṣasam ca anala saṃjñitam ca

original: 8.46ab/ paridhāvini madhyadeśa^nāśo nṛpa^hānir jalam alpam agni^kopaḥ/
analyzed: paridhāvini madhyadeśa nāśaḥ nṛpa hāniḥ jalam alpam agni kopaḥ

original: 8.46cd/ alasas tu janaḥ pramādi^saṃjñe ḍamaraṃ raktaka^puṣpa^bīja^nāśaḥ//
analyzed: alasaḥ tu janaḥ pramādi saṃjñe ḍamaram raktaka puṣpa bīja nāśaḥ
sakala loka nandanaḥ rākṣasaḥ kṣaya karaḥ analaḥ tathā
grīṣma dhānya jananaḥ atra rākṣasaḥ vahni kopa maraka pradaḥ analaḥ
ekādaśe piṅgala kāla yukta siddhārtha raudrāḥ khalu durmatiḥ ca

original: 8.48cd/ ādye tu vṣṛṭir mahatī sacaurā śvāso hanū^kampa^yutaś ca kāsaḥ//
analyzed: ādye tu vṣṛṭiḥ mahatī sa caurā śvāsaḥ hanūkampa yutaḥ ca kāsaḥ

original: 8.49ab/ yat kālayuktaṃ tad aneka^doṣaṃ siddhārtha^saṃjñe bahavo guṇāś ca/
analyzed: yat kāla yuktam tat aneka doṣam siddhārtha saṃjñe bahavaḥ guṇāḥ ca

original: 8.49cd/ raudro +atiraudraḥ kṣaya^kṛt pradiṣṭo yo durmatir madhyama^vṛṣṭi^kṛt saḥ//
analyzed: raudraḥ ati raudraḥ kṣaya kṛt pradiṣṭaḥ yaḥ durmatiḥ madhyama vṛṣṭi kṛt saḥ

original: 8.50ab/ bhāgye yuge dundubhi^saṃjñam ādyaṃ sasyasya vṛddhiṃ mahatīṃ karoti/
analyzed: bhāgye yuge dundubhi saṃjñam ādyam sasyasya vṛddhim mahatīm karoti

original: 8.50cd/ *aṅgāra^saṃjñaṃ[K.udgārisaṃjñaṃ] tad^anu kṣayāya nareśvarāṇāṃ viṣamā ca vṛṣṭiḥ//
analyzed: tadanu kṣayāya nareśvarāṇām viṣamā ca vṛṣṭiḥ

original: 8.51ab/ raktākṣam abdaṃ kathitaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tasmin bhayaṃ daṃṣṭri^kṛtaṃ gadāś ca/
analyzed: rakta akṣam abdam kathitam tṛtīyam tasmin bhayam daṃṣṭri kṛtam gadāḥ ca

original: 8.51cd/ krodhaṃ bahu^krodha^karaṃ caturthaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi śūnyīkurute virodhaiḥ//
analyzed: krodham bahu krodha karam caturtham rāṣṭrāṇi śūnyīkurute virodhaiḥ
kṣayam iti yugasya antyasya antyam bahu kṣaya kārakam
janayati bhayam tat viprāṇām kṛṣī bala vṛddhi dam
upacaya karam viś śūdrāṇām para sva hṛtām tathā

original: 8.52d kathitam akhilaṃ ṣaṣṭy^abde yat tad atra samāsataḥ//
analyzed: kathitam akhilam ṣaṣṭi abde yat tat atra samāsatas
graha hataḥ na yadi sat patha vartī amara guruḥ manujānām
śukra cāra adhyāyaḥ
nāgagaja airāvata vṛṣabha goja radgava mṛga aja dahana ākhyāḥ

original: 9.01cd/ aśviny^ādyāḥ kaiś cit tribhāḥ kramād vīthayaḥ kathitāḥ//
analyzed: aśvinī ādyāḥ kaiḥ cit tri bhāḥ kramāt vīthayaḥ kathitāḥ

original: 9.02ab/ nāgā tu pavana^yāmya^analāni paitāmahāt tribhās tisraḥ/
analyzed: tu paitāmahāt tri bhāḥ tisraḥ

original: 9.02cd/ govīthyām aśvinyaḥ pauṣṇaṃ dve ca^api bhadrapade//
analyzed: govīthyām aśvinyaḥ pauṣṇam dve ca api bhadrapade

original: 9.03ab/ jāradgavyāṃ śravaṇāt tribhaṃ mṛga^ākhyā tribhaṃ tu maitra^ādyam/
analyzed: jāradgavyām śravaṇāt tribham mṛgaākhyā tribham tu maitraādyam
hasta viśākhā tvāṣṭrāṇi ajaiti aṣāḍhā dvayam dahanā
tisraḥ tisraḥ tāsām kramāt udak madhya yāmya mārga sthāḥ
tāsām api uttara madhya dakṣiṇena
vīthī mārgān apare kathayanti yathāsthitān bha mārgasya
nakṣatrāṇām tārāḥ yāmya uttara madhyamāḥ tadvat

original: 9.06ab/ uttaramārgo yāmya^ādi nigadito madhyamas tu bhāgya^ādyaḥ/
9.06cd/ dakṣiṇa^mārgo^āṣāḍhā^ādi kaiś cid evaṃ kṛtā mārgāḥ//
analyzed: kaiḥ cit evam kṛtāḥ mārgāḥ
āgama śāstram vipratipattau na yogyam asmākam

original: 9.07cd/ svayam evā vikalpayituṃ kintu bahūnāṃ mataṃ vakṣye//
analyzed: svayam vikalpayitum kintu bahūnām matam vakṣye
uttara vīthiṣu śukraḥ subhikṣa śiva kṛt gataḥ astam udayam cakvā
madhyāsu madhya phala daḥ kaṣṭa phalaḥ dakṣiṇa sthāsu
atyuttama auttama ūnam sama madhya nyūnam adhama kaṣṭa phalam
kaṣṭataram kaṣṭatamam saumya ādyāsu vīthiṣu yathākramam brūyāt
bharaṇī pūrvam maṇḍalam ṛkṣa catuṣkam subhikṣa karam ādyam
vaṅga aṅga mahiṣa bāhlika kvāhlika kaliṅga deśeṣu bhaya jananam

original: 9.11ab/ atra^uditam ārohed graho +aparo yadi sitaṃ tato hanyāt/
analyzed: atra auditam ārohet grahaḥ aparaḥ yadi sitam tatas hanyāt
bhadrāśva śūrasenaka yaudheyaka koṭi varṣa nṛpān
viprāṇām aśubha karam viśeṣataḥ krūra ceṣṭānām
anyena atra ākrānte
gonardanīcaśūdrān vaidehān ca anayaḥ spṛśati
vicaran maghā ādi pañcakam uditaḥ sasya praṇāśa kṛt śukraḥ
pitrya ādye avaṣṭabdhaḥ hanti anyenaāvikān śabara śūdrān
puṇḍrā aparāntya śūlika vanavāsi draviḍa sāmudrān

original: 9.16ab/ svāty^ādyaṃ bha^tritayaṃ maṇḍalam etac caturtham abhaya^karam/
analyzed: svāti ādyam bha tritayam maṇḍalam etat caturtham abhaya karam
brahma kṣatra subhikṣa abhivṛddhaye mitra bhedāya
atra akrānte mṛtyuḥ kirāta bhartuḥ pinaṣṭi ca aikṣvākūn
pratyanta avanti pulinda taṅgaṇān śūrasenān ca
pañca ṛkṣam kṣudh taskara roga dam prabādhayate
kāśmīra aśmaka matsyān sa cārudevīn avantīn ca
atra arohet draviḍa ābhīra ambaṣṭhaka ārohe atra ābhīrān draviḍa ambaṣṭha trigarta saurāṣṭrān
nāśayanti sindhusauvīrakān ca vadhaḥ

original: 9.20ab/ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaṇnakṣatraṃ śubham etan maṇḍalaṃ dhaniṣṭhā^ādyam/
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham ṣaṣ nakṣatram śubham etat maṇḍalam dhaniṣṭhā ādyam
bhūri dhana gokula ākulam analpa dhānyam kva cit sa bhayam
atra ārohecka āroheśūlika gāndhāra avantayaḥ prapīḍyante
vaideha vadhaḥ pratyanta yavana śaka dāsa parivṛddhiḥ

original: 9.22ab/ aparasyāṃ svāty^ādyaṃ jyeṣṭhā^ādyaṃ ca^api maṇḍalaṃ śubhadam/
analyzed: aparasyām svāti ādyam jyeṣṭhā ādyam ca api maṇḍalam śubha dam
pitrya ādyam pūrvasyām śeṣāṇi yathā ukta phala dāni
dṛṣṭaḥ an astamita ikan asta gate arke bhaya kṛt kṣudh roga kṛt samastam ahar
ca sa ainduḥ nṛpa bala pura bheda kṛt śukraḥ
bhindan gataḥ anala ṛkṣam kūla atikrānta vāri vāhābhiḥ
avyakta tuṅga nimnā samā saridbhiḥ bhavati dhātrī

original: 9.25ab/ prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvā^iva pātakaṃ vasudhā/
analyzed: prājāpatye śakaṭe bhinne kṛtvā iva pātakam vasudhā
keśa asthi śakala śabalā kāpālam iva vratam dhatte
saumyaupagataḥ rasa sasya saṃkṣayāya auśanāḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ
ārdrā gataḥ tu kośala kaliṅga hā salila nikara karaḥ
aśmaka vaidarbhāṇām punarvasu sthe site mahān anayaḥ
puṣye puṣṭā vṛṣṭiḥ vidyādhara raṇau vidyādhara vimardaḥ ca
āśleṣāsu bhujaṅgama dāruṇa pīḍā vahaḥ caran śukraḥ
bhindan maghām mahāmātra doṣa kṛt bhūri vṛṣṭi karaḥ
bhāgye śabara pulinda pradhvaṃsa karaḥ ambunivaha mokṣāya
āryamṇe kurujāṅgala pāñcāla ghnaḥ salila dāyī

original: 9.30ab/ kaurava^citrakarāṇāṃ haste pīḍā jalasya ca nirodhaḥ/
analyzed: kaurava citrakarāṇām haste pīḍā jalasya ca nirodhaḥ
svātau prabhūta vṛṣṭiḥ dūta vaṇij nāvikān spṛśati anayaḥ

original: 9.31cd/ aindra^agne +api suvṛṣṭir vaṇijāṃ ca bhayaṃ vijānīyāt//
analyzed: aindraagne api su vṛṣṭiḥ vaṇijām ca bhayam vijānīyāt
maitre kṣatra virodhaḥ jyeṣṭhāyām kṣatra mukhya santāpaḥ

original: 9.32cd/ maulika^bhiṣajām mūle triṣv api ca^eteṣv anāvṛṣṭiḥ//
analyzed: maulika bhiṣajām mūle triṣu api ca eteṣu anāvṛṣṭiḥ
āpye salilaja pīḍāḥ viśveśe vyādhayaḥ prakupyanti
śravaṇe śravaṇa vyādhiḥ pākhaṇḍik pāṣaṇḍi bhayam dhaniṣṭhāsu
śatabhiṣaji śauṇḍikānām aja eka bheka jaikape dyūta jīvinām pīḍāṃkpīḍā

original: 9.34cd/ kuru^pāñcālānām api karoti ca^asmin sitaḥ salilam//
analyzed: kuru pāñcālānām api karoti ca asmin sitaḥ salilam
āhirbudhnye phala mūla tāpa kṛt yāyinām ca revatyām
aśvinyām hayapānām yāmye tu kirāta yavanānām

original: 9.36ab/ *caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ tathā^aṣṭamīṃ[K.caturdaśe pañcadaśe tathāṣṭame] tamisrapakṣasya *tithiṃ[K.tithau] bhṛgoḥ sutaḥ/
analyzed: caturdaśīm pañcadaśīm tathā aṣṭamīn caturdaśe pañcadaśe tathā aṣṭame tamisra pakṣasya tithiṃk tithau bhṛgoḥ sutaḥ

original: 9.36cd/ yadā vrajed darśanam astam eti vā tadā mahī vārimayīva lakṣyate//
analyzed: yadā vrajet darśanam astam eti vā tadā mahī vāri mayī iva lakṣyate

original: 9.37ab/ gurur bhṛguś ca^apara^pūrva^kāṣṭhayoḥ parasparaṃ saptama^rāśigau yadā/
analyzed: guruḥ bhṛguḥ ca apara pūrva kāṣṭhayoḥ parasparam saptama rāśi gau yadā

original: 9.37cd/ tadā prajā rug^bhaya^śoka^pīḍitā na vāri paśyanti purandara^ujjhitam//
analyzed: tadā prajāḥ ruj bhaya śoka pīḍitāḥ na vāri paśyanti purandara ojjhitam
yadā sthitāḥ jīva budha āra sūrya jāḥ sitasya sarve agra patha anuvartinaḥ

original: 9.38cd/ nṛ^nāga^vidyādhara^saṅgarās tadā bhavanti vātāś ca samucchrita^antakāḥ//
analyzed: nṛ nāga vidyādhara saṅgarāḥ tadā bhavanti vātāḥ ca samucchrita antakāḥ

original: 9.39ab/ na mitrabhāve suhṛdo vyavasthitāḥ kriyāsu samyag na ratā dvijātayaḥ/
analyzed: na mitra bhāve suhṛdaḥ vyavasthitāḥ kriyāsu samyak na ratāḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: 9.39cd/ na ca^alpam apy ambu dadāti vāsavo bhinatti vajreṇa śirāṃsi bhūbhṛtām//
analyzed: na ca alpam api ambu dadāti vāsavaḥ bhinatti vajreṇa śirāṃsi bhūbhṛtām
śanaiścare mleccha viḍāla kuñjarāḥ kharāḥ mahiṣyaḥ asita dhānya śūkarāḥ

original: 9.40cd/ pulinda^śūdrāś ca sadakṣiṇāpathāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajanty akṣi^marud^gada^udbhavaiḥ//
analyzed: pulinda śūdrāḥ ca sa dakṣiṇāpathāḥ kṣayam vrajanti akṣi marut gada udbhavaiḥ

maitre śaurya sametāḥ gaṇa nāyaka sādhu goṣṭhi yāna ratāḥ

original: 15.15cd/ ye sādhavaś ca loke sarvaṃ ca śaratsamutpannam//
analyzed: ye sādhavaḥ ca loke sarvam ca śarad samutpannam
paurandare ati śūrāḥ kula vitta yaśaḥ anvitāḥ para sva hṛtaḥ
vijigīṣavaḥ narendrāḥ senānām ca api netāraḥ
mūle bheṣaja bhiṣajaḥ gaṇa mukhyāḥ kusuma mūla phala vārttāḥ kvārttāḥ

original: 15.17cd/ bījāny atidhanayuktāḥ phalamūlair ye ca vartante//
analyzed: bījāni ati dhana yuktāḥ phala mūlaiḥ ye ca vartante
āpye mṛdavaḥ jala mārga gāminaḥ satya śauca dhana yuktāḥ
setu kara vāri jīvaka phala kusumāni ambu jātāni
viśveśvare mahāmātra malla kari turaga devatā saktāḥ k bhaktāḥ
sthāvara yodhāḥ bhoga anvitāḥ ca ye yuktāḥ

original: 15.20ab/ śravaṇe māyāpaṭavo nityodyuktāś ca karmasu samarthāḥ/
analyzed: śravaṇe māyā paṭavaḥ nitya udyuktāḥ ca karmasu samarthāḥ
utsāhinaḥ sadharmāḥ bhāgavatāḥ satya vacanāḥ ca
māna unmuktāḥ klība klība āśa cala sauhṛdāḥ striyām dveṣyāḥ kdvaṣyāḥ
ks tr dveṣyāḥ
dāna abhiratāḥ bahu vitta saṃyutāḥ śama parāḥ ca narāḥ
varuṇa īśe pāśika matsyabandha jalajāni jalacara ājīvāḥ
saukarika rajaka śauṇḍika śākunikāḥ ca api varge asmin
āje taskara paśupāla hiṃsra kīnāśa nīca śaṭha ceṣṭāḥ

original: 15.23cd/ dharma^vratair virahitā niyuddha^kuśalāś ca ye manujāḥ//
analyzed: dharma vrataiḥ virahitāḥ niyuddha kuśalāḥ ca ye manujāḥ
viprāḥ kratu dāna tapaḥ yutāḥ mahā vibhavāḥ
āśramiṇaḥ pākhaṇḍa akpāṣaṇḍāḥ nareśvarāḥ sāra dhānyam ca
pauṣṇe salila ja phala kusuma lavaṇa maṇi śaṅkha mauktika abjāni
surabhi kusumāni gandhāḥ vaṇijaḥ nau karṇadhārāḥ ca
aśvinyām aśva harāḥ senāpati vaidya sevakāḥ turagāḥ
turaga ārohāḥ vaṇijokturaga ārohāḥ ca vanij rūpa upetāḥ turaga rakṣāḥ
yāmye asṛj piśita bhujaḥ krūrāḥ vadha bandha tāḍana āsaktāḥ
tuṣa dhānyam nīca kula udbhavāḥ vihīnāḥ ca sattvena

original: 15.28ab/ pūrvātrayaṃ sānalam agrajānāṃ rājñāṃ tu puṣyeṇa sahottarāṇi/
analyzed: pūrvā trayam sa analam agrajānām rājñām tu puṣyeṇa saha uttarāṇi

original: 15.28cd/ sapauṣṇa^maitraṃ pitṛdaivataṃ ca prajāpater bhaṃ ca kṛṣīvalānām//
analyzed: sa pauṣṇa maitram pitṛ daivatam ca prajāpateḥ bham ca kṛṣīvalānām
ādityahasta abhijit āśvināni vaṇij janānām pravadanti
mūla trinetra anila vāruṇāni bhāni ugra jāteḥ prabhaviṣṇu tāyāḥ k prabhaviṣṇu tāyām
saumya aindra citrā vasu daivatāni sevā jana svāmyam upāgatāni

original: 15.30cd/ sārpaṃ viśākhā śravaṇo bharaṇyaś caṇḍālajāter *abhinirdiśanti[K.iti nirdaśanti]//
analyzed: sārpam viśākhā śravaṇaḥ bharaṇyaḥ caṇḍāla jāteḥ abhinirdiśanti kiti nirdaśanti
ravi ravi suta bhogam āgatam kṣitisuta bhedana vakra dūṣitam

original: 15.31cd/ grahaṇagatam atha^ulkayā hataṃ niyatam uṣākara^pīḍitaṃ ca yat//
analyzed: grahaṇa gatam atha aulkayā hatam niyatam uṣākara pīḍitam ca yat

original: 15.32ab/ tad upahatam iti pracakṣate prakṛti^viparyaya^yātam eva vā/
analyzed: tat upahatam iti pracakṣate prakṛti viparyaya yātam eva vā
nigadita parivarga dūṣaṇam kathita viparyaya gam samṛddhaye
graha bhakti yoga adhyāyaḥ
prāk narmadā ardhaśoṇa oḍra vaṅga suhmāḥ kaliṅga bāhlīkāḥ
śaka yavana magadha śabara prāgjyotiṣa cīna kāmbojāḥ
mekala kirāta viṭakāḥ bahis antar śaila jāḥ pulindāḥ ca
draviḍānām prāc ardham dakṣiṇa kūlam ca yamunāyāḥ
campā audumbara kauśāmbi cedi vindhya aṭavīka liṅgāḥ ca
puṇḍrāḥ golāṅgūla śrīparvata vardhamāna ānikvardhamānāḥ ca
ikṣumatī iti atha taskara pārata kāntāra gopa bījānām
tuṣa dhānya kaṭuka taru kanaka dahana viṣa samara śūrāṇām
bheṣaja bhiṣaj catuṣpada kṛṣi kara nṛpa hiṃsra yāyi caurāṇām
vyāla araṇya yaśaḥ yuta tīkṣṇāṇām bhāskaraḥ svāmī
giri salila durga kośala bharu kaccha samudra romaka tuṣārāḥ ktukhārāḥ
śāli yava auṣadhi godhūma somapa ākranda viprāṇām
sita subhaga turaga rati kara yuvati camū nātha bhojya vastrāṇām
śṛṅgi niśācara kārṣaka yajña vidām ca adhipaḥ candraḥ
śoṇasya narmadāyāḥ bhīmarathāyāḥ ca paścima ardha sthāḥ
nirvindhyā vetravatī siprā godāvarī veṇā
uttarapāṇḍya mahendra adri vindhya malaya aupagāḥ colāḥ
draviḍa videha andhra aśmaka bhāsa aparak bhāsā pura kauṅkaṇāḥ sa mantriṣikāḥ
nāsikya bhogavardhana virāṭa vindhya adri pārśva gāḥ deśāḥ

original: K.16.12cd/ ye ca pibanti sutoyāṃ tāpīṃ ye ca api gomatīsalilam //]
analyzed: ye ca pibanti su toyām tāpīm ye ca api gomatī salilam
nāgara kṛṣi kara pārata hutāśana ājīvi śastra vārttānām
āṭavika durga karvaṭa vadhika kvadhaka nṛśaṃsa avaliptānām
narapati kumāra kuñjara dāmbhika ḍimbha abhighāta paśupānām
rakta phala kusuma vidruma camūpa guḍa madya tīkṣṇānām
kośa bhavana āgnihotrika dhātu ākara śākya bhikṣu caurāṇām
śaṭha dīrgha vaira bahu āśinām ca vasudhāsutaḥ adhipatiḥ

original: 16.15ab/ lohityaḥ sindhunadaḥ sarayūr gāmbhīrikā rathākhyā ca/
analyzed: lohityaḥ sindhunadaḥ sarayūḥ gāmbhīrikā rathākhyā ca
gaṅgā kauśikī ādyāḥ saritaḥ vaideha kāmbojāḥ
mathurāyāḥ pūrva ardham himavat gomanta citrakūṭa sthāḥ
saurāṣṭra setu jala mārga paṇya bila parvata āśrayiṇaḥ
ālekhya śabda gaṇita prasādhaka āyuṣya śilpa jñāḥ
cara puruṣa kuhaka jīva kaśi śuka viśaṭha sūcaka abhicāra ratāḥ
dūta napuṃsaka hāsya jña bhūtatantra aindrajāla jñāḥ
ārakṣaka naṭa nartaka ghṛta taila sneha bīja tiktāni
vrata cāri rasāyana kuśala vesarāḥ candraputrasya
sindhunada pūrva bhāgaḥ mathurā paśca ardha bharata sauvīrāḥ
srughna audīcya kudīcya vipāśā sarit śatadrū ramaṭha śālvāḥ ksālvāḥ
traigarta pauravak pauraba ambaṣṭha pāratāḥ vāṭadhāna yaudheyāḥ
sārasvata arjunāyana matsya ardhagrāma rāṣṭrāṇi
hasti aśva purohita bhūpa mantri māṅgalya pauṣṭika āsaktāḥ
kāruṇya satya śauca vrata vidyā dāna dharma yutāḥ
paura mahādhana śabda artha veda viduṣaḥ abhicāra nīti jñāḥ
manuja īśvara aupakaraṇam chatra dhvaja cāmara ādyam ca
śaileya kuṣṭha kkaṣṭha māṃsī tagara rasa saindhavāni vallījam
madhura rasa madhūcchiṣṭāni corakaḥ ca eti jīvasya
takṣa śila martikāvata kūmārtikāvata bahugiri gāndhāra puṣkalāvatakāḥ
prasthala mālava kaikaya dāśārṇa auśīnarāḥ śibayaḥ

original: 16.26ab/ ye ca pibanti vitastām irāvatīṃ candrabhāga^saritaṃ ca/
analyzed: ye ca pibanti vitastām irāvatīm candrabhāga saritam ca
ratha rajata ākara kuñjara turaga mahāmātra dhana yuktāḥ
vara taruṇa yuvati kāma aupakaraṇa mṛṣṭa anna madhura bhujaḥ
udyāna salila kāmuka yaśaḥ sukha audārya rūpa sampannāḥ
vidvat amātya vaṇij jana ghaṭakṛt citra aṇḍa jāḥ triphalāḥ
kauśeya paṭṭa kambala patra aurṇika rodhra patra cocāni
jātīphala aguru vacā pippalyaḥ candanam ca bhṛgoḥ
ānarta ārbuda puṣkara saurāṣṭra ābhīra śūdra raivatakāḥ

original: 16.30cd/ naṣṭā yasmin deśe sarasvatī paścimo deśaḥ/
analyzed: naṣṭā yasmin deśe sarasvatī paścimaḥ deśaḥ
kuru bhūmi jāḥ prabhāsam vidiśāḥ vedasmṛtī mahī taṭa jāḥ
khala malina nīca tailika vihīna sattva aupahata puṃstvāḥ
bāndhanak bandhana śākunika aśuci kaivarta virūpa vṛddha saukarikāḥ
gaṇa pūjya skhalita vrata śabara pulinda artha parihīnāḥ
kaṭu tikta rasāyana vidhavā yoṣitaḥ bhujaga taskara mahiṣyaḥ
khara karabha caṇaka vātala kvātula niṣpāvāḥ ca arkaputrasya
giri śikhara kandara darī viniviṣṭāḥ mleccha jātayaḥ śūdrāḥ
gomāyubhakṣa śūlika vokkāṇa aśvamukha vikala aṅgāḥ
kula pāṃsana hiṃsra kṛtaghna caura niḥsatya śauca dānāḥ ca
khara cara niyuddha vid tīvra roṣa garttāśraya ak garbhāśayāḥ nīcāḥ
upahata dāmbhika rākṣasa nidrā bahulāḥ ca jantavaḥ sarve
dharmeṇa ca saṃtyaktāḥ māṣa tilāḥ ca arka śaśiśatroḥ
giri durga pahlava śveta hūṇa cola āvagāṇa marucīnāḥ
para dāra vivāda ratāḥ para randhra kutūhalāḥ mada autsiktāḥ
mūrkha adhārmika vijigīṣavaḥ ca ketoḥ samākhyātāḥ
udaya samaye yaḥ snigdhāṃśuḥ mahān prakṛti sthitaḥ
yadi ca na hataḥ nirghāta aulkā rajaḥ graha mardanaiḥ
sva bhavana gataḥ sva ucca prāptaḥ śubha graha vīkṣitaḥ

original: 16.39d sa bhavati śivas teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ prabhuḥ parikīrtitaḥ//
analyzed: sa bhavati śivaḥ teṣām yeṣām prabhuḥ parikīrtitaḥ
kṣayam upagacchati tad parigrahaḥ

original: 16.40cd/ ḍamara^bhaya^gada^āturā janā narapatayaś ca bhavanti duḥkhitāḥ//
analyzed: ḍamara bhaya gada āturāḥ janāḥ narapatayaḥ ca bhavanti duḥkhitāḥ

original: 16.41ab/ yadi na ripukṛtaṃ bhayaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ svasuta^kṛtaṃ niyamād amātyajaṃ vā/
analyzed: yadi na ripu kṛtam bhayam nṛpāṇām sva suta kṛtam niyamāt amātya jam vā

original: 16.41cd/ bhavati janapadasya ca^apy avṛṣṭyā gamanam apūrvapura^adri^nimnagāsu//
analyzed: bhavati janapadasya ca api avṛṣṭyāḥ gamanam apūrva pura adri nimnagāsu
graha yuddha adhyāyaḥ

original: 17.01ab/ yuddhaṃ yathā yadā vā *bhaviṣyam[K.bhaviṣyad] ādiśyate trikālajñaiḥ/
analyzed: yuddham yathā yadā vā ādiśyate tri kāla jñaiḥ
tat vijñānam karaṇe mayā kṛtam
viyati caratām grahāṇām upari upari ātma mārga saṃsthānām
ati dūrāt dṛś viṣaye sama tām iva samprayātānām
āsanna krama yogāt bheda aullekha aṃśumardana asavyaiḥ kasavyaḥ
yuddham catuṣprakāram parāśara ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ uktam

original: 17.04ab/ bhede vṛṣṭivināśo bhedaḥ suhṛdāṃ mahākulānāṃ ca/
analyzed: bhede vṛṣṭi vināśaḥ bhedaḥ suhṛdām mahā kulānām ca
ullekhe śastra bhayam mantri virodhaḥ priya anna tvam
amśu virodhe yuddhāni bhūbhṛtām śastra ruj kṣudh avamardāḥ

original: 17.05cd/ yuddhe ca^apy apasavye bhavanti yuddhāni bhūpānām//
analyzed: yuddhe ca api apasavye bhavanti yuddhāni bhūpānām

original: 17.06ab/ ravir ākrando madhye pauraḥ pūrve +apare sthito yāyī/
analyzed: raviḥ ākrandaḥ madhye pauraḥ pūrve apare sthitaḥ yāyī
paurāḥ budha guru ravijāḥ nityam śītāṃśuḥ ākrandaḥ kākrandraḥ
ketu kuja rāhu śukrāḥ yāyinaḥ ete hatāḥ hanyuḥ
ākranda yāyi paurān jayinaḥ sva vargasya

original: 17.08ab/ paure paureṇa hate paurāḥ paurān nṛpān vinighnanti/
analyzed: paure paureṇa hate paurāḥ paurān nṛpān vinighnanti
evam yāyi ākranda akyāyi ākrandau nāgara yāyi grahāḥ ca eva
dakṣiṇa diś sthaḥ paruṣaḥ vepathuḥ a prāpya sannivṛttaḥ aṇuḥ

original: 17.09cd/ adhirūḍho vikṛto niṣprabho vivarṇaś ca yaḥ sa jitaḥ//
analyzed: adhirūḍhaḥ vikṛtaḥ niṣprabhaḥ vivarṇaḥ ca yaḥ sa jitaḥ
ukta viparīta lakṣaṇa sampannaḥ jaya gataḥ vinirdeśyaḥ kvinirdiṣṭaḥ
vipulaḥ snigdhaḥ dyutimān dakṣiṇa diś sthaḥ api jaya yuktaḥ

original: 17.11ab/ dvāv api mayūkhayuktau vipulau snigdhau samāgame bhavataḥ/
analyzed: dvau api mayūkha yuktau vipulau snigdhau samāgame bhavataḥ
tatra anyonyam prītiḥ kanyonya prītiḥ viparītau ātma pakṣa ghnau

original: 17.12ab/ yuddhaṃ samāgamo vā yady avyaktau *svalakṣaṇair[K.tu lakṣaṇair] bhavataḥ/
analyzed: yuddham samāgamaḥ vā yadi avyaktau lakṣaṇaiḥ bhavataḥ

original: 17.12cd/ bhuvi bhūbhṛtām api tathā phalam avyaktaṃ vinirdeśyam//
analyzed: bhuvi bhūbhṛtām api tathā phalam avyaktam vinirdeśyam

original: 17.13ab/ guruṇā jite +avanisute bāhlīkā yāyino *+agnivārtāś ca[K.agnivārttāś ca]/
analyzed: guruṇā jite avanisute vāhlīkāḥ yāyinaḥ agni vārttāḥ cakagni vārttāḥ ca
śaśijena śūrasenāḥ kaliṅga śālva āśksālvāḥ ca pīḍyante

original: 17.14ab/ saureṇa^are vijite jayanti paurāḥ prajāś ca sīdanti/
analyzed: saureṇaare vijite jayanti paurāḥ prajāḥ ca sīdanti
koṣṭhāgāra kkoṣṭhāgāra mleccha kṣatriya tāpaḥ ca śukrajite
bhaumena hate śaśije vṛkṣa sarit tāpasa aśmaka narendrāḥ
uttara diś sthāḥ kratu dīkṣitāḥ ca santāpam āyānti
guruṇā jite jite mleccha śūdra caura artha yukta paura janāḥ
traigarta pārvatīyāḥ pīḍyante kampate ca mahī
ravijena budhe dhvaste nāvika yodha abja sa dhana garbhiṇyaḥ
bhṛguṇā jite agni kopaḥ sasya ambuda yāyi vidhvaṃsaḥ
jīve śukra abhihate kulūta gāndhāraka ekayāḥ madrāḥ
śālva āksālvāḥ vatsāḥ vaṅgāḥ gāvaḥ sasyāni

original: 17.19ab/ bhaumena hate jīve madhyo deśo nareśvarā gāvaḥ/
analyzed: bhaumena hate jīve madhyaḥ deśaḥ nareśvarāḥ gāvaḥ
saureṇa ca arjunāyana vasāti yaudheya śibi viprāḥ
śaśi tanayena api jite bṛhaspatau mleccha satya śastrabhṛtaḥ

original: 17.20cd/ upayānti madhyadeśaś ca saṃkṣayaṃ yac ca bhaktiphalam//
analyzed: upayānti madhyadeśaḥ ca saṃkṣayam yat ca bhakti phalam

original: 17.21ab/ śukre bṛhaspati^*jite[K.hate] yāyī śreṣṭho vināśam upayāti/
analyzed: śukre yāyī śreṣṭhaḥ vināśam upayāti

original: 17.21cd/ brahmakṣatravirodhaḥ salilaṃ ca na vāsavas tyajati//
analyzed: brahma kṣatra virodhaḥ salilam ca na vāsavaḥ tyajati
kośala kaliṅga vaṅgāḥ vatsāḥ matsyāḥ ca madhyadeśa yutāḥ

original: 17.22cd/ mahatīṃ vrajanti pīḍāṃ napuṃsakāḥ śūrasenāś ca//
analyzed: mahatīm vrajanti pīḍām napuṃsakāḥ śūra senāḥ ca
kuja vijite bhṛgu tanaye bala mukhya vadhaḥ narendra saṃgrāmāḥ
saumyena pārvatīyāḥ kṣīra vināśaḥ alpa vṛṣṭiḥ ca
ravijena site vijite guṇa mukhyāḥ u gaṇa mukhyāḥ śastra jīvinaḥ kṣatram

original: 17.24cd/ jalajāś ca nipīḍyante sāmānyaṃ bhaktiphalam anyat//
analyzed: jala jāḥ ca nipīḍyante sāmānyam bhakti phalam anyat
asite sitena nihate argha vṛddhiḥ ahi vihaga māninām pīḍā
kṣitijena taṅgaṇa andhra oḍra kāśi bāhlīka deśānām
saumyena parābhūte mande aṅga vaṇij vihaṅga paśu nāgāḥ
santāpyante guruṇā strī bahulāḥ mahiṣaka śakāḥ ca
ayam viśeṣaḥ abhihitaḥ hatānām kuja jña vāgīśa sita asitānām

original: 17.27cd/ phalaṃ tu vācyaṃ graha^bhaktito +anyad yathā tathā ghnanti hatāḥ svabhaktīḥ//
analyzed: phalam tu vācyam graha bhaktitaḥ anyat yathā tathā ghnanti hatāḥ sva bhaktīḥ
śaśi graha samāgama adhyāyaḥ

original: 18.01ab/ bhānāṃ yathāsambhavam uttareṇa yāto grahāṇāṃ yadi vā śaśāṅkaḥ/
analyzed: bhānām yathāsambhavam uttareṇa yātaḥ grahāṇām yadi vā śaśāṅkaḥ

original: 18.01cd/ pradakṣiṇaṃ tat^*śubhadaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ[K.śubhakṛnnarāṇāṃ] yāmyena yāto na śivaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ//
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam tat śubha dam nṛpāṇām śubha kṛt narāṇām yāmyena yātaḥ na śivaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: 18.02ab/ candramā yadi kujasya yāty udak pārvatīya^balaśālināṃ jayaḥ/
analyzed: candramāḥ yadi kujasya yāti udak pārvatīya bala śālinām jayaḥ
kṣatriyāḥ pramuditāḥ sa yāyinaḥ bhūri dhānya muditā vasundharā

original: 18.03ab/ uttarataḥ svasutasya śaśaṅkaḥ paura^jayāya subhikṣa^karaś ca/
analyzed: uttaratas sva sutasya śaśaṅkaḥ paura jayāya subhikṣa karaḥ ca

original: 18.03cd/ sasya^cayaṃ kurute janahārdiṃ kośa^cayaṃ ca narādhipatīnām//
analyzed: sasya cayam kurute jana hārdim kośa cayam ca narādhipatīnām
bṛhaspateḥ uttara ge śaśāṅke paura dvija kṣatriya paṇḍitānām

original: 18.04cd/ dharmasya deśasya ca madhyamasya vṛddhiḥ subhikṣaṃ muditāḥ prajāś ca//
analyzed: dharmasya deśasya ca madhyamasya vṛddhiḥ subhikṣam muditāḥ prajāḥ ca

original: 18.05ab/ bhārgavasya yadi yāty udak śaśī kośa^yukta^gaja^vāji^vṛddhidaḥ/
analyzed: bhārgavasya yadi yāti udak śaśī kośa yukta gaja vāji vṛddhi daḥ

original: 18.05cd/ yāyināṃ ca vijayo dhanuṣmatāṃ sasyasampad api ca^uttamā tadā//
analyzed: yāyinām ca vijayaḥ dhanuṣmatām sasya sampad api ca auttamā tadā

original: 18.06ab/ ravijasya śaśī pradakṣiṇaṃ kuryāc cet purabhūbhṛtāṃ jayaḥ/
analyzed: ravijasya śaśī pradakṣiṇam kuryāt ced pura bhūbhṛtām jayaḥ

original: 18.07ab/ yeṣām udag gaccchati bhagrahāṇāṃ prāleyaraśmir nirupadravaś ca/
analyzed: yeṣām udak gacchati bhagrahāṇām prāleya raśmiḥ nirupadravaḥ ca

original: 18.08b bhavati tad apasavye sarvam eva pratīpam/

original: 18.08d na khalu bhavati yuddhaṃ sākam indor graha^ṛkṣaiḥ//
analyzed: na khalu bhavati yuddham sākam indoḥ graha ṛkṣaiḥ
graha varṣa phala adhyāyaḥ
sarvatra bhūḥ virala sasya yutā vanāni
daivāt bibhakṣayiṣu daṃṣṭri samāvṛtāni
nadyaḥ syandanti ca nā eva hik ca payaḥ pracuram
ruj bheṣajāni na tathā ati bala anvitāni
tīkṣṇam tapati aditi jaḥ śiśire api kāle
na ati ambudāḥ jalamucaḥ acala sannikāśāḥ
naṣṭa prabha ṛkṣa gaṇa śīta karam nabhaḥ ca
sīdanti tāpasa kulāni sa go kulāni
hasti aśva pattimat asahya balaiḥ upetā
bāṇa āsana asi muśala atiśayāḥ caranti

original: 19.03c ghnanto nṛpā yudhi nṛpa^anucaraiś ca deśān
analyzed: ghnantaḥ nṛpāḥ yudhi nṛpa anucaraiḥ ca deśān

utkaṇṭhitena a kutkaṇṭhakena guruṇā dhvanitena ca āśāḥ
toyāni padma kumuda autpalavanti atīva
phulla drumāṇi upavanāni ali nāditāni
gāvaḥ prabhūta payasaḥ nayana abhirāmā
rāmāḥ rataiḥ aviratam ramayanti rāmān
godhūma śāli yava dhānyavara ikṣuvāṭā
bhūḥ pālyate nṛpatibhiḥ nagara ākara āḍhyā
saṃvatsare śiśiragoḥ abhisampravṛtte
vāta uddhataḥ carati vahniḥ ati pracaṇḍaḥ
grāmān vanāni nagarāṇi ca sandidhakṣuḥ
hāhā iti dasyu gaṇa pāta hatāḥ raṭanti
niḥsvīkṛtāḥ vipaśavaḥ bhuvi martya saṃghāḥ

original: 19.08b muñcanti *kutra cid[K.na kva cid] apaḥ pracuraṃ payodāḥ/
analyzed: muñcanti kutra cit kna kva cit apaḥ pracuram payaḥ dāḥ

original: 19.08c sīmni prajātam api śoṣam upaiti sasyaṃ
analyzed: sīmni prajātam api śoṣam upaiti sasyam
niṣpannam api avinayāt apare haranti
bhūpāḥ na samyak abhipālana sakta cittāḥ
evaṃvidhaiḥ upahṛtā ākū upahatā bhavati prajā iyam
saṃvatsare avani sutasya vipanna sasyā
māyā indrajāla kuhaka ākara nāgarāṇām
gāndharva lekhya gaṇita astra vidām ca vṛddhiḥ
piprīṣayā nṛpatayaḥ adbhuta darśanāni
ditsanti tuṣṭi jananāni parasparebhyaḥ
vārttā kvārttā jagatī avitathā vikalā trayī ca

original: 19.11b samyak caraty api manor iva daṇḍanītiḥ/
analyzed: samyak carati api manoḥ iva daṇḍanītiḥ
adhyakṣaraka dhyakṣaram su abhiniviṣṭa dhiyaḥ api katra ke cid
ānvīkṣikīṣu ca param padam īhamānāḥ
hāsya jña dūta kavi bāla napuṃsakānām
yukti jña setu jala parvata vāsinām ca
hārdim karoti mṛgalāñchana jaḥ svake abde
māse atha vā pracura tāc pracura tām bhuvi ca auṣadhīnām
dhvaniḥ uccaritaḥ adhvare dyu gāmī
vipulaḥ yajña muṣām manāṃsi bhindan
vicarati aniśam dvijottamānām
kṣitiḥ uttama sasyavatī aneka dvipa patti aśva dhana auru go kula āḍhyā
kṣitipaiḥ abhipālana pravṛddhā dyucara spardhi janā tadā vibhāti

original: 19.15ab/ vividhair viyad unnataiḥ payodair vṛtam urvīṃ payasābhitarpayadbhiḥ/
analyzed: vividhaiḥ viyat unnataiḥ payodaiḥ vṛtam urvīm payasā abhitarpayadbhiḥ

original: 19.15cd/ surarājaguroḥ śubhe *tu[K.atra] varṣe bahusasyā kṣitir uttama^ṛddhiyuktā//
analyzed: surarāja guroḥ śubhe varṣe bahu sasyā kṣitiḥ uttama ṛddhi yuktā
śāli ikṣumatī api dharā dharaṇīdhara ābha
śrīmat saroruha tata ambu taḍāga kīrṇā
yoṣā iva bhāti abhinava ābharaṇa ojjvala aṅgī
kṣatram kṣitau kṣapita bhūri bala ari pakṣam
udghuṣṭa na eka jaya śabda virāvita āśam
saṃhṛṣṭa śiṣṭa jana duṣṭa vinaṣṭa vargām
gām pālayanti avanipāḥ nagara ākara āḍhyām
pepīyate madhu madhau saha kāminībhiḥ
śravaṇa hāri sa veṇu vīṇam
bobhujyate atithi suhṛd sva janaiḥ saha annam
abde sitasya madanasya jaya avaghoṣaḥ
udvṛttau uddhata dasyu gaṇa bhūri raṇa ākulāni
rāṣṭrāṇi aneka paśu vitta vinākṛtāni
rorūyamāṇa hata bandhu janaiḥ janaiḥ ca
roga auttamā kula kulāni bubhukṣayā ca
vāta uddhata ambudhara varjitam antarikṣam
ca dharā talam dyauḥ
naṣṭa arka candra kiraṇa ati rajaḥ avanaddhā
toyāśayāḥ ca vijalāḥ saritaḥ api tanvyaḥ
jātāni kutra cit a toya tayā vināśam
ṛcchanti puṣṭim aparāṇi jala ukṣitāni
sasyāni mandam abhivarṣati vṛtraśatruḥ kva ṛtraśatrau
varṣe divākarasutasya sadā pravṛtte

na sakala phala dātā puṣṭi daḥ atas anyathā yaḥ

original: 19.22c yad aśubham aśubhe +abde māsajaṃ tasya vṛddhiḥ
analyzed: yat aśubham aśubhe abde māsa jam tasya vṛddhiḥ
śubha phalam api ca evam yāpyam anyonya tāyām

original: 20.01ab/ yasyāṃ diśi dṛśyante viśanti tārāgrahā raviṃ sarve/
analyzed: yasyām diśi dṛśyante viśanti tārā grahāḥ ravim sarve
bhavati bhayam diśi tasyām āyudha kopa kṣudhā ā ātaṅkaiḥ

original: 20.03ab/ yasmin khāṃśe dṛśyā grahamālā dinakare dināntagate/

original: 20.03cd/ tatra +anyo bhavati nṛpaḥ paracakra^upadravaś ca mahān//
analyzed: tatra anyaḥ bhavati nṛpaḥ para cakra aupadravaḥ ca mahān

original: 20.04ab/ *tasminn[K.yasminn] ṛkṣe kuryuḥ samāgamaṃ tajjanān grahā hanyuḥ/

original: 20.05cd/ kośaś cety eteṣām abhidhāsye lakṣaṇaṃ saphalaṃ//

original: 20.06ab/ eka^ṛkṣe catvāraḥ saha paurair yāyino +atha vā pañca/

original: 20.07ab/ pauraḥ paurasameto yāyī saha yāyinā samājākhyaḥ/

original: 20.08ab/ uditaḥ paścād ekaḥ prāk cānyo yadi sa sannipātākhyaḥ/
analyzed: uditaḥ paścāt ekaḥ prāk ca anyaḥ yadi sa sannipāta ākhyaḥ

original: 20.08cd/ avikṛtatanavaḥ snigdhā vipulāś ca samāgame dhanyāḥ//

original: 20.09ab/ samau tu saṃvartasamāgamākhyau sammoha^kośau bhayadau prajānām/

original: 20.09cd/ *samājasaṃjño susamā pradiṣṭā[K.samājñaḥ susamaḥ pradiṣṭo] vairaprakopaḥ khalu sannipāte//

original: 21.01ab/ annaṃ jagataḥ prāṇāḥ prāvṛṭkālasya cānnam āyattam/

original: 21.02ab/ tallakṣaṇāni munibhir yāni nibaddhāni tāni dṛṣṭvā^idam/

original: 21.08ab/ sita^pakṣa^bhavāḥ kṛṣṇe śukle kṛṣṇā dyusambhavā rātrau/

original: 21.13ab/ pūrva^udbhūtāḥ paścād aparotthāḥ prāg bhavanti jīmūtāḥ/

snigdha sita bahula pariveṣa parivṛtau hima maya kha arka okū mayūkha arkau

śaśi śiva śakra āśā sthāḥ śānta ravāḥ pakṣi mṛga saṅghāḥ
vipulāḥ pradakṣiṇa carāḥ snigdha mayūkhāḥ grahāḥ nirupasargāḥ

original: 21.18ab/ garbhāṇāṃ puṣṭikarāḥ sarveṣām eva yo +atra tu viśeṣaḥ/

original: 21.20cd/ atiśītaṃ saghanasya ca bhānor astodayau dhanyau//

original: 21.21cd/ pariveṣāś cāsakalāḥ kapilas tāmro raviś ca śubhaḥ//
analyzed: pariveṣāḥ ca a sakalāḥ kapilaḥ tāmraḥ raviḥ ca śubhaḥ

jalacara sattva ākārāḥ grabheṣu ghanāḥ prabhūta jalāḥ

original: 21.24cd/ ruṣitā iva dhārābhir visṛjanty ambhaḥ prasavakāle//

original: 21.26cd/ ity utpātair etais trividhaiś cānyair hato garbhaḥ//

original: 21.27ab/ svartu^svabhāva^janitaiḥ sāmānyair yaiś ca lakṣaṇair vṛddhiḥ/
analyzed: sva ṛtu svabhāva janitaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ yaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ vṛddhiḥ

original: 21.27cd/ garbhāṇām viparītais tair eva viparyayo bhavati//

original: 21.28cd/ sarveṣv ṛtuṣu vivṛddho garbho bahutoyado bhavati//

original: 21.29cd/ puṣṇāti bahūn divasān hanty utpātair hatas trividhaiḥ//
analyzed: puṣṇāti bahūn divasān hanti utpātaiḥ hataḥ trividhaiḥ

original: 21.30ab/ mṛgamāsa^ādiṣv aṣṭau ṣaṭ ṣoḍaśa viṃśatiś caturyuktā/
analyzed: mṛgamāsa ādiṣu aṣṭau ṣaḍ ṣoḍaśa viṃśatiḥ catur yuktā
viṃśatiḥ atha divasa trayam ekatama ṛkṣeṇa pañcabhyaḥ
pañca nimittaiḥ śata yojanam tad ardha ardham eka hānyāḥ atas

original: 21.32ab[K.21.36ab]/ droṇaḥ pañcanimitte garbhe trīṇy āḍhakāni pavanena/
analyzed: droṇaḥ pañca nimitte garbhe trīṇi āḍhakāni pavanena

original: 21.32cd[K.21.36cd]/ ṣaḍ vidyutā navābhraiḥ stanitena dvādaśa prasave//
analyzed: ṣaṭ vidyutā nava abhraiḥ stanitena dvādaśa prasave
krūra graha saṃyukte karakā aśani matsya varṣa dāḥ garbhāḥ
śaśini ravau vā śubha saṃyuta īkṣite bhūri vṛṣṭi karāḥ
ati vṛṣṭiḥ garbha abhāvāya nirnimitta kṛtā
droṇa aṣṭa aṃśe abhyadhike vṛṣṭe garbhaḥ srutaḥ bhavati

original: 21.35ab/ garbhaḥ puṣṭaḥ prasave graha^upaghāta^ādibhir yadi na vṛṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: garbhaḥ puṣṭaḥ prasave graha aupaghāta ādibhiḥ yadi na vṛṣṭaḥ

original: 21.36ab/ kāṭhinyaṃ yāti yathā cira^kāla^dhṛtaṃ payaḥ payasvinyāḥ/
analyzed: kāṭhinyam yāti yathā cira kāla dhṛtam payaḥ payasvinyāḥ
kāla atītam tadvat salilam kāṭhinyam upayāti
sa bhavati bahu toyaḥ pañca rūpa abhyupetaḥ
visṛjati yadi toyam garbha kāle ati bhūri
prasava samayam itvā śīkara ambhaḥ karoti
garbha dhāraṇa adhyāyaḥ
jyaiṣṭha site aṣṭamyā ādyaḥ catvāraḥ vāyu dhāraṇāḥ divasāḥ
mṛdu śubha pavanāḥ śastāḥ snigdha ghana sthagita gaganāḥ ca
tatra eva svāti ādye vṛṣṭe bha catuṣṭaye kramāt māsāḥ

udaya śikhari saṃsthaḥ durnirīkṣyaḥ ati dīptyā

virasam udakam go netra ābham viyat vimalāḥ diśaḥ
lavaṇa vikṛtiḥ kākāṇḍa ābham yadā ca bhavet nabhaḥ
pavana vigamaḥ poplūyante jhaṣāḥ sthala gāminaḥ
rasanam asakṛt maṇḍūkānām jala āgama hetavaḥ
mārjārāḥ bhṛśam avanim nakhaiḥ likhanta uklikhante
rathyāyām śiśu racita aśc śiśu nicitāḥ ca setu bandhāḥ
samprāptam jalam acirāt nivedayanti
girayaḥ añjana cūrṇa sannibha akañjana puñja sannibhāḥ yadi vā bāṣpa niruddha kandarāḥ
kṛkavāku vilocana aupamāḥ pariveṣāḥ śaśinaḥ ca vṛṣṭi dāḥ
vinā aupaghātena pipīlikānām
aṇḍa aupasaṃkrāntiḥ ahi vyavāyaḥ

vṛṣṭeḥ nimittāni gavām plutam ca
taru śikhara aupagatāḥ kṛkalāsā
gagana tala sthita dṛṣṭi nipātāḥ
yadi ca gavām ravi vīkṣaṇam ūrdhvam
nipatati vāri tadā na cireṇa

original: 28.09ab/ na^icchanti vinirgamaṃ gṛhād dhunvanti śravaṇān khurān api/

original: 28.09cd/ paśavaḥ paśuvac ca *kukkurā[K.kurkurā] yady ambhaḥ patatīti nirdiśet//

rudanti bhavanti vā yadi vitatam viyat mukhāḥ divā unmukhāḥ

śuka kapota vilocana sannibhaḥ
madhu nibhaḥ ca yadā himadīdhitiḥ

original: 28.11d patati vāri tadā na *cireṇa ca[K.cirād divaḥ]//
analyzed: patati vāri tadā na cireṇa cakcirāt divaḥ
stanitam niśi vidyutaḥ divā
rudhira nibhāḥ yadi daṇḍa vat sthitāḥ
pavanaḥ puratas ca
yadi salilasya tadāāgamaḥ bhavet
vallīnām gagana tala aunmukhāḥ pravālāḥ
snāyante yadi jala pāṃśubhiḥ vihaṅgāḥ
sevante yadi ca sarīsṛpāḥ tṛṇa agrāṇi
āsannaḥ bhavati tadā jalasya pātaḥ
mayūra śuka cāṣa cātaka samāna varṇāḥ yadā
japā kusuma paṅkaja dyuti muṣaḥ ca sandhyā ghanāḥ

original: 30.03ab/ bhairavam uccair viruvan mṛgo +asakṛd grāma^ghātam ācaṣṭe/

original: 30.10cd/ kiraṇāḥ śivāya jagato vitamaske nabhasi bhānumataḥ//

kalmāṣa babhru kapilāḥ vicitra māñjiṣṭha harita śabala ābhāḥ
tridiva anubandhinaḥ avṛṣṭaye alpa bhaya dāḥ tu sapta ahāt

lokāḥ tadā roga śataiḥ nipīḍyate
śuklam rajaḥ loka vivṛddhi śāntaye

original: 30.16cd/ sa vidik^sthito nṛpāṇām aśubho dikṣu *dvijādīnām[K's tr. dvijātīnām]//

original: 30.17cd/ śuklādyo viprādīn yad abhimukhas tāṃ nihanti diśam//
analyzed: śukla ādyaḥ vipra ādīn yat abhimukhaḥ tām nihanti diśam

original: 30.19ab/ anulomage +abhravṛkṣe śamaṃ gate yāyino nṛpasya badhaḥ/

bāla taru pratirūpiṇi yuvarāja amātyayoḥ mṛtyuḥ

śiśira ādiṣu varṇāḥ śoṇa pīta sita citra padma rudhira nibhāḥ

original: 30.22cd/ prakṛtibhavāḥ sandhyāyāṃ svartau śastā vikṛtir anyā//

original: 45.35ab/ ardhena yadā tailaṃ bhavati tilānām atailatā vā syāt/
analyzed: ardhena yadā tailam bhavati tilānām a taila tā vā syāt

original: 45.35cd/ annasya ca vairasyaṃ tadā tu vindyād bhayaṃ sumahat//
analyzed: annasya ca vairasyam tadā tu vindyāt bhayam su mahat

original: 45.36ab/ vikṛta^kusumaṃ phalam vā grāmād atha vā purād vahiḥ[K.ū.bahiḥ] kāryam/
analyzed: vikṛta kusumam phalam vā grāmāt atha vā purāt vahiḥkūbahis kāryam

original: 45.36cd/ saumyo +atra caruḥ kāryo nirvāpyo vā paśuḥ śāntyai//
analyzed: saumyaḥ atra caruḥ kāryaḥ nirvāpyaḥ vā paśuḥ śāntyai
sasye ca dṛṣṭvā vikṛtim pradeyam
tat kṣetram eva prathamam dvijebhyaḥ
tasya eva madhye carum atra bhaumam
kṛtvā na doṣam samupaiti tajjam tajjān
durbhikṣam anāvṛṣṭau ativṛṣṭau kanāvṛṣṭyām ativṛṣṭyām kṣudh bhayam para bhayam caksa para cakram
rogaḥ hi an ṛtu bhavāyām an abhra jātāyām
śīta auṣṇa viparyāsa u viparyāse no samyak ṛtuṣu ca sampravṛtteṣu
ṣaṣ māsāt rāṣṭra bhayam roga bhayam daiva janitam ca
anya ṛtau sapta aham prabandha varṣe pradhāna nṛpa maraṇam
rakte śastra audyogaḥ māṃsa asthi vasā ādibhiḥ marakaḥ
dhānya hiraṇya tvac phala kusuma ādyaiḥ varṣitaiḥ bhayam vindyāt
aṅgāra pāṃśu varṣe vināśam āyāti tat nagaram

original: 45.42ab/ upalā vinā jaladharair vikṛtā vā prāṇino yadā vṛṣṭāḥ/
analyzed: upalāḥ vinā jaladharaiḥ vikṛtāḥ vā prāṇinaḥ yadā vṛṣṭāḥ
chidram vā api ati vṛṣṭau sasyānām īti saṃjananam
kone vese inserted

original: K. 46.43ab/ kṣīra^ghṛta^kṣaudrāṇāṃ dadhno rudhira^uṣṇa^vāriṇāṃ[K's tr. vāriṇo] varṣe/
analyzed: kṣīra ghṛta kṣaudrāṇām dadhnaḥ vāriṇas varṣe

original: K. 46.43cd/ deśavināśo jñeyo +asṛgvarṣe ca api nṛpa^yuddham//]
analyzed: deśa vināśaḥ jñeyaḥ asṛj varṣe ca api nṛpa yuddham

original: 45.43ab/ yady amale +arke chāyā na dṛśyate pratīpā vā/
analyzed: yadi amale arke chāyā na dṛśyate pratīpā vā

original: 45.44ab/ vyabhre nabhasi^indradhanur divā yadā dṛśyate +atha vā rātrau/
analyzed: vyabhre nabhasi indradhanuḥ divā yadā dṛśyate atha vā rātrau

original: 45.44cd/ prācyām aparasyāṃ vā tadā bhavet kṣudbhyaṃ sumahat//
analyzed: prācyām aparasyām vā tadā bhavet kṣudbhyam su mahat
sūrya aindu parjanya samīraṇānām smṛtaḥ vṛṣṭi vikāra kāle

original: 45.45cd/ dhānya^anna^go^kāñcana^dakṣiṇāś ca deyās tataḥ śāntim upaiti pāpam//
analyzed: dhānya anna go kāñcana dakṣiṇāḥ ca deyāḥ tatas śāntim upaiti pāpam

original: 45.46ab/ apasarpaṇaṃ nadīnām nagarād acireṇa śūnyatāṃ kurute/
analyzed: apasarpaṇam nadīnām nagarāt acireṇa śūnya tām kurute
śoṣaḥ ca a śoṣyāṇām anyeṣām vā hrada ādīnām
sneha asṛj māṃsa vahāḥ saṅkula kaluṣāḥ pratīpa gāḥ ca api
para cakrasya āgamanam nadyaḥ kathayanti ṣaṣ māsāt
jvālā dhūma kvātha ārudita autkruṣṭāni ca eva kūpānām
gīta prajalpitāni ca jana marakāyaupadiṣṭa anikpradiṣṭāni
salila ktoya autpattiḥ a khāte gandha rasa viparyaye ca toyānām
salilāśaya vikṛtau vā mahat bhayam tatra

original: 45.50ab/ salila^vikāre kuryāt pūjāṃ varuṇasya vāruṇair mantraiḥ/
analyzed: salila vikāre kuryāt pūjām varuṇasya vāruṇaiḥ mantraiḥ

original: 45.50cd/ tair eva ca japa^homaṃ śamam evaṃ pāpam upayāti//
analyzed: taiḥ eva ca japa homam śamam evam pāpam upayāti
prasava vikāre strīṇām dvi tri catuṣprabhṛti samprasūtau vā
hīna atirikta kāle ca deśa kula saṃkṣayaḥ bhavati
vaḍavā uṣṭra mahiṣa go hastinīṣu yamala audbhave eṣām

original: 45.52cd/ ṣaṇmāsāt sūtiphalaṃ śāntau ślokau ca garga^uktau//
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsāt sūti phalam śāntau ślokau ca garga uktau

original: 45.53ab/ nāryaḥ parasya viṣaye tyaktavyās tā hita^arthinā/
analyzed: nāryaḥ parasya viṣaye tyaktavyāḥ tāḥ hita arthinā

original: 45.53cd/ tarpayec ca dvijān kāmaiḥ śāntiṃ ca^eva^atra kārayet//
analyzed: tarpayet ca dvijān kāmaiḥ śāntim ca eva atra kārayet
catuṣpādāḥ sva yūthebhyaḥ tyaktavyāḥ para bhūmiṣu

original: 45.54cd/ nagaraṃ svāminaṃ yūtham anyathā tu vināśayet//
analyzed: nagaram svāminam yūtham anyathā tu vināśayet

original: 45.55ab/ parayonāv abhigamanaṃ bhavati tiraścām asādhu dhenūnām/
analyzed: para yonau abhigamanam bhavati tiraścām asādhu dhenūnām

original: 45.55cd/ ukṣāṇo vā^anyonyaṃ pibati śvā vā surabhi^putram//
analyzed: ukṣāṇaḥ vā aanyonyam pibati śvā vā surabhi putram
māsa trayeṇa vindyāt tasmin niḥsaṃśayam para āgamanam
tad pratighātāya etau ślokau gargeṇa nirdiṣṭau

original: 45.57ab/ tyāgo vivāsanaṃ dānaṃ tat tasya^āśu śubhaṃ bhavet/
analyzed: tyāgaḥ vivāsanam dānam tat tasya āśu śubham bhavet

original: 45.57cd/ tarpayed brāhmaṇāṃś ca^atra japa^homāṃś ca kārayet//
analyzed: tarpayet brāhmaṇān ca atra japa homān ca kārayet
sthālīpākena dhātāram paśunā ca purohitaḥ
prājāpatyena mantreṇa yajet bahu anna dakṣiṇam

original: 45.59ab/ yānaṃ vāha^viyuktaṃ yadi gacchen na vrajec ca vāha^yutam/
analyzed: yānam vāha viyuktam yadi gacchet na vrajet ca vāha yutam

original: 45.59cd/ rāṣṭra^bhayaṃ bhavati tadā cakrāṇāṃ sāda^bhaṅge ca//
analyzed: rāṣṭra bhayam bhavati tadā cakrāṇām sāda bhaṅge ca
gīta rava tūrya śabdāḥ nabhasi yadā vā cara sthira anya tvam
mṛtyuḥ tadā gadā vā para abhibhavaḥ

original: 45.61ab[K.46.62ab]/ anabhihata^tūrya^nādaḥ śabdo vā tāḍiteṣu yadi na syāt/
analyzed: an abhihata tūrya nādaḥ śabdaḥ vā tāḍiteṣu yadi na syāt

original: 45.61cd[K.46.62cd]/ vyutpattau vā teṣāṃ para^āgamo nṛpati^maraṇaṃ vā//
analyzed: vyutpattau vā teṣām para āgamaḥ nṛpati maraṇam vā
go lāṅgalayoḥ saṅge darvī śūrpa ādi upaskara vikāre

original: 45.62cd/ kroṣṭuka^nāde ca tathā śastra^bhayaṃ munivacaś ca^idam//
analyzed: kroṣṭuka nāde ca tathā śastra bhayam muni vacaḥ ca edam

original: 45.63ab/ vāyavyeṣv eṣu nṛpatir vāyuṃ śaktubhir arcayet/
analyzed: vāyavyeṣu eṣu nṛpatiḥ vāyum śaktubhiḥ arcayet

original: 45.63cd/ āvāyor iti pañcarco *japtavyāḥ[K.jāpyāś ca] prayatair dvijaiḥ//
analyzed: ā vāyoḥ iti pañcarcaḥ japtavyāḥ k jāpyāḥ ca prayataiḥ dvijaiḥ
brāhmaṇān parama annena dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca tarpayet
bahu anna dakṣiṇāḥ homāḥ kartavyāḥ ca prayatnataḥ

original: 45.65ab/ pura^pakṣiṇo vanacarā vanyā vā nirbhayā viśanti puram/
analyzed: pura pakṣiṇaḥ vana carāḥ vanyāḥ vā nirbhayāḥ viśanti puram

original: 45.65cd/ naktaṃ vā divasa^carāḥ kṣapā^carā vā caranty ahani//
analyzed: naktam vā divasa carāḥ kṣapā carāḥ vā caranti ahani

original: 45.66ab/ sandhyā^dvaye +api maṇḍalam ābadhnanto mṛgā vihaṅgā vā/
analyzed: sandhyā dvaye api maṇḍalam ābadhnantaḥ mṛgāḥ vihaṅgāḥ vā

original: 45.66cd/ dīptāyāṃ diśy atha vā krośantaḥ saṃhatā bhayadāḥ//
analyzed: dīptāyām diśi atha vā krośantaḥ saṃhatāḥ bhaya dāḥ

original: 45.67ab/ *śyenāḥ[K.śvānaḥ] prarudanta iva dvāre krośanti jambukā dīptāḥ/
analyzed: śyenāḥ kśvānaḥ prarudantaḥ iva dvāre krośanti jambukāḥ dīptāḥ

original: 45.67cd/ praviśen narendra^bhavane kapotakaḥ kauśiko yadi vā//
analyzed: praviśet narendra bhavane kapotakaḥ kauśikaḥ yadi vā
kukkuṭa rutam pradoṣe hemanta ādau ca kokila ālāpāḥ
pratiloma maṇḍala carāḥ śyena ādyāḥ ca ambare bhaya dāḥ
gṛha caitya toraṇeṣu dvāreṣu ca pakṣi saṅgha sampāta ḍhak sampātāḥ
madhu valmīka ambhoruha samudbhava śc samudbhavāḥ ca api nāśāya
śvabhiḥ asthi śava avayava praveśanam mandireṣu marakāya
paśu śastra vyāhāre nṛpa mṛtyuḥ muni vacaḥ ca edam
mṛga pakṣi vikāreṣu kuryāt dhīmān kūdhomān sa dakṣiṇān

original: 45.71cd/ devāḥ kapota iti ca japtavyāḥ pañcabhir dvijaiḥ//
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ iti ca japtavyāḥ pañcabhiḥ dvijaiḥ

original: 45.72ab/ sudevā iti ca^ekena deyā gāvaḥ *sadakṣiṇāḥ[K.ca dakṣiṇā]/
analyzed: sudevāḥ iti ca ekena deyāḥ gāvaḥ sa dakṣiṇāḥ ca dakṣiṇā
japet śākuna sūktam vā manaḥ ca
śakra dhvaja aindra kīla stambha dvāra prapāta bhaṅgeṣu
tadvat kapāṭa toraṇa ketūnām narapateḥ maraṇam

original: 45.74cd/ chidra^abhāve bhūmer daraṇaṃ kampaś ca bhayakārī//
analyzed: chidra abhāve bhūmeḥ daraṇam kampaḥ ca bhaya kārī
nāstikānām ca bhaktaḥ
īrṣyuḥ krūraḥ vigraha āsakta cetāḥ

original: 45.76ab/ prahara hara chindhi bhindhi^ity āyudha^kāṣṭha^aśma^pāṇayo bālāḥ/

original: 45.76cd/ nigadantaḥ praharante tatra^api bhayaṃ bhavaty āśu//

original: 45.77cd/ nāyaka^citritam atha vā kṣaye kṣayaṃ yāti na cireṇa//
analyzed: nāyaka citritam atha vā kṣaye kṣayam yāti na cireṇa

original: 45.78cd/ nitya^ucchiṣṭa^strīkaṃ ca yad gṛhaṃ tat kṣayaṃ yāti//
analyzed: nitya aucchiṣṭa strīkam ca yat gṛham tat kṣayam yāti

original: 45.79ab/ dṛṣṭeṣu yātudhāneṣu nirdiśen marakam āśu samprāptam/
analyzed: dṛṣṭeṣu yātudhāneṣu nirdiśet marakam āśu samprāptam
pratighātāya eteṣām gargaḥ śāntim cakāra emām
mahā śāntyaḥ atha balayaḥ bhojyāni su mahānti ca
kārayeta mahendram ca ca samarcayet
narapati deśa vināśe ketoḥ udaye atha vā grahe arka indvoḥ

original: 45.82ab/ ye ca na doṣān janayanty utpātās tān ṛtu^svabhāva^kṛtān/
analyzed: ye ca na doṣān janayanti utpātāḥ tān ṛtu svabhāva kṛtān
ṛṣi putra kṛtaiḥ ślokaiḥ vidyāt etaiḥ samāsa uktaiḥ
vajra aśani mahīkampa sandhyā nirghāta niḥsvanāḥ
pariveṣa rajaḥ dhūma rakta arka astamayaka stamana audayāḥ
drumebhyaḥ anna rasa sneha bahu puṣpa phala odgamāḥ
go pakṣi mada vṛddhiḥ ca śivāya madhu mādhave
rakta padma aruṇa akaruṇam sandhyāksandhyam nabhaḥ kṣubdha arṇava aupamam

original: 45.86cd/ saritāṃ ca^ambu^saṃśoṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā grīṣme śubhaṃ vadet//
analyzed: saritām ca ambu saṃśoṣam dṛṣṭvā grīṣme śubham vadet
śakrāyudha parīveṣa vidyut śuṣka virohaṇam
kampa audvartana vaikṛtyam rasanam daraṇam kṣiteḥ
saraḥ nadī udapānānām vṛddhi ūrdhva taraṇa plavāḥ
saraṇam ca adri gehānām varṣāsu na bhaya āvaham
divya strī bhūta gandharva vimāna adbhuta darśanam
graha nakṣatra tārāṇām darśanam ca divā ambare
gīta vāditra nirghoṣāḥ vana parvata sānuṣu

original: 45.90cd/ sasya^vṛddhir apāṃ hānir apāpāḥ śaradi smṛtāḥ//
analyzed: sasya vṛddhiḥ apām hāniḥ apāpāḥ śaradi smṛtāḥ
śīta anila tuṣāra tvam nardanam mṛga pakṣiṇām
rakṣaḥ yakṣa ādi sattvānām darśanam vāc amanuṣī
diśaḥ dhūma andhakārāḥ ca sa nabhaḥ vana parvatāḥ

original: 45.92cd/ uccaiḥ sūrya^udaya^astau ca hemante śobhanāḥ smṛtāḥ//
analyzed: uccais sūrya audaya astau ca hemante śobhanāḥ smṛtāḥ
kṛṣṇa añjana ābham ākāśam tārā ulkā pāta piñjaram
citragarbha odbhavāḥ strīṣu go aja aśva mṛga pakṣiṣu
patra aṅkura latānām ca vikārāḥ śiśire śubhāḥ

original: 45.95ab/ ṛtu^svabhāva^jā hy ete dṛṣṭāḥ sva^ṛtau śubha^pradāḥ/
analyzed: ṛtu svabhāva jāḥ hi ete dṛṣṭāḥ sva ṛtau śubha pradāḥ
ṛtoḥ anyatra ca autpātāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ te ca ati dāruṇāḥ kbṛśa dāruṇāḥ

original: 45.96ab/ unmattānāṃ ca yā gāthāḥ śiśūnāṃ *yac ca bhāṣitam[K.bhāṣitaṃ ca yat]/
analyzed: unmattānām ca yāḥ gāthāḥ śiśūnām yat ca bhāṣitam

original: 45.96cd/ striyo yac ca prabhāṣante tasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ//
analyzed: striyaḥ yat ca prabhāṣante tasya na asti vyatikramaḥ
pūrvam carati deveṣu paścāt caratikgacchati mānuṣān

original: 45.97cd/ na^acoditā vāg vadati satyā hy eṣā sarasvatī//
analyzed: na a coditā vāc vadati satyā hi eṣā sarasvatī
utpātān gaṇita vivarjitaḥ api buddhvā
vikhyātaḥ bhavati narendra vallabhaḥ ca
etat tat muni vacanam rahasyam uktam
yat jñātvā bhavati naraḥ tri kāla darśī
mayūracitraka adhyāyaḥ

original: 46.01ab/ divya^āntarikṣa^āśrayam uktam ādau mayā phalaṃ śastam aśobhanaṃ ca/
analyzed: divya āntarikṣa āśrayam uktam ādau mayā phalam śastam aśobhanam ca

original: 46.01cd/ prāyeṇa cāreṣu samāgameṣu yuddheṣu mārga^ādiṣu vistareṇa//
analyzed: prāyeṇa cāreṣu samāgameṣu yuddheṣu mārga ādiṣu vistareṇa
bhūyas varāhamihirasya na yuktam etat

original: 46.02b kartuṃ samāsakṛd asav iti tasya doṣaḥ/
analyzed: kartum samāsakṛt asau iti tasya doṣaḥ
tad jñaiḥ na vācyam idam ukta phala anugī iti
yat barhikvarhicitrakam iti prathitam varāṅgam

original: 46.03cd/ bravīmy ahaṃ na ced idaṃ tathā +api me +atra vācyatā//
analyzed: bravīmi aham na ced idam tathā api me atra vācya tā
uttara vīthi gatāḥ dyutimantaḥ samastāḥ
dakṣiṇa mārga gatāḥ dyuti hīnāḥ kṣudh bhaya taskara mṛtyu karāḥ te

original: 46.05ab/ koṣṭhāgāra^gate bhṛgu^putre puṣyasthe ca girām prabhaviṣṇau/
analyzed: koṣṭhāgāra gate bhṛguputre puṣya sthe ca girām prabhaviṣṇau

original: 46.05cd/ nirvairāḥ kṣitipāḥ sukhabhājaḥ saṃhṛṣṭāś ca janā gatarogāḥ//
analyzed: nirvairāḥ kṣitipāḥ sukha bhājaḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ ca janāḥ gata rogāḥ

original: 46.06ab/ pīḍayanti yadi kṛttikāṃ maghāṃ rohiṇīṃ śravam aindram eva vā/
analyzed: pīḍayanti yadi kṛttikām maghām rohiṇīm śravam aindram eva vā

original: 46.06cd/ projjhya sūryam apare grahās tadā paścimā dig anayena pīḍyate//
analyzed: projjhya sūryam apare grahāḥ tadā paścimā diś anayena pīḍyate
prācyām ced dhvaja vat avasthitā dina ante
prācyānām bhavati hi vigrahaḥ nṛpāṇām
madhye ced bhavati hi madhyadeśa pīṭha ākūpīḍā
rūkṣaiḥ taiḥ na tu ruciman kruciraiḥ mayūkhavadbhiḥ

original: 46.08ab/ dakṣiṇāṃ kakubham *āśritas[K.āśritais] tu tair dakṣiṇāpathapayomucāṃ kṣayaḥ/
analyzed: dakṣiṇām kakubham tu taiḥ dakṣiṇāpatha payomucām kṣayaḥ
hīna rūkṣa tanubhiḥ ca vigrahaḥ sthūla deha kiraṇa anvitaiḥ śubham

original: 46.09ab/ uttaramārge spaṣṭa^mayūkhāḥ śāntikarās te tan nṛpatīnām/
analyzed: uttara mārge spaṣṭa mayūkhāḥ śānti karāḥ te tat nṛpatīnām
hrasva śarīrāḥ bhasma savarṇāḥ doṣa karāḥ syuḥ deśa nṛpāṇām
nakṣatrāṇām tārakāḥ sa grahāṇām
dhūma jvālā visphuliṅga anvitāḥ ced
ālokam vā nirnimittam na yānti
yāti dhvaṃsam sarva lokaḥ sa bhūpaḥ
divi bhāti yadā tuhina aṃśu yugam
dvija vṛddhiḥ atīva tadā āśu śubhā
tad anantara varṇa raṇaḥ arka yuge
jagataḥ pralayaḥ tri catuṣprabhṛti

original: 46.12a munīn abhijitaṃ dhruvaṃ maghavataś ca bhaṃ saṃspṛśan
analyzed: munīn abhijitam dhruvam maghavataḥ ca bham saṃspṛśan
atha saṃspṛśet bhavati vṛṣṭi nāśaḥ dhruvam

original: 46.12d kṣayaṃ vrajati vidruto janapadaś ca bālākulaḥ//
analyzed: kṣayam vrajati vidrutaḥ janapadaḥ ca bāla ākulaḥ

original: 46.13ab/ prāgdvāreṣu caran raviputro nakṣatreṣu karoti ca vakram/

analyzed: sarvāḥ tvām abhiṣiñcantu divyāḥ ca apsarasām gaṇāḥ

original: 47.59cd/ saṃvatsarā dineśāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kṣaṇā lavā/
analyzed: saṃvatsarāḥ dina īśāḥ ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kṣaṇāḥ lavāḥ

original: 47.62ab/ saritaś ca mahābhāgā nāgāḥ kiṃpuruṣāś tathā/

original: 47.62cd/ vaikhānasā mahābhāgā dvijā vaihāyasāś ca ye//
analyzed: vaikhānasāḥ mahābhāgāḥ dvijāḥ vaihāyasāḥ ca ye

original: 47.63ab/ saptarṣayaḥ sadārāś ca dhruvasthānāni yāni ca/

original: 47.63cd/ marīcir atriḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kratur aṅgirāḥ//
analyzed: marīciḥ atriḥ pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ kratuḥ aṅgirāḥ

original: 47.64cd/ sanātanaś ca dakṣaś ca jaigīṣavyo bhagandaraḥ//
analyzed: sanātanaḥ ca dakṣaḥ ca jaigīṣavyaḥ bhagandaraḥ

original: 47.65ab/ ekataś ca dvitaś ca^eva trito jābālikaśyapau/
analyzed: ekataḥ ca dvitaḥ ca eva tritaḥ jābāli kaśyapau

original: 47.65cd/ durvāsā durvinītaś ca kaṇvaḥ kātyāyanas tathā//
analyzed: durvāsāḥ durvinītaḥ ca kaṇvaḥ kātyāyanaḥ tathā
ūrdhvaḥ saṃvartakaḥ ca eva cyavanaḥ atriḥ parāśaraḥ

original: 47.67cd/ parvatās taravo vallyaḥ puṇyāny āyatanāni ca//
analyzed: parvatāḥ taravaḥ vallyaḥ puṇyāni āyatanāni ca

original: 47.68ab/ prajāpatir ditiś ca^eva gāvo viśvasya mātaraḥ/
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ ditiḥ ca eva gāvaḥ viśvasya mātaraḥ

original: 47.69ab/ agnayaḥ pitaras tārā jīmūtāḥ khaṃ diśo jalam/

ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ puṇya saṅkīrtanāḥ śubhaiḥ kśubhāḥ

original: 47.70cd/ *yathābhiṣikto maghavān etair mudita^manasaiḥ[K.kalyāṇam te prakurvantu āyurārogyam eva ca]//
analyzed: yathā abhiṣiktaḥ maghavān etaiḥ mudita manasaiḥ kkalyāṇam te prakurvantu āyuḥ ārogyam eva ca

original: 47.71ab/ ity etaiś cānyaiś ca^apy atharvakalpa^*āhitaiḥ[K.vihitaiḥ] sarudragaṇaiḥ/
analyzed: iti etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca api atharva kalpa āhitaiḥ ku ihitaiḥ sa rudra gaṇaiḥ
kauṣmāṇḍa mahārauhiṇa kubera hṛdyaiḥ samṛddhyā ca

chatra dhvaja āyudhāni ca tatas sva pūjām prayuñjīta
āyuṣyam varcasyam rāyaspoṣābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ etābhiḥ
parijaptam vaijayikam navam vidadhyāt alaṅkāram

original: 47.75ab/ gatvā dvitīyavedīṃ samupaviśec carmaṇāṃ upari rājā/
analyzed: gatvā dvitīya vedīm samupaviśet carmaṇām upari rājā

original: 47.75cd/ deyāni ca^eva carmāṇy uparyupary evam etāni//
analyzed: deyāni ca eva carmāṇi upari upari evam etāni

original: 47.76ab/ vṛṣasya vṛṣadaṃśasya ruroś ca pṛṣatasya ca/
analyzed: vṛṣasya vṛṣadaṃśasya ruroḥ ca pṛṣatasya ca

original: 47.76cd/ teṣām upari siṃhasya vyāghrasya ca tataḥ param//
analyzed: teṣām upari siṃhasya vyāghrasya ca tatas param

indra dhvaja nirdiṣṭāni agni nimittāni daiva vid brūyāt

original: 47.79ab/ yāntu devagaṇāḥ sarve pūjām ādāya pārthivāt/

original: 47.80ab/ nṛpatir ato daivajñaṃ purohitaṃ ca^arcayed dhanair bahubhiḥ/
analyzed: nṛpatiḥ atas daiva jñam purohitam ca arcayet dhanaiḥ bahubhiḥ
anyān ca dakṣiṇīyān śrotriya prabhṛtīn
dattvā abhayam prajānām āghāta sthāna gān visṛjya paśūn
etat prayujyamānam pratipuṣyam sukha yaśaḥ artha vṛddhi karam
rāṣṭra autpāta aupasargeṣu rāhoḥ ketoḥ ca darśane
graha avamardane ca eva puṣya snānam samācaret

original: 47.84ab/ nāsti loke sa utpāto yo hy anena na śāmyati/
analyzed: na asti loke saḥ utpātaḥ yaḥ hi anena na śāmyati

original: 47.84cd/ maṅgalaṃ cāparaṃ nāsti yad asmād atiricyate//
analyzed: maṅgalam ca aparam na asti yat asmāt atiricyate

original: 47.85cd/ tatpūrvam abhiṣeke ca vidhir eṣa praśasyate//
analyzed: tad pūrvam abhiṣeke ca vidhiḥ eṣa praśasyate

anena eva vidhānena hasti aśvam snāpayet yaḥ

original: 48.01ab/ vistaraśo nirdiṣṭaṃ paṭṭāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yad ācāryaiḥ/
analyzed: vistaraśaḥ nirdiṣṭam paṭṭāṇām lakṣaṇam yat ācāryaiḥ

original: 48.02ab/ paṭṭaḥ śubhado rājṇāṃ madhye +aṣṭāv aṅgulāni vistīrṇaḥ/
analyzed: paṭṭaḥ śubha daḥ rājṇām madhye aṣṭau aṅgulāni vistīrṇaḥ
sapta narendra mahiṣyāḥ ṣaṣ yuvarājasya nirdiṣṭaḥ
catur aṅgula vistāraḥ paṭṭaḥ senāpateḥ bhavati madhye

original: 48.03cd/ dve ca prasādapaṭṭaḥ pañcaite kīrtitāḥ paṭṭāḥ//
analyzed: dve ca prasāda paṭṭaḥ pañca ete kīrtitāḥ paṭṭāḥ
sarve dviguṇa āyāmāḥ madhyāt ardhena pārśva vistīrṇāḥ
sarve ca śuddha kāñcana vinirmitāḥ śreyasaḥ vṛddhyai
pañcaśikhaḥ bhūmipateḥ triśikhaḥ yuvarāja pārthiva mahiṣyoḥ
eka śikhaḥ sainya pateḥ prasāda paṭṭaḥ vinā śikhayā

original: 48.06ab/ kriyamāṇaṃ yadi patraṃ sukhena vistāram eti paṭṭasya/
analyzed: kriyamāṇam yadi patram sukhena vistāram eti paṭṭasya

original: 48.06cd/ vṛddhijayau bhūmipates tathā prajānāṃ ca sukhasampat//
analyzed: vṛddhi jayau bhūmipateḥ tathā prajānām ca sukha sampad

original: 48.07cd/ madhye sphuṭitas tyājyo vighnakaraḥ pārśvayoḥ sphuṭitaḥ//
analyzed: madhye sphuṭitaḥ tyājyaḥ vighna karaḥ pārśvayoḥ sphuṭitaḥ
śasta nimittaḥ paṭṭaḥ nṛpa rāṣṭra vivṛddhaye bhavati
khaḍga lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
aṅgula śata ardham uttamaḥ ūnaḥ syāt pañcaviṃśatiḥ kpañcaviṃśatim khaḍgaḥ
aṅgula mānāt jñeyaḥ vraṇaḥ aśubhaḥ viṣama parva sthaḥ
śrīvṛkṣa vardhamāna ātapatra śiva liṅga kuṇḍala abjānām
sadṛśāḥ vraṇāḥ praśastāḥ dhvaja āyudha svastikānām ca
kṛkalāsa kāka kaṅka kravyāda kabandha vṛścika ākṛtayaḥ

original: 49.03cd/ khaḍge vraṇā na śubhadā vaṃśānugatāḥ prabhūtāś ca//
analyzed: khaḍge vraṇāḥ na śubha dāḥ vaṃśa anugatāḥ prabhūtāḥ ca

original: 49.04ab/ sphuṭito hrasvaḥ kuṇṭho vaṃśacchinno na dṛg^mano +anugataḥ/

original: 49.05cd/ svayam udgīrṇe yuddhaṃ jvalite vijayo bhavati khaḍge//

analyzed: deśam na ca asya kathayet pratimānayet na

original: 49.08ab/ niṣpanno na chedyo nikaṣaiḥ kāryaḥ pramāṇayuktaḥ saḥ/
analyzed: niṣpannaḥ na chedyaḥ nikaṣaiḥ kāryaḥ pramāṇa yuktaḥ saḥ

original: 49.08cd/ mūle mriyate svāmī jananī tasyāgrataś chinne//
analyzed: mūle mriyate svāmī jananī tasya agratas chinne

original: 49.09ab/ yasmin tsarupradeśe vraṇo bhavet tadvad eva khaḍgasya/

original: 49.09cd/ vanitānām iva tilako guhye vācyo mukhe dṛṣṭvā//

original: 49.10ab/ atha vā spṛśati yadaṅgaṃ praṣṭā nistriṃśabhṛt tadavadhārya/

original: 49.11cd/ bhrūmadhye ca tṛtīye netre spṛṣṭe catruthe ca//
analyzed: bhrū madhye ca tṛtīye netre spṛṣṭe catruthe ca

original: 49.14ab/ ūrvor dvāviṃśe syād ūrvor madhye vraṇas trayoviṃśe/
analyzed: ūrvoḥ dvāviṃśe syāt ūrvoḥ madhye vraṇaḥ trayoviṃśe

analyzed: jānuni ca caturviṃśe jaṅghāyām pañcaviṃśe ca

original: 49.15ab/ jaṅghāmadhye gulphe pārṣṇyāṃ pāde tadaṅgulīṣv api ca/
analyzed: jaṅghā madhye gulphe pārṣṇyām pāde tad aṅgulīṣu api ca

original: 49.15cd/ ṣaḍviṃśatikād yāvat triṃśad iti matena gargasya//

original: 49.16ab/ putramaraṇaṃ dhanāptir dhanahāniḥ sampadaś ca bandhaś ca/

original: 49.19cd/ aiśvarya^mṛtyu^rājyāni ca kramāt triṃśad iti yāvat//
analyzed: aiśvarya mṛtyu rājyāni ca kramāt triṃśat iti yāvat

original: 49.20ab/ parato na viśeṣaphalaṃ viṣamasamasthās tu pāpaśubhaphaladāḥ/
analyzed: paratas na viśeṣa phalam viṣama sama sthāḥ tu pāpa śubha phala dāḥ

original: 49.20cd/ kaiś cid aphalāḥ pradiṣṭās triṃśatparato +agram iti yāvat//
analyzed: kaiḥ cit aphalāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ triṃśat paratas agram iti yāvat
śubha daḥ aniṣṭaḥ go mūtra paṅka medaḥ sadṛśa gandhaḥ
kūrma vasā asṛj kṣāra aupamaḥ ca bhaya duḥkha daḥ bhavati gandhaḥ
idam auśanasam ca śastra pānam
rudhireṇa śriyam icchataḥ pradīptām
haviṣā guṇavat suta abhilipsoḥ
salilena akṣayam icchataḥ ca vittam
vaḍavā uṣṭraka reṇu dugdha pānam
yadi pāpena samīhate artha siddhim
sa tāla garbhaiḥ
ārkam payaḥ huḍuviṣāṇa maṣi sametam
pārāvata ākhu śakṛtā ca yutaḥkyutam pralepaḥ
śastrasya taila mathitasya tatas asya pānam
paścāt śitasya na śilāsu bhavet vighātaḥ
kṣāre kadalyā mathitena yukte
dina uṣite pāyitam āyasam yat
samyak śitam ca aśmani na eti bhaṅgam
na ca anya loheṣu api tasya kauṇṭhyam
aṅgavidyā adhyāya
daivajñena śubha aśubham diś udita sthāna āhṛtān īkṣatā
vācyam praṣṭṛ nija apara aṅga ghaṭanām ca ālokya kālam dhiyā
sarvajñaḥ hi cara acara ātmaka tayā asau sarva darśaḥ vibhuḥ
ceṣṭā vyāhṛtibhiḥ śubha aśubha phalam sandarśayati arthinām
sthānam puṣpa su hāsi bhūri phala bhṛt su snigdha kṛtticchada
asat pakṣi cyuta śasta saṃjñita taru chāyā upagūḍham samam
sat svādu udaka nirmala tva janita āhlādam ca
chinna bhinna kṛmi khāta kaṇṭaki pluṣṭa rūkṣa kuṭilaiḥ na sat kujaiḥ
krūra pakṣi yuta nindya nāmabhiḥ śuṣka śīrṇa bahu parṇa carmabhiḥ kvarmabhiḥ
śmaśāna śūnya āyatanam catuṣpatham
tathā amanojñam viṣamam sat aūṣaram
avaskara aṅgāra kapāla bhasmabhiḥ
citam tuṣaiḥ śuṣka tṛṇaiḥ na śobhanam
pravrajita nagna nāpita ripu bandhana saunikaiḥ ksūnikaiḥ tathā śvapacaiḥ
kitava yati pīḍitaiḥ yutam āyudha mādhvīka vikrayaiḥ na śubham
prāc uttara īśāḥ ca diśaḥ praśastāḥ
praṣṭuḥ na vāyu ambu yama agni rakṣaḥ
pūrvāhna kāle asti śubham na rātrau
sandhyā dvaye praśna kṛtaḥ aparāhṇe
yātrā vidhāne hi śubha aśubham yat
proktam nimittam tat iha api vācyam
dṛṣṭvā puras vā janatā hṛtam vā
praṣṭuḥ sthitam pāṇi tale atha vastre
atha aṅgāni ūru oṣṭha stana vṛṣaṇa pādam ca daśanā

original: 50.08b bhujau hastau gaṇḍau kaca^gala^nakha^aṅguṣṭham api yat/
analyzed: bhujau hastau gaṇḍau kaca gala nakha aṅguṣṭham api yat

jihvā grīvā piṇḍike pārṣṇi yugmam
jaṅghe nābhiḥ karṇa pālī kṛkāṭī
vaktram pṛṣṭham jatru jānu asthi pārśvam
hṛd tālu akṣī mehana aurastrikam ca

original: 50.10ab/ napuṃsaka^ākhyaṃ ca śiro lalāṭam āśv ādya^saṃjñair aparaiś cireṇa/
analyzed: napuṃsaka ākhyam ca śiraḥ lalāṭam āśu ādya saṃjñaiḥ aparaiḥ cireṇa

original: 50.10cd/ siddhir bhavej jātu napuṃsakair no rūkṣa^kṣatair bhagna^kṛśaiś ca pūrvaiḥ//
analyzed: siddhiḥ bhavet jātu napuṃsakaiḥ no rūkṣa kṣataiḥ bhagna kṛśaiḥ ca pūrvaiḥ

original: 50.11ab/ spṛṣṭe vā cālite vā^api pāda^aṅguṣṭhe +akṣi^rug bhavet/
analyzed: spṛṣṭe vā cālite vā api pāda aṅguṣṭhe akṣi ruj bhavet

original: 50.11cd/ aṅgulyāṃ duhituḥ śokaṃ śiroghāte nṛpād bhayam//

original: 50.12ab/ viprayogam urasi svagātrataḥ karpaṭāhṛtir anarthadā bhavet/
analyzed: viprayogam urasi sva gātrataḥ karpaṭa āhṛtiḥ anartha dā bhavet

original: 50.12cd/ syāt priyāptir abhigṛhya karpaṭaṃ pṛcchataś caraṇapādayojituḥ//
analyzed: syāt priya āptiḥ abhigṛhya karpaṭam pṛcchataḥ caraṇa pāda yojituḥ

original: 50.13cd/ hastena pādau kaṇḍūyet tasya *dāsīmayī[K.dāsīmayā] ca sā//
analyzed: hastena pādau kaṇḍūyet tasya ca sā

original: 50.14cd/ vyādhir āśrayati rajju^jālakaṃ valkalaṃ ca samavekṣya bandhanam//
analyzed: vyādhiḥ āśrayati rajju jālakam valkalam ca samavekṣya bandhanam
strī puruṣa doṣa pīḍita sarva arthaka dhva suta artha dhānya tanayānām
dvi catuṣpada kṣitīnām vināśataḥ kīrtitaiḥ dṛṣṭaiḥ

original: 52.119ab/ rātrau kṛtabalipūjaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ chedayed divā vṛkṣam/

analyzed: meghodbhavam prathamam eva mayā pradiṣṭam jyeṣṭhām atītya baladeva mata ādi dṛṣṭvā

original: K.54.125cd/ bhaumaṃ dagārgalam idaṃ kathitaṃ dvitīyaṃ samyag varāhamihireṇa muniprasādāt//]

original: 54.02ab/ mṛdvī bhūḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ hitā tasyām tilān vapet/

original: 54.02cd/ puṣpitāṃs tāṃś ca mṛdnīyāt[K.gṛhṇīyāt] karma^etat prathamaṃ bhuvaḥ[K.bhuvi]//
analyzed: puṣpitān tān ca mṛdnīyāt kgṛhṇīyāt karma etat prathamam bhuvaḥ k bhuvi

original: 54.03cd/ maṅgalyāḥ pūrvam ārāme ropaṇīyā gṛheṣu vā//
analyzed: maṅgalyāḥ pūrvam ārāme ropaṇīyāḥ gṛheṣu vā

ajāta śākhān śiśire jāta śākhān hima āgame
varṣā āgame ca su skandhān yathā diś sthān praropayet kyathā diś pratiropayet

ā mūla skandha liptānām saṃkrāmaṇa viropaṇam

original: 54.08ab/ śucir bhūtvā taroḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā snāna^anulepanaiḥ/

original: 54.08cd/ ropayed ropitaś ca^eva patrais tair eva jāyate//

original: 54.09cd/ varṣāsu ca bhuvaḥ śoṣe sektavyā ropitā drumāḥ//
analyzed: varṣāsu ca bhuvaḥ śoṣe sektavyāḥ ropitāḥ drumāḥ

original: 54.11ab/ vañjulo naktamālaś ca tilakaḥ panasas tathā/
analyzed: vañjulaḥ naktamālaḥ ca tilakaḥ panasaḥ tathā
timiraḥ amrātakaḥ ṣoḍaśa anūpa jāḥ smṛtāḥ

sthānāt sthāna antaram kāryam vṛkṣāṇām dvādaśa avaram

original: 54.13cd/ miśrair mūlaiś ca na phalaṃ samyag yacchanti pīḍitāḥ//
analyzed: miśraiḥ mūlaiḥ ca na phalam samyak yacchanti pīḍitāḥ
avṛddhiḥ ca pravālānām uprabālānām śākhā śoṣaḥ rasa srutiḥ

original: 54.16ab/ phala^nāśe kulatthaiś ca māṣair mudgais tilair yavaiḥ/
analyzed: phala nāśe kulatthaiḥ ca māṣaiḥ mudgaiḥ tilaiḥ yavaiḥ
śṛta śīta payaḥ sekaḥ phala puṣpa samṛddhaye ika abhivṛddhaye
avikā aja śakṛt cūrṇasya āḍhake dve tila āḍhakam
saktu prasthaḥ jala droṇaḥ go māṃsa tulayā saha
sapta rātra uṣitaiḥ etaiḥ sekaḥ kāryaḥ vanaspateḥ
valmī gulma latānām ca phala puṣpāya sarvadā
vāsarāṇi daśa dugdha bhāvitam
bījam ājya yuta hasta yojitam
gomayena bahuśas virūkṣitam
krauḍamārga piśitaiḥ ca dhūpitam

kṣīra saṃyuta jala avasecitam jāyate kusuma yuktam eva tat

original: 54.21cd/ pūtimāṃsa^sahitaiś ca secitā dhūpitā ca satataṃ haridrayā//
analyzed: pūti māṃsa sahitaiḥ ca secitā dhūpitā ca satatam haridrayā
kapittha vallī karaṇāya mūlāni
āsphota dhātrī dhava vāsikānām
śyāma atimuktaiḥ sahita aṣṭamūlī

dine dine śoṣitam arka pādaiḥ
māsam vidhiḥ tu eṣa tatas adhiropyam
hasta āyatam tad dviguṇam gabhīram
khātvā avaṭam prokta jala avapūrṇam
śuṣkam pradagdham madhu sarpiṣā tat
pralepayet bhasma samanvita nakū samanvitena
cūrṇīkṛtaiḥ māṣa tilaiḥ yavaiḥ ca
prapūrayet mṛttikayā antara sthaiḥ
matsya āmiṣa ambhas skambhaḥ sahitam ca hanyāt
yāvat ghana tvam samupāgatam tat
uptam ca bījam catur aṅgula adhas
matsya ambhasā māṃsa jalaiḥ ca siktam
vallī bhavati āśu śubha pravālā
vismāpanī maṇḍapam āvṛṇoti
śataśas aṅkola kaṅkolla sambhūta phala kalkena bhāvitam

original: 54.27cd/ etat tailena vā bījaṃ ślaiṣmātaka[K.ū.śleṣmātaka]^phalena vā//
analyzed: etat tailena vā bījam ślaiṣmātaka kūśleṣmātaka phalena vā
vāpitam karaka aunmiśra mṛdi tad kṣaṇa janmakam

śleṣmātakasya bījāni niṣkulīkṛtya bhāvayet prājñaḥ

original: 54.30ab/ māhiṣa^gomaya^ghṛṣṭāny asya karīṣe ca tāni nikṣipya/

original: 55.01ab/ kṛtvā prabhūtaṃ salilam ārāmān viniveśya ca/

original: 55.02ab/ iṣṭā^pūrtena labhyante ye lokās tān bubhūṣatā/

original: 55.02cd/ devānām ālayaḥ kāryo dvayam api atra dṛśyate//

haṃsa kāraṇḍava krauñca cakravāka virāviṣu

nadyaḥ toya aṃśukāḥ yatra śapharīkṛta mekhalāḥ

original: 55.09cd/ tā eva teṣāṃ śasyante devatā^āyataneṣv api//

original: 55.10cd/ dvāraṃ ca madhyamaṃ tasmin[K.tatra] samadiksthaṃ praśasyate//

original: 55.11ab/ yo vistāro bhaved yasya dviguṇā tatsamunnatiḥ/

tri pañca sapta navabhiḥ śākhābhiḥ tat praśasyate

analyzed: dvau bhāgau pratimā tatra tṛtīya aṃśaḥ ca piṇḍikā

analyzed: avatāryaḥ asya ca kalkaḥ dravyaiḥ etaiḥ samanuyojyaḥ

original: 57.09ab/ ardha^aṅgulā tu gocchā vaktraṃ catur^aṅgula^āyataṃ kāryam/

original: 57.09cd/ vipulaṃ tu sa^ardham aṅgulam *avyāttaṃ try^aṅgulaṃ[K.adhyāttattryaṅgulaṃ] vyāttam//

original: 57.10cd/ syād dvy^aṅgulam ucchrāyaś catur^aṅgulam antaraṃ ca^akṣṇoḥ//
analyzed: syāt dvi aṅgulam ucchrāyaḥ catur aṅgulam antaram

original: 57.12ab/ paryantāt paryantaṃ daśa bhruvo +ardha^aṅgulaṃ bhruvor lekhā/

original: 57.14cd/ dvādaśa tu citra^karmaṇi dṛśyante viṃśatir adṛśyāḥ//
