original: 57.15cd/ grīvā daśa vistīrṇā pariṇāhād viṃśatiḥ sa^ekā//
analyzed: grīvā daśa vistīrṇā pariṇāhāt viṃśatiḥ sa ekā

original: 57.16ab/ kaṇṭhād dvādaśa hṛdayaṃ hṛdayān nābhī[K.nābhiś] ca tat^pramāṇena/
analyzed: kaṇṭhāt dvādaśa hṛdayam hṛdayāt ca tad pramāṇena
nābhī madhyāt meḍhra antaram ca tat tulyam eva uktam

original: 57.17ab/ ūrū ca^aṅgula^mānaiś catur^yutā viṃśatis tathā jaṅghe/
analyzed: ūrū ca aṅgula mānaiḥ catur yutā viṃśatiḥ tathā jaṅghe

original: 57.17cd/ jānukapicche catur^aṅgule ca pādau ca tat^tulyau//
analyzed: jānu kapi che catur aṅgule ca pādau ca tad tulyau

original: 57.18ab/ dvādaśa^dīrghau ṣaṭ pṛthutayā ca pādau trika^āyata^aṅguṣṭhau/
analyzed: dvādaśa dīrghau ṣaṭ pṛthu tayā ca pādau trika āyata aṅguṣṭhau
pañca aṅgula pariṇāhau pradeśinī tri aṅgulam dīrghā
aṣṭa aṃśa aṃśa ūnāḥ śeṣa aṅgulyaḥ śeṣa aṅgulayaḥ krameṇa kartavyāḥ
sa caturtha bhāgam aṅgulam utsedhaḥ aṅguṣṭhakasya auktaḥ
aṅguṣṭha nakhaḥ kathitaḥ caturtha bhāga ūnam aṅgulam tad jñaiḥ
śeṣa nakhānām ardha aṅgulam kramāt kiṃcid ūnam vā

original: 57.21ab/ jaṅgha^agre pariṇāhaś caturdaśa^uktas tu vistarāt[K.vistaraḥ] pañca/
analyzed: jaṅgha agre pariṇāhaḥ caturdaśa uktaḥ tu vistarāt kvistaraḥ pañca

original: 57.21cd/ madhye tu sapta vipulā pariṇāhāt triguṇitāḥ sapta//
analyzed: madhye tu sapta vipulā pariṇāhāt tri guṇitāḥ sapta

original: 57.22ab/ aṣṭau tu jānumadhye vaipulyaṃ try^aṣṭakaṃ tu pariṇāhaḥ/
analyzed: aṣṭau tu jānu madhye vaipulyam tri aṣṭakam tu pariṇāhaḥ

original: 57.22cd/ vipulau caturdaśa^ūrū madhye dviguṇaś ca tat^paridhiḥ//
analyzed: vipulau caturdaśa ūrū madhye dviguṇaḥ ca tad paridhiḥ

original: 57.23ab/ kaṭir aṣṭādaśa vipulā catvāriṃśac catur^yutā paridhau/
analyzed: kaṭiḥ aṣṭādaśa vipulā catvāriṃśat catur yutā paridhau

original: 57.23cd/ aṅgulam ekaṃ nābhī[K.nābhir] vedhena tathā pramāṇena//
analyzed: aṅgulam ekam vedhena tathā pramāṇena
catvāriṃśat dvi yutā nābhī madhyena madhya pariṇāhaḥ

original: 57.24cd/ stanayoḥ ṣoḍaśa ca^antaram ūrdhvaṃ kakṣye[K.kakṣe] ṣaḍ^aṅgulike//
analyzed: stanayoḥ ṣoḍaśa ca antaram ūrdhvam kakṣi ikkakṣe ṣaṣ aṅgulike

original: 57.25ab/ *aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū kāryau[K.kāryāv aṣṭāv aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū] tathā prabāhū ca/
analyzed: aṣṭau aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū aṣṭau aṃsau dvādaśa bāhū tathā prabāhū ca
bāhū ṣaṣ vistīrṇau kṣaṣ vistirṇau pratibāhū tu aṅgula catuṣkam

original: 57.26ab/ ṣoḍaśa bāhū mūle pariṇāhād dvādaśa^agra^haste ca/
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa bāhū mūle pariṇāhāt dvādaśa agra haste ca
vistāreṇa kara talam ṣaṣ aṅgulam sapta dairghyeṇa
pañca aṅgulāni madhyā pradeśinī madhya parva dala hīnā

original: 57.27cd/ anayā tulyā ca^anāmikā kaniṣṭhā tu parva^ūnā//
analyzed: anayā tulyā ca anāmikā kaniṣṭhā tu parva ūnā

original: 57.28ab/ parva^dvayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ śeṣa^aṅgulyas[K.śeṣāṅgulayas] tribhis tribhiḥ kāryāḥ/
analyzed: parva dvayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ kāryāḥ
nakha parimāṇam kāryam sarvāsām parvaṇaḥ ardhena
deśa anurūpa bhūṣaṇa veṣa alaṅkāra mūrtibhiḥ kāryā
pratimā lakṣaṇa yuktā sannihitā vṛddhi dā bhavati

original: 57.30ab/ daśaratha^tanayo rāmo baliś ca vairocaniḥ śataṃ viṃśam/
analyzed: daśaratha tanayaḥ rāmaḥ baliḥ ca vairocaniḥ śatam viṃśam
dvādaśa hānyā śeṣāḥ pravara sama nyūna parimāṇāḥ

original: 57.31ab/ kāryo +aṣṭabhujo bhagavāṃś catur^bhujo dvibhuja eva vā viṣṇuḥ/
analyzed: kāryaḥ aṣṭa bhujaḥ bhagavān catur bhujaḥ dvi bhujaḥ eva vā viṣṇuḥ
atasī kusuma śyāmaḥ pīta ambara nivasanaḥ prasanna mukhaḥ
khaḍga gadā śara pāṇiḥ dakṣiṇatas śānti daḥ caturtha karaḥ
vāma kareṣu ca kārmuka kheṭaka cakrāṇi śaṅkhaḥ ca

original: 57.34ab/ atha ca caturbhujam icchati śāntida eko gadā^dharaś ca^anyaḥ/
analyzed: atha ca caturbhujam icchati śāntidaḥ ekaḥ gadādharaḥ ca anyaḥ

original: 57.34cd/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve tv[K.hy] evaṃ vāme śaṅkhaś ca cakraṃ ca//
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pārśve evam vāme śaṅkhaḥ ca cakram ca

original: 57.35ab/ dvibhujasya tu śānti^karo dakṣiṇa^hasto +aparaś ca śaṅkha^dharaḥ/
analyzed: dvi bhujasya tu śānti karaḥ dakṣiṇa hastaḥ aparaḥ ca śaṅkha dharaḥ

original: 57.35cd/ evaṃ viṣṇoḥ pratimā kartavyā bhūtim icchadbhiḥ//
analyzed: evam viṣṇoḥ pratimā kartavyā bhūtim icchadbhiḥ
baladevaḥ hala pāṇiḥ mada vibhrama locanaḥ ca kartavyaḥ
vibhrat kbibhrat kuṇḍalam ekam śaṅkha aindu mṛṇāla gaura tanuḥ kvapuḥ
ekānaṃśā kāryā devī baladeva kṛṣṇayoḥ madhye
kaṭi saṃsthita vāma karā sarojam itareṇa ca audvahatī

original: 57.38ab/ kāryā caturbhujā yā vāma^karābhyāṃ sa^pustakaṃ kamalam/
analyzed: kāryā catur bhujā yā vāma karābhyām sa pustakam kamalam

original: 57.38cd/ dvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇa^pārśve varam arthiṣv akṣa^sūtraṃ ca//
analyzed: dvābhyām dakṣiṇa pārśve varam arthiṣu akṣa sūtram ca

original: 57.39ab/ *vāmo +atha vā^aṣṭa^bhujāyāḥ[K.vāmeṣv aṣṭabhujāyāḥ] kamaṇḍaluś cāpam ambujaṃ śāstram/
analyzed: vāmaḥ atha vā aṣṭa bhujāyāḥ kvāmeṣu aṣṭa bhujāyāḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ cāpam ambujam śāstram
vara śara darpaṇa yuktāḥ savya bhujāḥ sa akṣasūtrāḥ ca

original: 57.40ab/ śāmbaś ca gadā^hastaḥ pradyumnaś cāpa^bhṛt surūpaś ca/
analyzed: śāmbaḥ ca gadā hastaḥ pradyumnaḥ cāpa bhṛt surūpaḥ ca
anayoḥ striyau ca kārye kheṭaka nistriṃśa dhāriṇyau
brahmā kamaṇḍalu karaḥ catur mukhaḥ paṇkaja āsana sthaḥ ca
skandaḥ kumārarūpaḥ śaktidharaḥ barhiketuḥ ca
śukla catur viṣāṇaḥ dvipaḥ mahā indrasya vajrapāṇi tvam

original: 57.42cd/ tiryag lalāṭa^saṃsthaṃ tṛtīyam api locanaṃ cihnam//
analyzed: tiryak lalāṭa saṃstham tṛtīyam api locanam cihnam

original: 57.43ab/ śambhoḥ śirasi^indukalā vṛṣa^dhvajo +akṣi ca tṛtīyam api ca^ūrdhvam/
analyzed: śambhoḥ śirasi indu kalā vṛṣadhvajaḥ akṣi ca tṛtīyam api ca ūrdhvam

original: 57.43cd/ śūlaṃ dhanuḥ pinākaṃ vāma^ardhe vā girisutā^ardham//
analyzed: śūlam dhanuḥ pinākam vāma ardhe vā girisutā ardham
padma aṅkita kara caraṇaḥ prasanna mūrtiḥ su nīca keśaḥ ca
padmāsana upaviṣṭaḥ pitā iva jagataḥ buddhaḥ
ājānu lamba bāhuḥ śrīvatsa aṅkaḥ praśānta mūrtiḥ ca

original: 57.45cd/ dig^vāsās taruṇo rūpavāṃś ca kāryo +arhatāṃ devaḥ//
analyzed: digvāsāḥ taruṇaḥ rūpavān ca kāryaḥ arhatām devaḥ
nāsā lalāṭa jaṅgha ūru gaṇḍa vakṣāṃsi ca aunnatāni raveḥ

original: 57.46cd/ kuryād udīcya^veṣaṃ gūḍhaṃ pādād uro yāvat//
analyzed: kuryāt udīcya veṣam gūḍham pādāt uraḥ yāvat
bibhrāṇaḥ sva kararuhe bāhubhyām pāṇibhyām paṅkaje mukuṭa dhārī
kuṇḍala bhūṣita vadanaḥ pralamba hāraḥ viyaṅga vṛtaḥ
ratna ojjvala prabhā maṇḍalaḥ ca kartuḥ śubha karaḥ arkaḥ

original: 57.49ab/ saumyā tu hasta^mātrā vasudā hasta^dvaya^ucchritā pratimā/
analyzed: saumyā tu hasta mātrā vasu dā hasta dvaya ucchritā pratimā
kṣema subhikṣāya bhavet tri catur hasta pramāṇā yā
nṛpa bhayam atyaṅgāyām hīna aṅgāyām akalya tā kartuḥ
śātaudaryām kṣudh bhayam artha vināśaḥ kṛśa aṅgāyām kṛśāyām ca

original: 57.51ab/ maraṇaṃ tu sa^kṣatāyāṃ śastra^nipātena nirdiśet kartuḥ/
analyzed: maraṇam tu sakṣatāyām śastra nipātena nirdiśet kartuḥ
vāma avanatā patnīm dakṣiṇa vinatā hinasti āyuḥ

original: 57.52ab/ andhatvam ūrdhva^dṛṣṭyā karoti cintām adhomukhī dṛṣṭiḥ/
analyzed: andha tvam ūrdhva dṛṣṭyā karoti cintām adhomukhī dṛṣṭiḥ
sarva pratimāsu evam śubha aśubham bhāskara ukta samam

original: 57.53ab/ liṅgasya vṛtta^paradhiṃ dairghyeṇa^āsūtrya tat tridhā vibhajet/
analyzed: liṅgasya vṛtta paradhim dairghyeṇa āsūtrya tat tridhā vibhajet

original: 57.53cd/ mūle tac caturasraṃ[K.caturaśraṃ] madhye tv aṣṭāśriṃ vṛttam ataḥ//
analyzed: mūle tat madhye tu aṣṭa aśrim vṛttam atas

original: 57.54ab/ caturasram[K.caturaśram] avani^khāte madhyaṃ kāryaṃ tu piṇḍikā^śvabhre/
analyzed: avanikhāte madhyam kāryam tu piṇḍikā śvabhre
dṛśyā aucchrāyeṇa samā samantataḥ piṇḍikā akpiṇḍakā śvabhrāt
kṛśa dīrgham deśa ghnam pārśva vihīnam purasya nāśaya

original: 57.55cd/ yasya kṣataṃ bhaved mastake vināśāya tal^liṅgam//
analyzed: yasya kṣatam bhavet mastake vināśāya tat liṅgam
mātṛ gaṇaḥ kartavyaḥ sva nāma deva anurūpa kṛta cihnaḥ
revantaḥ aśva ārūḍhaḥ mṛgayā krīḍā ādi parivāraḥ

original: 57.57ab/ daṇḍī yamo mahiṣago haṃsa^ārūḍhaś ca pāśabhṛd varuṇaḥ/
analyzed: daṇḍī yamaḥ mahiṣa gaḥ haṃsa ārūḍhaḥ ca pāśa bhṛt varuṇaḥ
eka viṣāṇaḥ bibhran mūlaka kandam su nīla dala kandam
vana sampraveśa adhyāyaḥ
kartuḥ anukūla divase daivajña viśodhite śubha nimitte
maṅgala śakunaiḥ prāsthānikaiḥ ca vana sampraveśaḥ syāt
pitṛvana mārga surālaya valmīka audyāna tāpasa āśrama jāḥ
caitya sarit saṅgama sambhavāḥ ca ghaṭa toya siktāḥ ca
kubja anujāta vallī nipīḍitāḥ vajra māruta aupahatāḥ
sva patita hasti nipīḍita śuṣka agni pluṣṭa madhu nilayāḥ
taravaḥ varjayitavyāḥ śubha dāḥ syuḥ snigdha patra kusuma phalāḥ
abhimata vṛkṣam gatvā kuryāt pūjām sa bali puṣpām
suradāru candana śamī madhūka taravaḥ śubhāḥ dvijātīnām
kṣatrasya ariṣṭa aśvattha khadira bilvāḥ vivṛddhi karāḥ
vaiśyānām jīvaka khadira sindhuka syandana aśc spandanāḥ ca śubha phala dāḥ
tinduka kesara sarja arjuna āmra śālāḥ ca śūdrāṇām

original: 58.07ab/ liṅgaṃ vā pratimā vā drumavat sthāpyā yathā diśaṃ yasmāt/
analyzed: liṅgam vā pratimā vā druma vat sthāpyāḥ yathā diśam yasmāt

original: 58.07cd/ tasmāc cihnayitavyā diśo drumasya^ūrdhvam atha vā^adhaḥ/
analyzed: tasmāt cihnayitavyāḥ diśaḥ drumasya ūrdhvam atha vā adhas

original: 58.08cd/ madyaiḥ kusumair dhūpair gandhaiś ca taruṃ samabhyarcya//
analyzed: madyaiḥ kusumaiḥ dhūpaiḥ gandhaiḥ ca tarum samabhyarcya
sura pitṛ piśāca rākṣasa bhujaga asura gaṇa vināyaka ādyānām

original: 58.09cd/ kṛtvā rātrau pūjāṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃspṛśya ca brūyāt//
analyzed: kṛtvā rātrau pūjām vṛkṣam saṃspṛśya ca brūyāt
arcā artham amukasya tvam devasya parikalpitaḥ

original: 58.10cd/ namas te vṛkṣa pūjeyaṃ vidhivat sampragṛhyatām//
analyzed: namaḥ te vṛkṣa pūjā iyam vidhivat sampragṛhyatām
yāni iha bhūtāni vasanti tāni
balim gṛhītvā vidhivat prayuktam
anyatra vāsam parikalpyantu
kṣamantu tāni adya namaḥ astu tebhyaḥ
vṛkṣam prabhāte salilena siktvā
pūrva uttarasyām diśi sannikṛtya
madhu ājya digdhena kliptena kuṭhārakeṇa
pradakṣiṇam śeṣam atas nihanyāt kabhihanyāt
pūrveṇa pūrva uttaratas atha vā audak
patet yadā vṛddhi karaḥ tadā syāt
āgneya koṇāt kramaśas agni dāha
ruj rāga kkṣudh roga rogāḥ turaga kṣayaḥ ca
yat na uktam asmin vana sampraveśe
nipāta vicchedana vṛkṣa garbhāḥ
indra dhvaje vāstuni ca pradiṣṭāḥ
pūrvam mayā te atra tathā eva yojyāḥ
pratimā pratiṣṭhāpana adhyāyaḥ

original: 59.01ab/ diśi yāmyāyāṃ[K.saumyāyāṃ] kuryād adhivāsana^maṇḍapaṃ budhaḥ prāg vā/
analyzed: diśi kuryāt adhivāsana maṇḍapam budhaḥ prāk vā
toraṇa catuṣṭaya yutam śasta druma pallava channam

original: 59.02ab/ pūrve bhāge citrāḥ srajaḥ patākāś ca maṇḍapasya^uktāḥ/
analyzed: pūrve bhāge citrāḥ srajaḥ patākāḥ ca maṇḍapasya auktāḥ

original: 59.02cd/ āgneyyāṃ diśi raktāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syur yāmya^nairṛtyoḥ[K.nairṛtayoḥ]//
analyzed: āgneyyām diśi raktāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syuḥ yāmya nairṛtyoḥ knairṛtayoḥ

original: 59.03ab/ śvetā diśy aparasyām vāyavyāyāṃ tu pāṇḍurā eva/
analyzed: śvetāḥ diśi aparasyām vāyavyāyām tu pāṇḍurāḥ eva
citrāḥ ca auttarapārśve pītāḥ pūrva uttare kāryāḥ kkoṇe
āyuḥ śrī bala jaya dā dāru mayī tathā pratimā
loka hitāya maṇi mayī sauvarṇī puṣṭi dā bhavati
rajata mayī kīrti karī prajā vivṛddhim karoti tāmra mayī

original: 59.05cd/ bhū^lābhaṃ tu mahāntaṃ śailī pratimā^atha vā liṅgam//
analyzed: bhū lābham tu mahāntam śailī pratimā atha vā liṅgam

original: 59.06ab/ śaṅkhu^upahatā pratimā pradhāna^puruṣaṃ kulaṃ ca ghātayati/
analyzed: śaṅkhu upahatā pratimā pradhānapuruṣam kulam ca ghātayati

original: 59.06cd/ śvabhra^upahatā rogān upadravāṃś ca kṣayam[K.akṣayān] kurute//
analyzed: śvabhraupahatā rogān upadravān ca kṣayamka kṣayān kurute
maṇḍapa madhye sthaṇḍilam upalipya āstīrya sikatayā atha kuśaiḥ
bhadrāsana kṛta śīrṣa aupadhāna pādām nyaset pratimām
maṅgalya saṃjñitābhiḥ sarva auṣadhibhiḥ kuśa ādyābhiḥ
dvipa vṛṣabha auddhata kuddhṛta parvata valmīka sarit samāgama taṭeṣu

original: 59.09cd/ padma^saraḥsu ca mṛdbhiḥ sa^pañcagavyaiś ca tīrtha^jalaiḥ//
analyzed: padma saraḥsu ca mṛdbhiḥ sa pañcagavyaiḥ ca tīrtha jalaiḥ
pūrva śiraskām snātām suvarṇa ratna ambubhiḥ ca sa sugandhaiḥ
nānā tūrya ninādaiḥ puṇya ahaiḥ veda nirghoṣaiḥ
aindryām diśi indra liṅgāḥ mantrāḥ prāc dakṣiṇe agni liṅgāḥ ca

original: 59.11cd/ vaktavyā[K.japtavyā] dvija^mukhyaiḥ pūjyās te dakṣiṇābhiś ca//
analyzed: vaktavyāḥ ak japtavyāḥ dvijamukhyaiḥ pūjyāḥ te dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca

original: 59.12ab/ yo devaḥ saṃsthāpyas tan^mantraiś ca^analaṃ dvijo juhuyāt/
analyzed: yaḥ devaḥ saṃsthāpyaḥ tad mantraiḥ ca analam dvijaḥ juhuyāt
agni nimittāni mayā proktāni

original: 59.13ab/ dhūma^ākulo +apasavyo muhur muhur viphuliṅga^kṛn na śubhaḥ/
analyzed: dhūma ākulaḥ apasavyaḥ muhur muhur viphuliṅga kṛt na śubhaḥ

original: 59.13cd/ hotuḥ smṛti^lopo vā prasarpaṇaṃ ca^aśubhaṃ proktam//
analyzed: hotuḥ smṛti lopaḥ vā prasarpaṇam ca aśubham proktam
snātām abhukta vastrām su alaṅkṛtām pūjitām kusuma gandhaiḥ
pratimām su āstīrṇāyām śayyāyām sthāpakaḥ kuryāt

original: 59.15ab/ suptāṃ *sa^gīta^nṛtyair jāgaraṇaiḥ[K.sunṛtyagītair jāgarakaiḥ] samyag evam adhivāsya/
analyzed: suptām sa gīta nṛtyaiḥ jāgaraṇaiḥ su nṛtya gītaiḥ jāgarakaiḥ samyak evam adhivāsya
daivajña sampradiṣṭe kāle saṃsthāpanam kuryāt
abhyarcya kusuma vastra anulepanaiḥ śaṅkha tūrya nirghoṣaiḥ
prādakṣiṇyena nayet āyatanasya prayatnena

original: 59.17ab/ kṛtvā baliṃ prabhūtaṃ sampūjya brāhmaṇāṃś ca sabhyāṃś ca/
analyzed: kṛtvā balim prabhūtam sampūjya brāhmaṇān ca sabhyān ca
dattvā hiraṇya śakalam vinikṣipet piṇḍikā śvabhre
sthāpaka daivajña dvija sabhya sthapatīn viśeṣataḥ abhyarcya

original: 59.18cd/ kalyāṇānāṃ bhāgī bhavati^iha paratra ca svargī//
analyzed: kalyāṇānām bhāgī bhavati iha paratra ca svargī

original: 59.19a viṣṇor bhāgavatān magāṃś ca savituḥ śambhoḥ sa^bhasma^dvijān
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ bhāgavatān magān ca savituḥ śambhoḥ sa bhasma dvijān

original: 59.19b mātṝṇām api maṇḍala^krama^vido[K.mātṛmaṇḍalavido] viprān vidur brahmaṇaḥ/
analyzed: mātṝṇām api maṇḍala krama vidaḥ ukmātṛ maṇḍala vidaḥ viprān viduḥ brahmaṇaḥ

original: 59.19c śākyān sarva^hitasya śānta^manaso nagnān jinānāṃ vidur
analyzed: śākyān sarva hitasya śānta manasaḥ nagnān jinānām viduḥ

original: 59.19d ye yaṃ devam upāśritāḥ sva^vidhinā tais tasya kāryā kriyā//
analyzed: ye yam devam upāśritāḥ sva vidhinā taiḥ tasya kāryā kriyā
udagayane sita pakṣe śiśiragabhastau ca jīva varga sthe
pāpaiḥ upacaya saṃsthaiḥ dhruva mṛdu hari tiṣya vāyu deveṣu
vikuje dine anukūle devānām sthāpanam śastam

original: 59.22ab/ sāmānyam idaṃ samāsato lokānāṃ hitadaṃ mayā kṛtam/
analyzed: sāmānyam idam samāsatas lokānām hita dam mayā kṛtam
adhivāsana sanniveśane sāvitre pṛthak eva vistarāt
golakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
parāśaraḥ prāha bṛhadrathāya
go lakṣaṇam yat kriyate tatas ayam
mayā samāsaḥ śubha lakṣaṇāḥ tāḥ
sarvāḥ tathā api āgamataḥ abhidhāsye
sa asra āvila rūkṣa akṣyaḥ mūṣaka nayanāḥ na śubha dāḥ gāvaḥ
pracalat cipiṭa viṣāṇāḥ karaṭāḥ khara sadṛśa varṇa aśkvarnāḥ ca
daśa sapta catur dantyaḥ pralamba muṇḍa ānanāḥ vinata pṛṣṭhyaḥkpṛṣṭhāḥ
hrasva sthūla grīvāḥ yava madhyāḥ dārita khurāḥ ca
śyāva ati dīrgha jihvā gulphaiḥ ati tanubhiḥ ati bṛhadbhiḥ vā
ati kakudāḥ kṛśa dehāḥ na eṣṭāḥ hīna adhika aṅgyaḥ ca
vṛṣabhaḥ api evam sthūla atilamba vṛṣaṇaḥ śirā ātata kroḍaḥ
sthūlaśira ācita gaṇḍaḥ tri sthānam mehate yaḥ ca

original: 60.06ab/ mārjāra^akṣaḥ kapilaḥ karaṭo vā na śubhado dvijasya^eva[K.dvijasyeṣṭaḥ]/
analyzed: mārjāra akṣaḥ kapilaḥ karaṭaḥ vā na śubha daḥ dvijasya evak dvijasya iṣṭaḥ
kṛṣṇa oṣṭha tālu jihvaḥ śvasanaḥ yūthasya ghāta karaḥ
sthūla śakṛt maṇi śṛṅgaḥ sita odaraḥ kṛṣṇa sāra varṇaḥ ca
gṛha jātaḥ api tyājyaḥ yūtha vināśa āvahaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ

original: 60.08cd/ viprāṇām api na śubhaṃ karoti vṛṣabhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ//
analyzed: viprāṇām api na śubham karoti vṛṣabhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ

original: 60.09ab/ ye ca^uddharanti pādān paṅkād iva yojitāḥ kṛśa^grīvāḥ/
analyzed: ye ca auddharanti pādān paṅkāt iva yojitāḥ kṛśa grīvāḥ

original: 60.09cd/ kātara^nayanā hīnāś ca pṛṣṭhatas te na bhārasahāḥ//
analyzed: kātara nayanāḥ hīnāḥ ca pṛṣṭhatas te na bhāra sahāḥ
mṛdu saṃhata tāmra oṣṭhāḥ tanu sphijaḥ tāmra tālu jihvāḥ ca
su kukṣayaḥ spṛṣṭak spaṣṭajaṅghāḥ ca
ātāmra saṃhata khurāḥ vyūḍha auraskāḥ bṛhat kakud ayuktāḥ
snigdha ślakṣṇa tanu tvac romāṇaḥ tāmra tanu śṛṅgāḥ
tanu bhū spṛś vāladhayaḥ rakta anta vilocanāḥ mahā ucchvāsāḥ
siṃha skandhāḥ tanu alpa kambalāḥ pūjitāḥ
vāma āvartaiḥ vāme dakṣiṇa pārśve ca dakṣiṇa āvartaiḥ
śubha dāḥ bhavanti anaḍuhaḥ jaṅghābhiḥ ca eṇaka nibhābhiḥ
vaidūrya kvaiḍūrya mallikā budbuda īkṣaṇāḥ sthūla netra pakṣmāṇaḥ kvarmāṇaḥ

original: 60.14cd/ pārṣṇibhir asphuṭita^ābhiḥ śastāḥ sarve ca[K.api] bhārasahāḥ//
analyzed: pārṣṇibhiḥ śastāḥ sarve cakapi bhāra sahāḥ

original: 60.15ab/ ghrāṇoddeśe savalir mārjāra^mukhaḥ sitaś ca dakṣiṇataḥ/
analyzed: ghrāṇa uddeśe sa valiḥ mārjāra mukhaḥ sitaḥ ca dakṣiṇatas
lambaiḥ vṛṣaṇaiḥ meṣa odaraḥ ca saṃkṣipta vaṃkṣaṇakkṣaṇa ākroḍaḥ
jñeyaḥ bhāra adhva sahaḥ jave aśva tulyaḥ ca śasta phalaḥ
sita varṇaḥ piṅga akṣaḥ tāmra viṣāṇa īkṣaṇaḥ mahā vaktraḥ

original: 60.17cd/ haṃso nāma śubhaphalo yūthasya vivardhanaḥ proktaḥ//
analyzed: haṃsaḥ nāma śubha phalaḥ yūthasya vivardhanaḥ proktaḥ
bhūspṛś vāladhiḥ ātāmra viṣāṇa ukvaṅkṣaṇaḥ rakta dṛś kakudmān kakudmī ca

original: 60.18cd/ kalmāṣaś ca svāminam acirāt kurute patiṃ lakṣmyāḥ//
analyzed: kalmāṣaḥ ca svāminam acirāt kurute patim lakṣmyāḥ

original: 60.19ab/ yo vā sitaikacaraṇair[K.sitaikacaraṇo] yatheṣṭavarṇaś ca so +api śubhaphalakṛt[K.śastaphalaḥ]/
analyzed: yaḥ vā sita eka caraṇaiḥ sita eka caraṇaḥ yathā iṣṭa varṇaḥ ca saḥ api śubha phala kṛt kśasta phalaḥ
miśra phalaḥ api grāhyaḥ yadi na ekānta praśastaḥ asti
śvalakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ

original: 61.01a pādāḥ pañca^nakhās trayo +agra^caraṇaḥ ṣaḍbhir nakhair dakṣiṇas
analyzed: pādāḥ pañca nakhāḥ trayaḥ agra caraṇaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ nakhaiḥ dakṣiṇaḥ

original: 61.01b tāmra^oṣṭha^agranaso mṛgeśvara^gatir jighran bhuvaṃ yāti ca/
analyzed: tāmra oṣṭha agra nasaḥ mṛgeśvara gatiḥ jighran bhuvam yāti ca

original: 61.01c lāṅgūlaṃ sasaṭaṃ dṛg^ṛkṣa^sadṛśī karṇau ca lambau mṛdū
analyzed: lāṅgūlam sa saṭam dṛś ṛkṣa sadṛśī karṇau ca lambau mṛdū

original: 61.01d yasya syāt sa karoti poṣṭur acirāt puṣṭāṃ śriyaṃ śvā gṛhe//
analyzed: yasya syāt sa karoti poṣṭuḥ acirāt puṣṭām śriyam śvā gṛhe
pāde pāde pañca pañca agra pāde
vāme yasyāḥ ṣaṭ nakhāḥ mallikākṣyāḥ
vakram puccham piṅgala ālamba karṇā

original: 61.02d yā sā rāṣṭraṃ kukkurī pāti puṣṭā[K.poṣṭuḥ]//
analyzed: yā sā rāṣṭram kukkurī pāti puṣṭāk poṣṭuḥ
kukkuṭa lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ

original: 62.01cd/ rauti susvaram uṣātyaye ca yo vṛddhidaḥ sa nṛpa^rāṣṭra^vājinām//
analyzed: rauti su svaram uṣā atyaye ca yaḥ vṛddhi daḥ sa nṛpa rāṣṭra vājinām

original: 62.02a yavagrīvo yo vā badara^sadṛśo vā^api vihago
analyzed: yavagrīvaḥ yaḥ vā badara sadṛśaḥ vā api vihagaḥ

original: 62.02b bṛhan^mūrdhā varṇair bhavati bahubhiś ca ruciraḥ/
analyzed: bṛhat mūrdhā varṇaiḥ bhavati bahubhiḥ ca ruciraḥ

original: 62.02c sa śastaḥ saṃgrāme madhu^madhupa^varṇaś ca jayakṛd
analyzed: sa śastaḥ saṃgrāme madhu madhupa varṇaḥ ca jaya kṛt
na śastaḥ yaḥ atas anyaḥ kṛśa tanu ravaḥ khañja caraṇaḥ
kukkuṭī ca mṛdu cāru bhāṣiṇī snigdha mūrti rucira ānana īṣaṇā
sā dadāti su ciram mahīkṣitām śrī yaśaḥ vijaya vīrya sampadaḥ
kūrmalakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
kalaśa sadṛśa mūrtiḥ cāru vaṃśaḥ ca kūrmaḥ
aruṇa sama vapuḥ vā sarṣapa ākāra citraḥ
sakala nṛpa mahattvam mandira sthaḥ karoti
añjana bhṛṅga śyāma tanuḥ vā bindu vicitraḥ avyaṅga śarīraḥ

original: 63.02cd/ sarpa^śirā vā sthūlagalo yaḥ so +api nṛpāṇāṃ rāṣṭra^vivṛddhyai//
analyzed: sarpa śirāḥ vā sthūla galaḥ yaḥ saḥ api nṛpāṇām rāṣṭra vivṛddhyai
vaiḍūrya tviṣ sthūla kaṇṭhaḥ tri koṇaḥ
gūḍha chidraḥ ca ūru kū cāru vaṃśaḥ ca śastaḥ
krīḍā vāpyām toya pūrṇe maṇau vā
kāryaḥ kūrmaḥ maṅgala artham narendraiḥ
chāga lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
chāga śubha aśubha lakṣaṇam abhidhāsye navadaśa aṣṭa dantāḥ te

original: 64.01cd/ dhanyāḥ sthāpyā veśmani santyājyāḥ sapta^dantā ye//
analyzed: dhanyāḥ sthāpyāḥ veśmani santi ājyāḥ sapta dantāḥ ye

original: 64.02ab/ dakṣiṇa^pārśve maṇḍalam asitaṃ śuklasya śubhaphalaṃ bhavati/
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pārśve maṇḍalam asitam śuklasya śubha phalam bhavati
ṛṣya nibha kṛṣṇa lohita varṇānām śvetam ati kapi śubha dam

original: 64.03ab/ stanavad avalambate yaḥ kaṇṭhe +ajānāṃ maṇiḥ sa vijñeyaḥ/
analyzed: stana vat avalambate yaḥ kaṇṭhe ajānām maṇiḥ sa vijñeyaḥ
eka maṇiḥ śubha phala kṛt dhanyatamāḥ dvi tra maṇayaḥ u dvi tri maṇayaḥ ye

original: 64.04ab/ muṇḍāḥ sarve śubhadāḥ sarva^sitāḥ sarva^kṛṣṇa^dehāś ca/
analyzed: muṇḍāḥ sarve śubha dāḥ sarva sitāḥ sarva kṛṣṇa dehāḥ ca
ardha asitāḥ sita ardhāḥ dhanyāḥ kapila ardha kṛṣṇāḥ ca
vicarati yūthasya agre prathamam ca ambhaḥ avagāhate yaḥ ajaḥ

original: 64.05cd/ sa śubhaḥ sita^mūrdhā vā mūrdhani vā kṛttikā[K.ṭikkikā] yasya//
analyzed: sa śubhaḥ sita mūrdhā vā mūrdhani vā kṛttikā akṭikkikā yasya

original: 64.06ab/ sa^pṛṣata^kaṇṭha^śirā vā tila^piṣṭa^nibhaś ca tāmradṛk śastaḥ/
analyzed: sa pṛṣata kaṇṭha śirāḥ vā tila piṣṭa nibhaḥ ca tāmra dṛś śastaḥ

original: 64.06cd/ kṛṣṇa^caraṇaḥ sito vā kṛṣṇo vā śveta^caraṇo yaḥ//
analyzed: kṛṣṇa caraṇaḥ sitaḥ vā kṛṣṇaḥ vā śveta caraṇaḥ yaḥ

original: 64.07ab/ yaḥ kṛṣṇa^aṇḍaḥ śveto madhye kṛṣṇena bhavati paṭṭena/
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṣṇa aṇḍaḥ śvetaḥ madhye kṛṣṇena bhavati paṭṭena

original: 64.07cd/ yo vā carati saśabdaṃ mandaṃ ca sa śobhanaś chāgaḥ//
analyzed: yaḥ vā carati sa śabdam mandam ca sa śobhanaḥ chāgaḥ

original: 64.08ab/ ṛṣya^śiroruha^pādo yo vā prāk pāṇḍuro +apare nīlaḥ/
analyzed: ṛṣya śiroruha pādaḥ yaḥ vā prāk pāṇḍuraḥ apare nīlaḥ

original: 64.08cd/ sa bhavati śubhakṛc chāgaḥ ślokaś ca^apy atra garga^uktaḥ//
analyzed: sa bhavati śubha kṛt chāgaḥ ślokaḥ ca api atra garga uktaḥ

original: 64.09ab/ kuṭṭakaḥ kuṭilaś ca^eva jaṭilo vāmanas tathā/
analyzed: kuṭṭakaḥ kuṭilaḥ ca eva jaṭilaḥ vāmanaḥ tathā

original: 64.09cd/ te catvāraḥ śriyaḥ putrā na^alakṣmīke vasanti te//
analyzed: te catvāraḥ śriyaḥ putrāḥ naalakṣmīke vasanti te
atha apraśastāḥ khara tulya nādāḥ
pradīpta pucchāḥ kunakhāḥ vivarṇāḥ
nikṛtta karṇāḥ dvipa mastakāḥ ca
bhavanti ye ca asita tālu jihvāḥ
varṇaiḥ praśastaiḥ maṇibhiḥ yuktā
muṇḍāḥ ca ye tāmra vilocanāḥ ca
te pūjitāḥ mānavānām
saukhyāni kurvanti yaśaḥ śriyam ca
aśva lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
dīrgha grīvā akṣikūṭaḥ trika hṛdaya pṛthuḥ tāmra tālu oṣṭha jihvaḥ
sūkṣma tvac keśa vālaḥ su śapha gati mukhaḥ hrasva karṇa oṣṭha pucchaḥ
jaṅghā jānu ūru vṛttaḥ sama sita daśanaḥ cāru saṃsthāna rūpaḥ

original: 65.01d vājī sarva^aṅga^śuddho bhavati narapateḥ śatru^nāśāya nityam//
analyzed: vājī sarva aṅga śuddhaḥ bhavati narapateḥ śatru nāśāya nityam
aśru pāta hanu gaṇḍa hṛd khṛḍgala protha śaṅkha kaṭi vasti jānuni

original: 65.02cd/ muṣka^nābhi^kakude tathā gude savya^kukṣi^caraṇe tathā[K.caraṇeṣu ca] śubhāḥ[U.aśubhāḥ]//
analyzed: muṣka nābhi kakude tathā gude savya kukṣi caraṇe ca
ye prapāṇa gala karṇa saṃsthitāḥ
pṛṣṭha madhya nayana opari sthitāḥ
oṣṭha sakthi bhuja kukṣi pārśva gāḥ
te lalāṭa sahitāḥ su śobhanāḥ

original: 65.04ab/ teṣāṃ prapāṇa eko lalāṭa^keśeṣu ca dhruva^āvartāḥ/
analyzed: teṣām prapāṇaḥ ekaḥ lalāṭa keśeṣu ca dhruva āvartāḥ

original: 65.04cd/ randhra^uparandhra^mūrdhani vakṣasi ca^iti smṛtau dvau dvau//
analyzed: randhra auparandhra mūrdhani vakṣasi ca eti smṛtau dvau dvau

original: 65.05a ṣaṣbhir dantaiḥ sita^ābhair bhavati haya^śiśus taiḥ kaśāyair dvivarṣaiḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣbhiḥ dantaiḥ sita ābhaiḥ bhavati haya śiśuḥ taiḥ kaśāyaiḥ dvi varṣaiḥ
sandaṃśaiḥ madhyama antyaiḥ pati kū patita samuditaiḥ tri abdhik tri abda pañca abdika aśvaḥ
sandaṃśa anukrameṇa trika parigaṇitāḥ kālikā pīta śuklāḥ

original: 65.05d kācā makṣīka[K.mākṣīka]^śaṅkha^avaṭa^calanam ato dantapātaṃ ca viddhi//
analyzed: kācāḥ makṣīka kmākṣīka śaṅkha avaṭa calanam atas dantapātam ca viddhi
hasti lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
madhu ābha dantāḥ suvibhakta dehā

original: 66.01b na ca^*upadigdhā na[K.digdhāś ca] kṛśāḥ kṣamāś ca/
analyzed: na ca aupadigdhāḥ nakdigdhāḥ ca kṛśāḥ kṣamāḥ ca
gātraiḥ samaiḥ cāpa samāna vaṃśā
varāha tulyaiḥ jaghanaiḥ ca bhadrāḥ
vakṣaḥ atha kakṣa valayaḥ ślathāḥ ca
lamba audaraḥ tvac bṛhatī galaḥ ca
sthūlā ca kukṣiḥ saha pecakena
saiṃhī ca dṛś manda mataṅga jasya
mṛgāḥ tu hrasva adhara vāla meḍhrāḥ
sthūla īkṣaṇāḥ ca eti yathā ukta cihnaiḥ
saṅkīrṇa nāgāḥ vyatimiśra cihnāḥ
pañca aunnatiḥ sapta mṛgasya dairghyam
aṣṭau ca hastāḥ pariṇāhamānam
eka dvi vṛddhau atha manda bhadrau
saṅkīrna nāgaḥ aniyata pramāṇaḥ
bhadrasya varṇaḥ haritaḥ madaḥ cakmadasya
mandasya hāridraka sannikāśaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ madaḥ ca abhihitaḥ mṛgasya
saṅkīrṇa nāgasya madaḥ vimiśraḥ
tāmra oṣṭha tālu vadanāḥ kalaviṅka netrāḥ
snigdha aunnata agra daśanāḥ pṛthula āyata āsyāḥ
cāpa aunnata āyata nigūḍha nimagna vaṃśāḥ
tanu eka roma cita kūrma samāna kumbhāḥ
vistīrṇa karṇa hanu nābhi lalāṭa guhyāḥ
kūrma aunnata dvi nava viṃśatibhiḥ nakhaiḥ ca
dhanyāḥ sugandhi mada puṣkara mārutāḥ ca
dīrgha aṅguli rakta puṣkarāḥ sa jala ambhoda nināda bṛṃhiṇaḥ
bṛhat āyata vṛtta kandharāḥ dhanyāḥ bhūmipateḥ mataṅga jāḥ
kubja vāmanaka meṣa viṣāṇān
dṛśya kośa phala puṣkara hīnān
śyāva nīla śabala asita tālūn
su alpa vaktraruha matkuṇa ṣaṇḍhān
hastinīm ca gaja lakṣaṇa yuktām
garbhiṇī ca nṛpatiḥ para deśam
prāpayet ati virūpa phalāḥ te
puruṣa lakṣana adhyāyaḥ
unmāna māna gati saṃhati sāra varṇa
sneha svara prakṛti sattvam anūkam ādau
kṣetram mṛjām ca vidhivat kuśalaḥ avalokya
sāmudra vid vadati yātam anāgatam vāc ca
asvedanau mṛdu talau kamala audara ābhau
śliṣṭa aṅgulī rucira tāmra nakhau su pārṣṇī
uṣṇau sirā virahitau su nigūḍha gulphau
kūrma aunnatau ca caraṇau manuja īśvarasya
śūrpa ākāra virūkṣa pāṇḍura nakhau vakrau śira asantatau
saṃśuṣkau virala aṅgulī ca caraṇau dāridrya duḥkha pradau
kaṣāya sadṛśau vaṃśasya viccheda dau kvicchitti dau
brahma ghnau paripakva mṛd dyuti talau pītau agamyā ratau auka gamya ratau
pravirala tanu roma vṛtta jaṅghā
dvirada kara pratimaiḥ vara ūrubhiḥ ca
upacita sama jānavaḥ ca bhūpā
dhana rahitāḥ śva śṛgāla tulya jaṅghāḥ
roma ekaikam kūpake pārthivānām
dve dve jñeye paṇḍita śrotriyāṇām
tri ādyaiḥ niḥsvāḥ mānavāḥ duḥkha bhājaḥ
keśāḥ ca evam ninditāḥ pūjitāḥ ca
nirmāṃsa jānuḥ mriyate pravāse
saubhāgyam alpaiḥ vikaṭaiḥ daridrāḥ
strī nirjitāḥ bhavanti
rājyam sa māṃsaiḥ ca mahadbhiḥ āyuḥ

original: 67.07a liṅge +alpe dhanavān apatya^rahitaḥ sthūle *+api hīno[K.vihīno] dhanair
analyzed: liṅge alpe dhanavān apatya rahitaḥ sthūle api hīna ukvi hīnaḥ dhanaiḥ
meḍhre vāma nate suta artha rahitaḥ vakre anyathā putravān

original: 67.07c dāridryaṃ vinate tv adho +alpa^tanayo liṅge śirā^santate
analyzed: dāridryam vinate tu adhas alpa tanayaḥ liṅge sirā santate

original: 67.07d sthūla^granthi^yute sukhī mṛdu karoty antaṃ prameha^ādibhiḥ//
analyzed: sthūla granthi yute sukhī mṛdu karoti antam prameha ādibhiḥ

original: 67.08ab/ kośa^nigūḍhair bhūpā dīrghair bhagnaiś ca vitta^parihīnāḥ/
analyzed: kośa nigūḍhaiḥ bhūpāḥ dīrghaiḥ bhagnaiḥ ca vitta parihīnāḥ
ṛju vṛtta śephasaḥ laghu śirāla śiśnāḥ ca dhanavantaḥ

original: 67.09ab/ jala^mṛtyur eka^vṛṣaṇo viṣamaiḥ strī^cañcalaḥ samaiḥ kṣitipaḥ/

analyzed: hrasva āyuḥ ca audbaddhaiḥ pralamba vṛṣaṇasya śatam āyuḥ

original: 67.10ab/ raktair āḍhyā maṇibhir nirdravyāḥ pāṇḍuraiś ca malinaiś ca/
analyzed: raktaiḥ āḍhyāḥ maṇibhiḥ nirdravyāḥ pāṇḍuraiḥ ca malinaiḥ ca
sukhinaḥ sa śabda mūtrāḥ niḥsvāḥ niḥśabda dhārāḥ ca
dvi tri catur dhārābhiḥ pradakṣiṇa āvarta valita mūtrābhiḥ
pṛthivīpatayaḥ jñeyāḥ vikīrṇa mūtrāḥ ca dhana hīnāḥ
ekā eva mūtradhārā valitā rūpa pradā na suta dātrī krūpa pradhāna suta dātrī
snigdha aunnata sama maṇayaḥ dhana vanitā ratna bhoktāraḥ

original: 67.13ab/ maṇibhiś ca madhya^nimnaiḥ kanyā^pitaro bhavanti niḥsvāś ca/
analyzed: maṇibhiḥ ca madhya nimnaiḥ kanyā pitaraḥ bhavanti niḥsvāḥ ca
bahu paśu bhājaḥ madhya aunnataiḥ ca na ati ulbaṇaiḥ dhaninaḥ
pariśuṣka vasti śīrṣaiḥ dhana rahitāḥ durbhagāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ
kusuma sama gandha śukrāḥ vijñātavyāḥ mahīpālāḥ
madhu gandhe bahu vittā matsya sagandhe bahūni apatyāni

original: 67.16ab/ madirā^gandhe yajvā kṣāra^sagandhe ca retasi daridraḥ/
analyzed: madirā gandhe yajvā kṣāra sa gandhe ca retasi daridraḥ
śīghram maithuna gāmī dīrgha āyuḥ atas anyathā alpa āyuḥ
niḥsvaḥ ati sthūla sphic sa māṃsala sphic sukha anvitaḥ bhavati
vyāghra antaḥ adhyardha sphic maṇḍūka sphic nara adhipatiḥ
siṃha kaṭiḥ manuja indraḥ kapi karabha kaṭiḥ dhanaiḥ parityaktaḥ
sama jaṭharāḥ bhoga yutāḥ ghaṭa piṭhara nibha odarāḥ niḥsvāḥ

original: 67.19ab/ avikala^pārśvā dhanino nimnair vakraiś ca bhoga^santyaktāḥ/
analyzed: avikala pārśvāḥ dhaninaḥ nimnaiḥ vakraiḥ ca bhoga santyaktāḥ
sama kukṣāḥ bhoga āḍhyāḥ nimnābhiḥ bhoga parihīnāḥ

original: 67.20ab/ unnata^kukṣāḥ kṣitipāḥ kuṭilāḥ syur mānavā viṣama^kukṣāḥ/
analyzed: unnata kukṣāḥ kṣitipāḥ kuṭilāḥ syuḥ mānavāḥ viṣama kukṣāḥ
sarpaudarāḥ daridrāḥ bhavanti bahu āśinaḥ ca eva
parimaṇḍala aunnatābhiḥ vistīrṇābhiḥ ca nābhibhiḥ sukhinaḥ

original: 67.21cd/ alpā[K.svalpā] tv adṛśya^nimnā nābhiḥ kleśa^āvahā bhavati//
analyzed: tu adṛśya nimnā nābhiḥ kleśa āvahā bhavati

original: 67.22ab/ vali^madhya^gatā viṣamā *śūlād bādhāṃ[K.śūlābādhaṃ] karoti naisvyaṃ[K.naiḥsvyaṃ] ca/
analyzed: vali madhya gatā viṣamā śūlāt karoti naisvyam knaiḥsvyam ca
śāṭhyam vāma āvartā karoti medhām pradakṣiṇatas

original: 67.23ab/ pārśva^āyatā cira^āyuṣam upariṣṭāc ca^īśvaraṃ gava^āḍhyam adhaḥ/
analyzed: cira āyuṣam upariṣṭāt ca īśvaram gava āḍhyam adhas
śata patra karṇikā ābhā nābhiḥ manuja īśvaram kurute
śastra antam strī bhoginam ācāryam bahu sutam yathāsaṃkhyam

original: 67.24cd/ eka^dvi^tri^caturbhir valibhir vindyād nṛpaṃ tv avalim//
analyzed: eka dvi tri caturbhiḥ valibhiḥ vindyāt nṛpam tu a valim
viṣama valayaḥ manuṣyāḥ bhavanti agamyā abhigāminaḥ pāpāḥ
ṛju valayaḥ sukha bhājaḥ para dāra dveṣiṇaḥ ca eva
māṃsala mṛdubhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pradakṣiṇa āvarta romabhiḥ bhūpāḥ
viparītaiḥ nirdravyāḥ sukha parihīnāḥ para preṣyāḥ
subhagāḥ bhavanti an udvaddha kanubaddha cūcukāḥ nirdhanāḥ viṣama dīrghaiḥ
pīna aupacita nimagnaiḥ kṣitipatayaḥ cūcukaiḥ sukhinaḥ

original: 67.28ab/ hṛdayaṃ samunnataṃ pṛthu na vepanaṃ māṃsalaṃ ca nṛpatīnām/
analyzed: hṛdayam samunnatam pṛthu na vepanam māṃsalam ca nṛpatīnām
adhanānām viparītam khara roma citam śirālam ca

original: 67.29ab/ sama^vakṣaso +arthavantaḥ pīnaiḥ *śūrā hy[K.śūrās tv] akiñcanās tanubhiḥ/
analyzed: samavakṣasaḥ arthavantaḥ pīnaiḥ śūrāḥ hi kśūrāḥ tu akiñcanāḥ tanubhiḥ

original: 67.29cd/ viṣamaṃ vakṣo yeṣāṃ te niḥsvāḥ śastra^nidhanāś ca//
analyzed: viṣamam vakṣaḥ yeṣām te niḥsvāḥ śastra nidhanāḥ ca
viṣamaiḥ viṣamaḥ jatrubhiḥ artha vihīnaḥ asthi sandhi pariṇaddhaiḥ
unnata jatruḥ nimnaiḥ niḥsvaḥ arthavān pīnaiḥ

original: 67.31ab/ cipiṭa^grīvo niḥsvaḥ śuṣkā saśirā ca yasya vā grīvā/
analyzed: cipiṭa grīvaḥ niḥsvaḥ śuṣkā sa śirā ca yasya vā grīvā
mahiṣa grīvaḥ śūraḥ śastra antaḥ vṛṣa sama grīvaḥ
kambu grīvaḥ rājā pralamba kaṇṭhaḥ prabhakṣaṇaḥ bhavati

original: 67.32cd/ pṛṣṭham abhagnam aromaśam arthavatām aśubhadam ato +anyat//
analyzed: pṛṣṭham a bhagnam a romaśam arthavatām a śubha dam atas anyat
asvedana pīna aunnata sugandhak sugandhi sama roma saṅkulāḥ kakṣāḥ
vijñātavyā dhaninām atas anyathā arthaiḥ vihīnānām

original: 67.34ab/ nirmāṃsau romacitau bhagnāv alpau ca nirdhanasya^aṃsau/
analyzed: nirmāṃsau roma citau bhagnau alpau ca
vipulau avyucchinnau su śliṣṭau saukhya vīryavatām
kari kara sadṛśau vṛttau ājānu avalambinau samau pīnau
bāhū pṛthivīīśānām adhanānām kadhamānām romaśau hrasvau

original: 67.36ab/ hasta^aṅgulayo dīrghāś cira^āyuṣām avalitāś ca subhagānām/
analyzed: hasta aṅgulayaḥ dīrghāḥ cira āyuṣām a valitāḥ ca subhagānām
medhāvinām ca sūkṣmāḥ cipiṭāḥ para karma niratānām
sthūlābhiḥ dhana rahitāḥ bahis natābhiḥ ca śastra niryāṇāḥ
kapi sadṛśa karāḥ dhaninaḥ vyāghra aupama pāṇayaḥ pāpāḥ

original: 67.38ab/ maṇi^bandhanair nigūḍhair dṛḍhaiś ca su^śliṣṭa^sandhibhir bhūpāḥ/
analyzed: maṇibandhanaiḥ nigūḍhaiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ ca su śliṣṭa sandhibhiḥ bhūpāḥ

original: 67.38cd/ hīnair hasta^cchedaḥ ślathaiḥ saśabdaiś ca nirdravyāḥ//
analyzed: hīnaiḥ hasta chedaḥ ślathaiḥ sa śabdaiḥ ca nirdravyāḥ

original: 67.39ab/ pitṛ^vittena vihīnā bhavanti nimnena karatalena narāḥ/
analyzed: pitṛ vittena vihīnāḥ bhavanti nimnena kara talena narāḥ
saṃvṛta nimnaiḥ dhaninaḥ prottāna karāḥ ca dātāraḥ

original: 67.40ab/ viṣamair viṣamā niḥsvāś ca karatalair īśvarāś[K.īśvarās] tu lākṣābhaiḥ/
analyzed: viṣamaiḥ viṣamāḥ niḥsvāḥ ca kara talaiḥ tu lākṣā ābhaiḥ
pītaiḥ agamya vanitā abhigāminaḥ nirdhanāḥ rūkṣaiḥ

original: 67.41ab/ tuṣa^sadṛśa^nakhāḥ klībāś cipiṭaiḥ sphuṭitaiś ca vitta^santyaktāḥ/
analyzed: tuṣa sadṛśa nakhāḥ klībāḥ cipiṭaiḥ sphuṭitaiḥ ca vitta santyaktāḥ
kunakha vivarṇaiḥ paratarkukāḥ ca tāmraiḥ camū patayaḥ

original: 67.42ab/ aṅguṣṭha^yavair āḍhyāḥ sutavanto +aṅguṣṭha^*mūlajaiś ca yavaiḥ[K.mūlagaiś ca yavaḥ]/
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha yavaiḥ āḍhyāḥ sutavantaḥ aṅguṣṭha mūla jaiḥ ca yavaiḥ kmūla gaiḥ ca yavaḥ
dīrgha aṅguli parvāṇaḥ subhagāḥ dīrgha āyuṣaḥ ca eva

original: 67.43ab/ snigdhā nimnā rekhā dhanināṃ tad^vyatyayena niḥsvānām/
analyzed: snigdhā nimnā rekhā dhaninām tad vyatyayena niḥsvānām
virala aṅgulayaḥ niḥsvāḥ dhana sañcayinaḥ ghana aṅgulayaḥ
tisraḥ rekhāḥ maṇibandhana utthitāḥ kara tala aupagāḥ nṛpateḥ
mīna yuga aṅkita pāṇiḥ nityam satra pradaḥ bhavati
vajra ākārāḥ dhaninām vidyā bhājām ca mīna puccha nibhāḥ
śaṅkha ātapatra śivikā gaja aśva padma aupamāḥ nṛpateḥ
kalaśa mṛṇāla patākā aṅkuśa aupamābhiḥ bhavanti nidhi pālāḥ
dāma nibhābhiḥ ca āḍhyāḥ svastika rūpābhiḥ aiśvaryam
cakra asi paraśu tomara śakti dhanuḥ kunta sannibhāḥ rekhāḥ
kurvanti camū nātham yajvānam ulūkhala ākārāḥ
makara dhvaja koṣṭhāgāra sannibhābhiḥ mahādhana upetāḥ
vedī nibhena ca eva agnihotriṇaḥ brahmatīrthena
vāpī devakula ādyaiḥ dharmam kuruvanti ca trikoṇābhiḥ
aṅguṣṭha mūla rekhāḥ putrāḥ syuḥ dārikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ
rekhāḥ śata āyuṣam kalpanīyam ūnābhiḥ
chinnābhiḥ druma patanam bahu rekhā arekhiṇaḥ niḥsvāḥ
ati kṛśa dīrghaiḥ cibukaiḥ nirdravyāḥ māṃsalaiḥ dhana upetāḥ

original: 67.51cd/ vimba[K.bimba]^upamair avakrair adharair bhūpās tanubhir asvāḥ//
analyzed: vimbak bimba aupamaiḥ avakraiḥ adharaiḥ bhūpāḥ tanubhiḥ asvāḥ
oṣṭhaiḥ sphuṭita vikhaṇḍita vivarṇa rūkṣaiḥ ca dhana parityaktāḥ

original: 67.52cd/ snigdhā ghanāś ca daśanāḥ sutīkṣṇa^daṃṣṭrāḥ samāś ca śubhāḥ//
analyzed: snigdhāḥ ghanāḥ ca daśanāḥ su tīkṣṇa daṃṣṭrāḥ samāḥ ca śubhāḥ

original: 67.53ab/ jihvā raktā dīrghā ślakṣṇā susamā ca bhogino[K.bhogināṃ] jñeyā/
analyzed: jihvā raktā dīrghā ślakṣṇā su samā ca jñeyā

original: 67.53cd/ śvetā kṛṣṇā paruṣā nirdravyāṇāṃ tathā tālu//
analyzed: śvetā kṛṣṇā paruṣā nirdravyāṇām tathā tālu

original: 67.54ab/ vaktraṃ saumyaṃ saṃvṛtam amalaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ samaṃ ca bhūpānām/
analyzed: vaktram saumyam saṃvṛtam amalam ślakṣṇam samam ca bhūpānām
viparītam kleśa bhujām mahā mukham durbhagāṇām ca
strī mukham anapatyānām śāṭhyavatām maṇḍalam parijñeyam
dīrgham nirdravyāṇām bhīru mukhāḥ pāpa karmāṇaḥ

original: 67.56ab/ caturasraṃ[K.caturaśraṃ] dhūrtānāṃ nimnaṃ vakraṃ[K.vaktraṃ] ca tanaya^rahitānām/
analyzed: dhūrtānām nimnam ca tanaya rahitānām
kṛpaṇānām ati hrasvam sampūrṇam bhoginām kāntam

original: 67.57ab/ asphuṭita^agraṃ snigdhaṃ śmaśru śubhaṃ mṛdu ca sannataṃ ca^eva/
analyzed: a sphuṭita agram snigdham śmaśru śubham mṛdu ca san natam ca eva

original: 67.57cd/ raktaiḥ paruṣaiś caurāḥ śmaśrubhir alpaiś ca vijñeyāḥ//
analyzed: raktaiḥ paruṣaiḥ caurāḥ śmaśrubhiḥ alpaiḥ ca vijñeyāḥ
nirmāṃsaiḥ karṇaiḥ pāpa mṛtyavaḥ carpaṭaiḥ su bahu bhogāḥ

original: 67.58cd/ kṛpaṇāś ca hrasva^karṇāḥ śaṅku^śravaṇāś camūpatayaḥ[K.ca bhūpatayaḥ]//
analyzed: kṛpaṇāḥ ca hrasva karṇāḥ śaṅku śravaṇāḥ camū patayaḥ ca bhūpatayaḥ
romaśa karṇāḥ dīrgha āyuṣaḥ caktu dhana bhāginaḥ vipula karṇāḥ
krūrāḥ śirā avanaddhaiḥ vyālambaiḥ māṃsalaiḥ sukhinaḥ

original: 67.60ab/ bhogī tv animna^gaṇḍo mantrī sampūrṇa^māṃsa^gaṇḍo yaḥ/
analyzed: bhogī tu a nimna gaṇḍaḥ mantrī sampūrṇa māṃsa gaṇḍaḥ yaḥ
sukha bhāj śuka sama nāsaḥ cira jīvī śuṣka nāsaḥ ca
chinna anurūpayā agamya gāminaḥ dīrghayā tu saubhāgyam
ākuñcitayā cauraḥ strī mṛtyuḥ syāt cipiṭa nāsaḥ
dhaninaḥ agra vakra nāsāḥ dakṣiṇa vinatāḥ kvakrāḥ prabhakṣaṇāḥ krūrāḥ
ṛjvī su alpa chidrā su puṭā nāsā sabhāgyānām

original: 67.63ab/ dhanināṃ kṣutaṃ sakṛd dvi^tri^piṇḍitaṃ hlādi sa^anunādaṃ ca/
analyzed: dhaninām kṣutam sakṛt dvi tri piṇḍitam hlādi sa anunādam ca
dīrgha āyuṣām pramuktam vijñeyam saṃhatam ca eva
padma dala ābhaiḥ dhaninaḥ śriyaḥ bhājaḥ
madhu piṅgalaiḥ mahārthāḥ mārjāra vilocanaiḥ pāpāḥ

original: 67.65ab/ hariṇa^akṣā maṇḍala^locanāś ca jihmaiś ca locanaiś caurāḥ/
analyzed: hariṇa akṣāḥ maṇḍala locanāḥ ca jihmaiḥ ca locanaiḥ caurāḥ

original: 67.65cd/ krūrāḥ kekara^netrā gaja^sadṛśa^*vilocanāś camūpatayaḥ[K.dṛśaś ca bhūpatayaḥ]//
analyzed: krūrāḥ kekara netrāḥ gaja sadṛśa vilocanāḥ camū patayaḥ kdṛśaḥ ca bhūpatayaḥ
aiśvaryam gambhīraiḥ nīlotpala kāntibhiḥ ca vidvāṃsaḥ
ati kṛṣṇa tārakāṇām akṣṇām utpāṭanam bhavati
mantri tvam sthūla dṛśām śyāva akṣāṇām kśyāva akṣāṇām ca bhavati saubhāgyam
dīnā dṛś niḥsvānām snigdhā vipula artha bhogavatām
abhyunnatābhiḥ alpa āyuṣaḥ viśāla aunnatābhiḥ ati sukhinaḥ
viṣama bhruvaḥ daridrāḥ bāla indu nata bhruvaḥ sa dhanāḥ
dīrgha a saṃsaktābhiḥ dhaninaḥ khaṇḍābhiḥ artha parihīnāḥ

original: 67.69cd/ madhya^vinata^bhruvo ye te saktāḥ strīṣv agamyāsu//
analyzed: madhya vinata bhruvaḥ ye te saktāḥ strīṣu agamyāsu
unnata vipulaiḥ śaṅkhaiḥ nimnaiḥ suta artha santyaktāḥ
viṣama lalāṭāḥ vidhanāḥ dhanavantaḥ ardha indu sadṛśena
śukti viśālaiḥ ācārya tā śirā santataiḥ adharma ratāḥ
unnata śirābhiḥ āḍhyāḥ svastika vat saṃsthitābhiḥ ca
nimna lalāṭāḥ vadha bandha bhāginaḥ krūra karma niratāḥ ca
abhyunnataiḥ kṛpaṇāḥ syuḥ saṃvṛta ksaṅkaṭa lalāṭāḥ

original: 67.73ab/ ruditam adīnam anaśru snigdhaṃ ca śubha^āvahaṃ manuṣyāṇām/
analyzed: ruditam adīnam anaśru snigdham ca śubha āvaham manuṣyāṇām

original: 67.73cd/ rūkṣaṃ dīnaṃ pracura^aśru ca^eva na śubha^pradaṃ puṃsām//
analyzed: rūkṣam dīnam pracura aśru ca eva na śubha pradam puṃsām

original: 67.74ab/ hasitaṃ śubhadam akampaṃ sa^nimīlita^locanaṃ tu pāpasya/
analyzed: hasitam śubha dam akampam sa nimīlita locanam tu pāpasya
duṣṭasya khṛṣṭasya hasitam asakṛt sa aunmādasya asakṛt prānte

original: 67.75ab/ tisro rekhāḥ śata^jīvināṃ lalāṭa^āyatāḥ sthitā yadi tāḥ/
analyzed: tisraḥ rekhāḥ śata jīvinām lalāṭa āyatāḥ sthitāḥ yadi tāḥ
catasṛbhiḥ avanīśa tvam navatiḥ ca āyuḥ sa pañca abdā
vicchinnābhiḥ ca agamya gāminaḥ navatiḥ api a rekheṇa
keśa anta aupagatābhiḥ rekhābhiḥ aśīti varṣa āyuḥ

original: 67.77ab/ pañcabhir āyuḥ saptatir eka^agra^avasthitābhir api ṣaṣṭiḥ/
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ āyuḥ saptatiḥ eka agra avasthitābhiḥ api ṣaṣṭiḥ
bahurekheṇa śata ardham catvāriṃśat ca vakrābhiḥ
bhrū lagnābhiḥ ca eva vāma vakrābhiḥ
kṣudrābhiḥ su alpa āyuḥ nyūnābhiḥ ca antare kalpyam
parimaṇḍalaiḥ gava āḍhyāḥ chatra ākāraiḥ śirobhiḥ avanīśāḥ
cipiṭaiḥ pitṛ mātṛ ghnāḥ karoṭi śirasām cirāt mṛtyuḥ
dvi mastakaḥ pāpa kṛt dhanaiḥ tyaktaḥ

original: 67.80cd/ nimnaṃ tu śiro mahatāṃ bahu^nimnam an^arthadaṃ bhavati//
analyzed: nimnam tu śiraḥ mahatām bahu nimnam anartha dam bhavati
eka eka bhavaiḥ snigdhaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ ākuñcitaiḥ abhinna agraiḥ

original: 67.81cd/ mṛdubhir na ca^atibahubhiḥ keśaiḥ sukha^bhāg narendro vā//
analyzed: mṛdubhiḥ na ca ati bahubhiḥ keśaiḥ sukha bhāj narendraḥ vā
bahu mūla viṣama kapilāḥ sthūla sphuṭita agra paruṣa hrasvāḥ ca
ati kuṭilāḥ ca ati ghanāḥ ca mūrdhajāḥ vitta hīnānām

original: 67.83ab/ yad yad gātraṃ rūkṣaṃ māṃsa^vihīnaṃ śira^avanaddhaṃ ca/
analyzed: yat yat gātram rūkṣam māṃsa vihīnam śira avanaddham ca

original: 67.83cd/ tat tad aniṣṭaṃ proktaṃ viparītam ataḥ śubhaṃ sarvam//
analyzed: tat tat aniṣṭam proktam viparītam atas śubham sarvam

original: 67.84ab/ triṣu vipulo gambhīras triṣv eva ṣaḍ^unnataś catur^hrasvaḥ/
analyzed: triṣu vipulaḥ gambhīraḥ triṣu eva ṣaṣ unnataḥ catur hrasvaḥ

original: 67.84cd/ saptasu rakto rājā pañcasu dīrghaś ca sūkṣmaś ca//
analyzed: saptasu raktaḥ rājā pañcasu dīrghaḥ ca sūkṣmaḥ ca
svaraḥ sattvam iti
gambhīram etat tritayam narāṇām
uraḥ lalāṭam vadanam ca puṃsām
vistīrṇam etat tritayam praśastam
vakṣaḥ atha kakṣā nakha nāsikā āsyam
kṛkāṭikā ca eti ṣaḍ unnatāni
hrasvāni catvāri ca liṅga pṛṣṭham
grīvā ca jaṅghe ca hita pradāni

original: 67.87b raktā nakhāś ca khalu sapta sukha^āvahāni/
analyzed: raktāḥ nakhāḥ ca khalu sapta sukha āvahāni
sūkṣmāṇi pañca daśana aṅguli parva keśāḥ

original: 67.87d sākaṃ tvacā *kararuhā na ca[K.kararuhāś ca na] duḥkhitānām//
analyzed: sākam tvacā kararuhāḥ na cakkararuhāḥ ca na duḥkhitānām
hanu locana bāhu nāsikāḥ stanayoḥ antaram atra pañcamam

original: 67.88cd/ iti dīrgham idaṃ tu pañcakaṃ na bhavaty eva nṛṇām abhūbhṛtām//
analyzed: iti dīrgham idam tu pañcakam na bhavati eva nṛṇām a bhūbhṛtām
chāyā śubha aśubha phalāni nivedayantī
lakṣyāḥ manuṣya paśu pakṣiṣu lakṣaṇa jñaiḥ
tejaḥ guṇān bahis api pravikāśayantī
dīpa prabhā sphaṭika ratna ghaṭa sthitā iva
snigdha dvija tvac nakha roma keśa aśkkeśa
chāyā sugandhā ca mahī samutthā
tuṣṭi artha lābha abhyudayān karoti
dharmasya ca ahani ahani pravṛttim
snigdhā sita accha haritā nayana abhirāmā
saubhāgya mārdava sukha abhyudayān karoti
sarva artha siddhi jananī jananī iva ca āpyā
chāyā phalam tanubhṛtām śubham ādadhāti
caṇḍā adhṛṣyā padma hema agni varṇā
yuktā tejaḥ vikramaiḥ sa pratāpaiḥ
āgneyi iti prāṇinām syāt jayāya
kṣipram siddhim vāñchita arthasya
malina paruṣa kṛṣṇā pāpa gandhā anila otthā
janayati vadha bandha vyādhi anartha artha nāśān
sphaṭika sadṛśa rūpā bhāgya yuktā ati udārā
nidhiḥ iva gaganautthā śreyasām su accha varṇā

original: 67.94b ke cid vadanti daśa tāś ca yathā^anupūrvyā/
analyzed: ke cit vadanti daśa tāḥ ca yathāanupūrvyā
sūrya abjanābha puruhūta yama oḍupānām

original: 67.94d tulyās tu lakṣaṇa^phalair iti tat samāsaḥ//
analyzed: tulyāḥ tu lakṣaṇa phalaiḥ iti tat samāsaḥ
kari vṛṣa ratha ogha bherī mṛdaṅga siṃha abhra kabda niḥsvanāḥ bhūpāḥ
gardabha jarjara rūkṣa svarāḥ ca dhana saukhya santyaktāḥ
sapta bhavanti ca sārāḥ medaḥ majjā tvac asthi śukrāṇi

original: 67.96cd/ rudhiraṃ māṃsaṃ ca^iti prāṇa^bhṛtāṃ tat samāsa^phalam//
analyzed: rudhiram māṃsam ca eti prāṇabhṛtām tat samāsa phalam
tālu oṣṭha danta pālī jihvā netra anta pāyu kara caraṇaiḥ
raktekraktaiḥ tu rakta sārāḥ bahu sukha vanitā artha putra yutāḥ

original: 67.98ab/ snigdha^tvakkā dhanino mṛdubhiḥ subhagā vicakṣaṇās tanubhiḥ/
analyzed: snigdha tvakkāḥ dhaninaḥ mṛdubhiḥ subhagāḥ vicakṣaṇāḥ tanubhiḥ
majjā medaḥ sārāḥ su śarīrāḥ

original: 67.99ab/ sthūla^asthir asthi^sāro balavān vidyā^antagaḥ surūpaś ca/
analyzed: sthūla asthiḥ asthi sāraḥ balavān vidyā anta gaḥ surūpaḥ ca
bahu guru śukrāḥ subhagāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ rūpavantaḥ ca

original: 67.100ab/ upacita^deho vidvān dhanī surūpaś ca māṃsa^sāro yaḥ/
analyzed: upacita dehaḥ vidvān dhanī surūpaḥ ca māṃsa sāraḥ yaḥ

original: 67.100cd/ saṅghātā iti ca suśliṣṭa^sandhitā sukha^bhujo jñeyā//
analyzed: saṅghātāḥ iti ca su śliṣṭa sandhi tā sukha bhujaḥ jñeyā
snehaḥ pañcasu lakṣyaḥ vāc jihvā danta netra nakha saṃsthaḥ
suta dhana saubhāgya yutāḥ snigdhaiḥ taiḥ nirdhanāḥ rūkṣaiḥ

original: 67.102ab/ dyutimān varṇa^snigdhaḥ[K.varṇaḥ snigdhaḥ] kṣitipānām madhyamaḥ suta^arthavatām/
analyzed: dyutimān varṇa snigdhaḥ kvarṇaḥ snigdhaḥ kṣitipānām madhyamaḥ suta arthavatām

original: 67.102cd/ rūkṣo dhana^hīnānāṃ śuddhaḥ śubhado na saṅkīrṇaḥ//
analyzed: rūkṣaḥ dhana hīnānām śuddhaḥ śubha daḥ na saṅkīrṇaḥ
sādhyam anūkam vaktrāt go vṛṣa śārdūla siṃha garuḍa mukhāḥ
a pratihata pratāpāḥ jita ripavaḥ mānava aindrāḥ ca
vānara mahiṣa varāha aja tulya vadanāḥ śrutak suta artha sukha bhājaḥ
gardabha karabha pratimaiḥ mukhaiḥ śarīraiḥ ca niḥsva sukhāḥ

original: 67.105ab/ aṣṭa^śataṃ ṣaṇ^ṇavatiḥ[K.ṣaṇavatiḥ] parimāṇaṃ catur^aśītir iti puṃsām/
analyzed: aṣṭaśatam ṣaṇṇavatiḥ kṣaṇavatiḥ parimāṇam caturaśītiḥ iti puṃsām
uttama sama hīnānām aṅgula saṅkhyā sva mānena

original: 67.106ab/ bhāra^ardha^tanuḥ sukha^bhāk tulito +ato duḥkha^bhāg bhavaty ūnaḥ/
analyzed: bhāra ardha tanuḥ sukha bhāj tulitaḥ atas duḥkha bhāj bhavati ūnaḥ
bhāraḥ ati vāḍhyānām adhyardhaḥ sarva dharaṇī īśaḥ

original: 67.107ab/ viṃśati^varṣā nārī puruṣaḥ khalu pañca^viṃśatibhir abdaiḥ/
analyzed: viṃśati varṣā nārī puruṣaḥ khalu pañcaviṃśatibhiḥ abdaiḥ
arhati māna aunmānam jīvita bhāge caturthe vā
bhū jala śikhi anila ambara sura nara rakṣaḥ piśācaka tiraścām

original: 67.108cd/ sattvena bhavati puruṣo lakṣaṇam etad bhavati teṣām[K.eṣām]//
analyzed: sattvena bhavati puruṣaḥ lakṣaṇam etat bhavati teṣām keṣām
sambhogavān su śvasanaḥ sthiraḥ ca
toya svabhāvaḥ bahu toya pāyī
priya abhibhāṣīkabhilāṣī rasa bhājana śkbhojanaḥ ca
agni prakṛtyā capalaḥ ati tīkṣṇaḥ
caṇḍaḥ kṣudhaāluḥ bahu bhojanaḥ ca
vāyoḥ svabhāvena calaḥ kṛśaḥ ca
kṣipram ca kopasya vaśam prayāti
śabdagateḥ kuśalaḥ suśirā aṅgaḥ
puruṣaḥ mṛdu kopaḥ
sneha rataḥ ca bhavet sura sattvaḥ
saṃvibhāga śīlavān nityam eva mānavaḥ
tīkṣṇa prakopaḥ khala ceṣṭitaḥ ca
pāpaḥ ca sattvena niśācarāṇām
bahu pralāpī ca samulbaṇa aṅgaḥ

original: 67.114a bhīruḥ kṣudhā^ālur bahu^bhuk ca yaḥ syād
analyzed: bhīruḥ kṣudhāāluḥ bahu bhuj ca yaḥ syāt
jñeyaḥ sattvena naraḥ tiraścām
evam narāṇām prakṛtiḥ pradiṣṭā
yat lakṣaṇa jñāḥ pravadanti sattvam
śārdūla haṃsa samada dvipa gopatīnām

original: 67.115b tulyā bhavanti gatibhiḥ śikhināṃ ca bhūpāḥ/
analyzed: tulyāḥ bhavanti gatibhiḥ śikhinām ca bhūpāḥ

original: 67.115c yeṣāṃ ca śabda^rahitaṃ stimitaṃ ca yātaṃ
analyzed: yeṣām ca śabda rahitam stimitam ca yātam
te apiiśvarāḥ druta paripluta gāḥ daridrāḥ
śrāntasya yānam aśanam ca bubhukṣitasya
pānam tṛṣā parigatasya bhayeṣu rakṣā
etāni yasya puruṣasya bhavanti kāle
dhanyam vadanti khalu tam nara lakṣaṇa jñāḥ

original: [K.68.117ab/ puruṣa^lakṣaṇam uktam idaṃ mayā muni^matāny avalokya samāsataḥ/
analyzed: puruṣa lakṣaṇam uktam idam mayā muni matāni avalokya samāsatas

original: K.68.117cd/ idam adhītya naro nṛpa^sammato bhavati sarva^janasya ca vallabhaḥ//]
analyzed: idam adhītya naraḥ nṛpa sammataḥ bhavati sarva janasya ca vallabhaḥ
pañca manuṣya vibhāga adhyāyaḥ
tārā grahaiḥ bala yutaiḥ sva kṣetra sva aucca gaiḥ catuṣṭaya gaiḥ

original: 68.01cd/ pañca puruṣāḥ praśastā jāyante tān ahaṃ vakṣye//
analyzed: pañca puruṣāḥ praśastāḥ jāyante tān aham vakṣye

original: 68.02ab/ jīvena bhavati haṃsaḥ saureṇa śaśaḥ kujena rucakaś ca/
analyzed: jīvena bhavati haṃsaḥ saureṇa śaśaḥ kujena rucakaḥ ca
bhadraḥ budhena balinā mālavyaḥ daitya pūjyena

original: 68.03ab/ sattvam ahīnaṃ sūryāt^śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca candra^balāt/
analyzed: sattvam ahīnam sūryāt śārīram mānasam ca candra balāt

original: 68.03cd/ yad rāśi^bheda^yuktāv etau tal lakṣaṇaḥ sa pumān//
analyzed: yat rāśi bheda yuktau etau tat lakṣaṇaḥ sa pumān
tad dhātu mahābhūta prakṛti dyuti varṇa sattva rūpa ādyaiḥ
abala ravi indu yutaiḥ taiḥ saṅkīrṇāḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ puruṣāḥ

original: 68.05ab/ bhaumāt sattvaṃ gurutā budhāt surejyāt svaraḥ sitāt snehaḥ/
analyzed: bhaumāt sattvam gurutā budhāt surejyāt svaraḥ sitāt snehaḥ
varṇaḥ saurāt eṣām guṇa doṣaiḥ sādhu asādhu tvam

original: 68.06ab/ saṅkīrṇāḥ syur na nṛpā daśāsu teṣāṃ bhavanti sukha^bhājaḥ/
analyzed: saṅkīrṇāḥ syuḥ na nṛpāḥ daśāsu teṣām bhavanti sukha bhājaḥ
ripu gṛha nīca aucca cyuta sat pāpa nirīkṣaṇaiḥ

original: 68.07ab/ ṣaṇ^ṇavatir aṅgulānāṃ vyāyāmo dīrghatā ca haṃsasya/
analyzed: ṣaṇṇavatiḥ aṅgulānām vyāyāmaḥ dīrgha tā ca haṃsasya
śaśa rucaka bhadra mālavya saṃjñitāḥ tri aṅgula vivṛddhyā
yaḥ sāttvikaḥ tasya dayā sthira tvam
sattva ārjavam brāhmaṇa deva bhaktiḥ
rajaḥ adhikaḥ kāvya kalā kratu strī
saṃsakta cittaḥ puruṣaḥ ati śūraḥ
tamaḥ adhikaḥ vañcayitā pareṣām
mūrkhaḥ alasaḥ krodha paraḥ atinidraḥ
miśraiḥ guṇaiḥ sattva rajaḥ tamobhiḥ

original: 68.09d miśrās tu te sapta saha prabhedaiḥ//
analyzed: miśrāḥ tu te sapta saha prabhedaiḥ
mālavyaḥ nāga nāsaḥ sama bhujak nāga nāsā sama bhuja yugalaḥ jānu samprāpta hastaḥ

original: 68.10b māṃsaiḥ pūrṇa^aṅga^sandhiḥ sama^rucira^tanur madhya^bhāge kṛśaś ca/
analyzed: māṃsaiḥ pūrṇa aṅga sandhiḥ sama rucira tanuḥ madhyabhāge kṛśaḥ ca

original: 68.10c pañca^aṣṭau ca^ūrdhvam āsyaṃ śruti^vivaram api try^aṅgula^ūnaṃ ca tiryag
analyzed: pañca aṣṭau ca ūrdhvam āsyam śruti vivaram api tri aṅgula ūnam ca tiryak
dīpta akṣam sat kapolam sama sita daśanam na ati māṃsa adhara uṣṭham
mālavān sa bharu kaccha surāṣṭrān
lāṭa sindhu viṣaya prabhṛtīn ca
vikrama ārjita dhanaḥ avati rājā
kṛtabuddhiḥ

original: 68.12ab/ saptati^varṣo mālavyo +ayaṃ tyakṣyati samyak prāṇāṃs tīrthe/
analyzed: saptati varṣaḥ mālavyaḥ ayam tyakṣyati samyak prāṇān tīrthe

original: 68.12cd/ lakṣaṇam etat samyak proktaṃ śeṣa^narāṇāṃ ca^ato vakṣye//
analyzed: lakṣaṇam etat samyak proktam śeṣa narāṇām ca atas vakṣye
upacita sama vṛtta lamba bāhuḥ
bhuja yugala pramitaḥ samucchrayaḥ asya
mṛdu tanu ghana roma naddha gaṇḍaḥ
bhavati naraḥ khalu lakṣaṇena bhadraḥ
tvac śukra sāraḥ pṛthu pīna vakṣāḥ
sattva adhikaḥ vyāghra mukhaḥ sthiraḥ ca
prājñaḥ vapuṣmān su lalāṭa śaṅkhaḥ
kalāsu abhijñaḥ dhṛtimān su kukṣiḥ
saroja garbha dyuti pāṇi pādaḥ
yogī su nāsaḥ sama saṃhata bhrūḥ
śiroruhāḥ ca ekaja kṛṣṇa kuñcitāḥ
turaṅga nāga aupama guhya gūḍha tāk gūḍha guhya tā
hala muśala gadā asi śaṅkha cakra
vibhavam api janaḥ asya bobhujīiti
kṣamati hi na sva janam svatantra buddhiḥ
aṅgulāni navatiḥ ca ṣaḍūnāni
ucchrayeṇa tulayā api hi bhāraḥ
madhyadeśa nṛpatiḥ yadi puṣṭāḥ
tri ādayaḥ asya sakala avani nāthaḥ
bhuktvā samyak vasudhām śauryeṇa aupārjitām aśīti abdaḥ

original: 68.19cd/ tīrthe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā bhadro deva^ālayaṃ yāti//
analyzed: tīrthe prāṇān tyaktvā bhadraḥ devaālayam yāti
īṣat danturakaḥ tanu dvija nakhaḥ kośa īkṣaṇaḥ śīghra gaḥ
śūraḥ mātṛ hitaḥ vana acala nadī durgeṣu saktaḥ śaśaḥ
dīrghaḥ aṅgulānām śatam aṣṭa hīnam
sa āśaṅka ceṣṭaḥ para randhra vid ca
sāraḥ asya majjā nibhṛta pracāraḥ
śaśaḥ hi atokayam na ati guruḥ pradiṣṭaḥ
madhye kṛśaḥ kheṭaka khaḍga vīṇā
paryaṅka mālā muraja anurūpāḥ
śūla aupamāḥ ca ūrdhva gatāḥ ca rekhāḥ
śaśasya pāda aupagatāḥ kare vā
prātyantikaḥ māṇḍalikaḥ atha vā ayam
evam śaśaḥ saptati hāyanaḥ ayam
vaivasvatasya ālayam abhyupaiti
raktam pīna kapolam unnata nasam vaktram suvarṇa aupamam

original: 68.24b vṛttaṃ ca^asya śiro +akṣiṇī madhu^nibhe sarve ca raktā nakhāḥ/
analyzed: vṛttam ca asya śiraḥ akṣiṇī madhu nibhe sarve ca raktāḥ nakhāḥ
sraj dāma aṅkuśa śaṅkha matsya yugala kratu aṅga kumbha ambujaiḥ

original: 68.25ab/ ratir ambhasi śukra^sāratā dvi^guṇā ca^aṣṭa^śataiḥ palair mitiḥ/
analyzed: ratiḥ ambhasi śukra sāra tā dviguṇā ca aṣṭaśataiḥ palaiḥ mitiḥ

original: 68.25cd/ parimāṇam atha^asya ṣaḍ^yutā navatiḥ samparikīrtitā budhaiḥ//
analyzed: parimāṇam atha asya ṣaṣ yutā navatiḥ samparikīrtitā budhaiḥ
bhunakti haṃsaḥ khasa śūrasenān gāndhāragaṅgā yāmunā antarālam

original: 68.26cd/ śataṃ daśa^ūnaṃ śaradāṃ nṛpatvaṃ kṛtvā vana^ante samupaiti mṛtyum//
analyzed: śatam daśa ūnam śaradām nṛpa tvam kṛtvā vana ante samupaiti mṛtyum
su bhrū keśaḥ rakta śyāmaḥ kambu grīvaḥ vyādīrgha āsyaḥ

original: 68.27cd/ śūraḥ krūraḥ śreṣṭho mantrī caura^svāmī vyāyāmī ca//
analyzed: śūraḥ krūraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ mantrī caura svāmī vyāyāmī ca
yad mātram āsyam rucakasya dīrgham
madhya pradeśe catur asra tāc caturaśra tā sā
hantā dviṣām sāhasa siddha kāryaḥ
khaṭvāṅga vīṇā vṛṣa cāpa vajra
bhaktaḥ guru brāhmaṇa devatānām
śata aṅgulaḥ syāt tu sahasra mānaḥ ktulayā sahasram
mantra abhicāra kuśalaḥ kṛśa jānu jaṅghaḥ
vindhyam sa sahya girim ujjayinīm ca bhuktvā
samprāpya saptati samāḥ rucakaḥ narendraḥ
śastreṇa mṛtyum upayāti atha vā analena
pañca apare vāmanakaḥ jaghanyaḥ
kubjaḥ atha vā maṇḍalakaḥ atha sācīksamī
pūrva ukta bhūpa anucarāḥ bhavanti
śṛṇu lakṣaṇaiḥ tān
sampūrṇa aṅgaḥ vāmanaḥ bhagna pṛṣṭhaḥ
kiṃcid ca ūrū madhya kakṣi ak kakṣa antareṣu
khyātaḥ rājñām hi eṣa bhadra anujīvī
sphīṭaḥ rājā akdātā vāsudevasya bhaktaḥ
mālavyasevī tu jaghanya nāmā
śukreṇa sāraḥ piśunaḥ kaviḥ ca
rūkṣa chaviḥ sthūla kara aṅgulīkaḥ
krūraḥ dhanī sthūla matiḥ
tāmra chaviḥ syāt parihāsa śīlaḥ
uraḥ aṅghri kan hri hasteṣu asi śakti pāśa
paraśvadha aṅkaḥ sa kaṅkaḥ ca jaghanya nāmā

original: 68.35a kubjo nāmnā yaḥ sa śuddho hy adhastāt
analyzed: kubjaḥ nāmnā yaḥ sa śuddhaḥ hi adhastāt

original: 68.35b kṣīṇaḥ kiñ cit pūrva^kāye nataś ca/
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ kim cit pūrva kāye nataḥ ca
nāstikaḥ arthaiḥ
vidvān śūraḥ sūcakaḥ syāt kṛtajñaḥ
kalāsu abhijñaḥ kalaha priyaḥ ca
prabhūta bhṛtyaḥ pramadā jitaḥ ca
sampūjya lokam prajahāti akasmāt
kubjaḥ ayam uktaḥ satata audyataḥ ca
maṇḍalaka kṣaṇam umaṇḍalaka lakṣaṇam atas rucaka anucaraḥ abhicāra vid kuśalaḥ
kṛtyāvetāla kvaitāla ādiṣu karmasu vidyāsu ca anurataḥ
vṛddha ākāraḥ khara paruṣa mūrdhajaḥ krūkṣa mūrdhajaḥ ca śatru nāśane kuśalaḥ
dvija deva yajña yoga prasakta dhīḥ strī jitaḥ matimān
yaḥ saḥ ati virūpa dehaḥ
śaśa anugāmī khalu durbhagaḥ ca
dātā mahā ārambha samāpta kāryaḥ
guṇaiḥ śaśasyaḥ eva bhavet samānaḥ
puruṣa lakṣaṇam uktam idam mayā
muni matāni nirīkṣya samāsatas
idam adhītya naraḥ
bhavati sarva janasya ca vallabhaḥ
kanyā lakṣaṇa adhyāyaḥ
snigdha aunnata agra tanu tāmra nakhau kumāryāḥ
pādau sama aupacita cāru nigūḍha gulphau
śliṣṭa aṅgulī kamala kānti talau ca yasyāḥ
tām udvahet yadi bhuvaḥ adhipati tvam icchet
matsya aṅkuśa abja yava vajra hala asi cihna
avasvedanau mṛdu talau caraṇau praśastau
jaṅghe ca roma rahite viśire su vṛtte
jānu dvayam samam anulbaṇa sandhi deśam
ūrū ghanau kari kara pratimau a romau
aśvattha patra sadṛśam vipulam ca guhyam
śroṇī lalāṭam uru kūrma samunnatam ca

original: 69.03d gūḍho maṇiś ca vipulāṃ śriyam ādadhāti//
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ maṇiḥ ca vipulām śriyam ādadhāti
vistīrṇa māṃsa aupacitaḥ nitambaḥ
guruḥ ca dhatte raśanā krasanā kalāpam
nābhiḥ vipula aṅgānām
pradakṣiṇa āvarta gatā ca
madhyam striyāḥ a romaśam ca
vṛttau ghanau aviṣamau kaṭhinau urasyau

analyzed: sarvasya sarvakālam yasmāt upayogam eti śāstram idam
rājñām viśeṣataḥ atas śayana āsana lakṣaṇam vakṣye
asana spandana candana haridra suradāru tindukī śālāḥ
kāśmarī añjana padmaka śākāḥ vā śiṃśapā ca śubhāḥ
aśani jala anila hasti prapātitāḥ madhu vihaṅga kṛta nilayāḥ
caitya śmaśāna pathija ūrdhva śuṣka vallī nibaddhāḥ ca

original: 78.04ab/ kaṇṭakino *ye ca[K.vā ye] syur mahānadī^saṅgama^udbhavā ye ca/
analyzed: kaṇṭakinaḥ ye cakvāḥ ye syuḥ mahā nadī saṅgama audbhavāḥ ye ca

original: 78.04cd/ surabhavanajāś ca na śubhā ye ca^apara^yāmya^dik^patitāḥ//
analyzed: sura bhavana jāḥ ca na śubhāḥ ye ca apara yāmya diś patitāḥ
pratiṣiddha vṛkṣa nirmita śayana āsana sevanāt kula vināśaḥ
vyādhi bhaya vyaya kalahāḥ bhavanti ca anekavidhāḥ

original: 78.06ab/ pūrvacchinnaṃ yadi vā dāru bhavet tat parīkṣyam ārambhe/
analyzed: pūrva chinnam yadi vā dāru bhavet tat parīkṣyam ārambhe

original: 78.06cd/ yady ārohet tasmin kumārakaḥ putra^paśu^daṃ tat//
analyzed: yadi ārohet tasmin kumārakaḥ putra paśu dam tat

original: 78.07cd/ maṅgalyāny anyāni ca dṛṣṭvā^ārambhe śubhaṃ jñeyam//
analyzed: maṅgalyāni anyāni ca dṛṣṭvā ārambhe śubham jñeyam
karma aṅgulam yava aṣṭakam udara āsaktam tuṣaiḥ parityaktam

original: 78.08cd/ aṅgulaśataṃ nṛpāṇāṃ mahatī śayyā jayāya kṛtā//
analyzed: aṅgula śatam nṛpāṇām mahatī śayyā jayāya kṛtā

original: 78.09ab/ navatiḥ saiva ṣaḍūnā dvādaśahīnā triṣaṭkahīnā ca/
analyzed: navatiḥ sā eva ṣaṣ ūnā dvādaśa hīnā triṣaṭka hīnā ca
nṛpa putra mantri bala pati purodhasām syuḥ yathāsaṅkhyam
ardham atas aṣṭa aṃśa ūnam viṣkambhaḥ viśvakarmaṇā proktaḥ
āyāma tri aṃśa samaḥ pāda aucchrāyaḥ sa kukṣi ak sa kukṣi śirāḥ

original: 78.11ab/ yaḥ sarvaḥ śrīparṇyā paryaṅko nirmitaḥ sa dhanadātā/
analyzed: yaḥ sarvaḥ śrīparṇyā paryaṅkaḥ nirmitaḥ sa dhana dātā

original: 78.12ab/ yaḥ kevalaśiṃśapayā vinirmito bahuvidhaṃ sa vṛddhikaraḥ/
analyzed: yaḥ kevala śiṃśapayā vinirmitaḥ bahuvidham sa vṛddhi karaḥ

original: 78.13ab/ yaḥ padmaka^paryaṅkaḥ sa dīrgham āyuḥ śriyaṃ śrutaṃ vittam/
analyzed: yaḥ padmaka paryaṅkaḥ sa dīrgham āyuḥ śriyam śrutam vittam

original: 78.13cd/ kurute śālena kṛtaḥ kalyāṇaṃ śākaracitaś ca//
analyzed: kurute śālena kṛtaḥ kalyāṇam śāka racitaḥ ca
kevala candana racitam kāñcana guptam vicitra ratna yutam

original: 78.14cd/ adhyāsan paryaṅkaṃ vibudhair api pūjyate nṛpatiḥ//
analyzed: adhyāsan paryaṅkam vibudhaiḥ api pūjyate nṛpatiḥ

original: 78.15ab/ anyena samāyuktā na tindukī śiṃśapā ca śubhaphaladā/
analyzed: anyena samāyuktā na tindukī śiṃśapā ca śubha phala dā

original: 78.15cd/ na *śrīparṇena[K.śrīparṇī na] ca devadāruvṛkṣo na ca^apy asanaḥ//
analyzed: na na na ca devadāru vṛkṣaḥ na ca api asanaḥ

original: 78.16ab/ śubhadau tu śāla^śākau[K.śākaśālau] parasparaṃ saṃyutau pṛthak ca^eva/
analyzed: śubha dau tu parasparam saṃyutau pṛthak ca eva

original: 78.16cd/ tadvat pṛthak praśastau sahitau ca haridraka^kadambau//
analyzed: tadvat pṛthak praśastau sahitau ca haridraka kadambau

original: 78.17ab/ sarvaḥ spandana^racito na śubhaḥ prāṇān hinasti ca^ambakṛtaḥ/
analyzed: sarvaḥ spandana racitaḥ na śubhaḥ prāṇān hinasti caamba kṛtaḥ
asanaḥ anya dāru sahitaḥ kṣipram doṣān karoti bahūn
amba spandana candana vṛkṣāṇām spandanāt śubhāḥ pādāḥ
phala taruṇā śayana āsanam iṣṭa phalam bhavati sarveṇa
gajadantaḥ sarveṣām prokta tarūṇām praśasyate yoge
kāryaḥ alaṅkāra vidhiḥ gaja dantena praśastena
dantasya mūla paridhim dvis āyatam prohya kalpayet śeṣam

original: 78.20cd/ adhikam anūpacarāṇāṃ nyūnaṃ giricāriṇāṃ kiñ cit//
analyzed: adhikam anūpa carāṇām nyūnam giri cāriṇām kim cit
śrīvṛkṣa kśrīvatsa vardhamāna chatra dhvaja cāmara anurūpeṣu
chede dṛṣṭeṣu ārogya karogya vijaya dhana vṛddhi saukhyāni
praharaṇa sadṛśeṣu jayaḥ nandyāvarte pranaṣṭa deśa āptiḥ

original: 78.22cd/ loṣṭhe[K.ū.loṣṭe] tu labdhapūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ//
analyzed: tu labdha pūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ
strī rūpe dhana nāśa uksva vināśaḥ bhṛṅgāre abhyutthite suta autpattiḥ
kumbhena nidhi prāptiḥ yātrā vighnam ca daṇḍena
kṛkalāsa kapi bhujaṅgeṣu a subhikṣa vyādhayaḥ ripu vaśi tvam kvaśa tvam
gṛdhra aulūka dhvāṅkṣa śyena ākāreṣu jana marakaḥ

original: 78.25ab/ pāśe +atha vā kabandhe nṛpa^mṛtyur janavipat srute rakte/
analyzed: pāśe atha vā kabandhe nṛpa mṛtyuḥ jana vipad srute rakte

original: 78.25cd/ kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe cāśubhaṃ bhavati//
analyzed: kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe ca aśubham bhavati

original: 78.26ab/ śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaś ca śubhāvaho bhavec chedaḥ/
analyzed: śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaḥ ca śubha āvahaḥ bhavet chedaḥ

original: 78.26cd/ aśubha^śubhacchedā ye śayaneṣv api te tathā phaladāḥ//
analyzed: aśubha śubha chedāḥ ye śayaneṣu api te tathā phala dāḥ
īṣā yoge dāru pradakṣiṇa agram praśastam ācāryaiḥ
apasavya eka diś agre bhavati bhayam bhūta sañjanitam
ekena avākśirasā akekena avākchirasā bhavati hi pādena pāda vaikalyam
dvābhyām na jīryate annam tri caturbhiḥ kleśa vadha bandhāḥ

original: 78.29ab/ suṣire +atha vā vivarṇe granthau pādasya śīrṣage vyādhiḥ/
analyzed: suṣire atha vā vivarṇe granthau pādasya śīrṣa ge vyādhiḥ

original: 78.29cd/ pāde kumbho yaś ca granthau tasminn udararogaḥ//
analyzed: pāde kumbhaḥ yaḥ ca granthau tasmin udara rogaḥ

original: 78.30ab/ kumbha^adhastāj jaṅghā tatra kṛto jaṅghayoḥ karoti bhayam/
analyzed: kumbha adhastāt jaṅghā tatra kṛtaḥ jaṅghayoḥ karoti bhayam

original: 78.30cd/ tasyāś ca^ādharo +adhaḥ kṣayakṛd dravyasya tatra kṛtaḥ//
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca adharaḥ adhas kṣaya kṛt dravyasya tatra kṛtaḥ

original: 78.31ab/ khuradeśe yo granthiḥ khuriṇāṃ pīḍākaraḥ sa nirdiṣṭaḥ/
analyzed: khura deśe yaḥ granthiḥ khuriṇām pīḍā karaḥ sa nirdiṣṭaḥ

original: 78.31cd/ īṣā^śīrṣaṇyoś ca tribhāga^saṃstho bhaven na śubhaḥ//
analyzed: īṣā śīrṣaṇyoḥ ca tri bhāga saṃsthaḥ bhavet na śubhaḥ

original: 78.32ab/ niṣkuṭam atha kolākṣaṃ sūkaranayanaṃ ca vatsanābhaṃ ca/
analyzed: niṣkuṭam atha kolākṣam sūkaranayanam ca vatsanābham ca

original: 78.32cd/ kālakam anyad dhundhukam iti kathitaś chidra^saṃkṣepaḥ//
analyzed: kālakam anyat dhundhukam iti kathitaḥ chidra saṃkṣepaḥ

original: 78.33ab/ ghaṭavat suṣiraṃ madhye saṅkaṭam āsye ca niṣkuṭaṃ chidram/
analyzed: ghaṭa vat suṣiram madhye saṅkaṭam āsye ca niṣkuṭam chidram
niṣpāva māṣa mātram nīlam chidram ca kola akṣam
sūkara nayanam viṣamam vivarṇam adhyardha parva dīrgham ca
vāma āvartam bhinnam parva mitam vatsanābha ākhyam

original: 78.35ab/ kālakasaṃjñaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ dhundhukam iti yad bhaved vinirbhinnam/
analyzed: kālaka saṃjñam kṛṣṇam dhundhukam iti yat bhavet vinirbhinnam

original: 78.35cd/ dārusavarṇaṃ chidraṃ na tathā pāpaṃ samuddiṣṭam//
analyzed: dāru savarṇam chidram na tathā pāpam samuddiṣṭam
niṣkuṭa saṇjñe dravya kṣayaḥ tu kola īkṣaṇe kula dhvaṃsaḥ
śastra bhayam sūkarake roga bhayam vatsanābha ākhye

original: 78.37ab/ kālaka^dhundhuka^saṃjñaṃ kīṭair viddhaṃ ca na śubhadaṃ chidram/
analyzed: kālakadhundhuka saṃjñam kīṭaiḥ viddham ca na śubha dam chidram

original: 78.37cd/ sarvaṃ granthipracuraṃ sarvatra na śobhanaṃ dāru//
analyzed: sarvam granthi pracuram sarvatra na śobhanam dāru
eka drumeṇa dhanyam vṛkṣa dvaya nirmitam ca dhanyataram

original: 78.38cd/ tribhir ātmaja^vṛddhikaraṃ caturbhir arthaṃ[K.artho] yaśaś cāgryam//
analyzed: tribhiḥ ātmaja vṛddhi karam caturbhiḥ arthaṃkarthaḥ yaśaḥ ca agryam

original: 78.39ab/ pañca^vanaspati^racite pañcatvaṃ yāti tatra yaḥ śete/
analyzed: pañca vanaspati racite pañcatvam yāti tatra yaḥ śete
ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa tarūṇām kāṣṭhaiḥ ghaṭite kula vināśaḥ
ratna parīkṣā adhyāyaḥ

original: 79.01ab/ ratnena śubhena śubhaṃ bhavati nṛpāṇām aniṣṭam aśubhena/
analyzed: ratnena śubhena śubham bhavati nṛpāṇām aniṣṭam aśubhena

original: 79.01cd/ yasmād ataḥ parīkṣyaṃ daivaṃ ratnāśritam tajjñaiḥ//
analyzed: yasmāt atas parīkṣyam daivam ratna āśritam tad jñaiḥ
dvipa haya vanitā ādīnām sva guṇa viśeṣeṇa ratna śabdaḥ asti
iha tu upala ratnānām adhikāraḥ vajra pūrvāṇām

original: 79.03ab/ ratnāni balād daityād dadhīcito +anye vadanti jātāni/
analyzed: ratnāni balāt daityāt dadhīcitaḥ anye vadanti jātāni

original: 79.03cd/ ke cid bhuvaḥ svabhāvād vaicitryaṃ prāhur upalānām//
analyzed: ke cit bhuvaḥ svabhāvāt vaicitryam prāhuḥ upalānām
vajra aindranīla marakata karketara padmarāga rudhira ākhyāḥ
vaidūrya kvaiḍūrya pulaka vimalaka rājamaṇi sphatika śaśi kāntāḥ
saugandhika gomedaka śaṅkha mahānīla puṣparāga ākhyāḥ
veṇā taṭe viśuddham ca kauśalakam
saurāṣṭrakam ātāmram kṛṣṇam saurpārakam vajram
īṣat tāmram himavati mataṅga jam valla puṣpa saṅkāśam

original: 79.07cd/ āpītaṃ ca kaliṅge śyāmaṃ pauṇḍreṣu sambhūtam//
analyzed: āpītam ca kaliṅge śyāmam pauṇḍreṣu sambhūtam

original: 79.08ab/ aindraṃ ṣaḍaśri śuklaṃ yāmyaṃ sarpa^āsya^rūpam asitaṃ ca/
analyzed: aindram ṣaṣ aśri śuklam yāmyam sarpa āsya rūpam asitam ca
kadalī kāṇḍa nikāśam vaiṣṇavam iti sarva saṃsthānam
bhavet
śṛṅgāṭaka saṃsthānam vyāghra akṣi nibham ca hauta bhujam
vāyavyam ca yava aupamam aśoka kusuma prabham samuddiṣṭam

original: 79.10cd/ srotaḥ khaniḥ prakīrṇakam ity ākara^sambhavas trividhaḥ//
analyzed: srotaḥ khaniḥ prakīrṇakam iti ākara sambhavaḥ trividhaḥ

original: 79.11ab/ raktaṃ pītaṃ ca śubham rājanyānām sitam dvijātīnām/
analyzed: raktam pītam ca śubham rājanyānām sitam dvijātīnām
śairīṣam vaiśyānām śūdrāṇām śasyate asi nibham

original: 79.12ab/ sitasarṣapa^aṣṭakaṃ taṇḍulo bhavet taṇḍulais tu viṃśatyā/
79.12cd/ tulitasya dve lakṣe mūlyaṃ dvidvyūnite caitat//
analyzed: tulitasya dve lakṣe mūlyam dvi dvi ūnite ca etat
pāda tri aṃśa ardha ūnam tri bhāga pañca aṃśa ṣoḍaśa aṃśāḥ ca

original: 79.13cd/ bhāgaś ca pañcaviṃśaḥ śatikas sāhasrikaś ca^iti//
analyzed: bhāgaḥ ca pañcaviṃśaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasrikaḥ ca eti

original: 79.14ab/ sarva^dravya^ābhedyaṃ laghv ambhasi tarati raśmivat snighdam/
analyzed: sarva dravya ābhedyam laghu ambhasi tarati raśmi vat snighdam
taḍit anala śakracāpa aupamam ca vajram hitāya uktam
kākapada makṣikā keśa dhātu yuktāni śarkaraiḥ kśarkarā viddham
dviguṇa aśri dagdhak digdha kaluṣa trasta viśīrṇāni na śubhāni
yāni ca budbuda dalita agra cipiṭa vāsī phala pradīrghāṇi
sarveṣām ca eteṣām mūlyāt bhāgaḥ aṣṭamaḥ hāniḥ

original: 79.17a vajraṃ na kiñ cid api dhārayitavyam eke
analyzed: vajram na kim cit api dhārayitavyam eke
putra arthinībhiḥ abalābhiḥ uśanti tad jñāḥ
śṛṅgāṭaka tripuṭa dhānyaka vat sthitam yat
śroṇī nibham ca śubha dam tanaya arthinīnām
sva jana vibhava jīvita kṣayam janayati vajram aniṣṭa lakṣaṇam
aśani viṣa bhaya ari nāśanam śubham upabhoga karam kuru bhoga kara ca bhūbhṛtām
dvipa bhujaga śukti śaṅkha abhra veṇu timi sūkara prasūtāni

original: 80.01cd/ muktāphalāni teṣāṃ bahusādhu ca śuktijaṃ bhavati//
analyzed: muktāphalāni teṣām bahu sādhu ca śuktijam bhavati
siṃhalaka pāralaukika saurāṣṭrika tāmraparṇi pāraśavāḥ
kaubera pāṇḍya vāṭaka haimāḥ iti ākarāḥ tu khi aṣṭau
bahu saṃsthānāḥ snigdhāḥ ksnigdhāḥ haṃsa ābhāḥ siṃhala ākarāḥ sthūlāḥ
īṣat tāmrāḥ śvetāḥ tamaḥ viyuktāḥ ca tāmra ākhyāḥ

original: 80.04ab/ kṛṣṇāḥ śvetāḥ pītāḥ saśarkarāḥ pāralaukikā viṣamāḥ/
analyzed: kṛṣṇāḥ śvetāḥ pītāḥ sa śarkarāḥ pāralaukikāḥ viṣamāḥ

original: 80.04cd/ na sthūlā nātyalpā navanīta^nibhāś ca saurāṣṭrāḥ//
analyzed: na sthūlāḥ na ati alpāḥ navanīta nibhāḥ ca saurāṣṭrāḥ
śubhrāḥ guravaḥ ati mahā guṇāḥ ca pāraśavāḥ

original: 80.05cd/ laghu jarjaraṃ dadhinibhaṃ *bṛhad dvisaṃsthānam[K.bṛhadvisaṃsthānam] api haimam//
analyzed: laghu jarjaram dadhi nibham bṛhat dvi saṃsthānam kbṛhat vi saṃsthānam api haimam

original: 80.06ab/ viṣamam kṛṣṇa^śvetaṃ[K.kṛṣṇam śvetam] laghu kauberaṃ pramāṇa^tejovat/
analyzed: viṣamam śvetam laghu kauberam pramāṇa tejovat
atasī kusuma śyāmam vaiṣṇavam aindram śaśāṅka saṅkāśam
haritāla nibham vāruṇam asitam yama daivatam bhavati
pariṇata dāḍima gulikā guñjā tāmram ca vāyu daivatyam
nirdhūma anala kamala prabham ca vijñeyam āgneyam
māṣaka catuṣṭaya dhṛtasya ekasya śata āhatā tripañcāśat
kārṣāpaṇā nigaditā mūlyam tejaḥ guṇa yutasya
māṣaka dala hānyāḥ atas dvātriṃśat viṃśatiḥ trayodaśa ca

original: 80.10cd/ aṣṭau ca śatāni śatatrayaṃ tripañcāśatā sahitam//
analyzed: aṣṭau ca śatāni śata trayam tripañcāśatā sahitam

original: 80.11ab/ pañcatriṃśaṃ śatam iti catvāraḥ kṛṣṇalā navatimūlyāḥ/
analyzed: pañcatriṃśam śatam iti catvāraḥ kṛṣṇalāḥ navati mūlyāḥ

original: 80.11cd/ sārdhās tisro guñjāḥ saptatimūlyaṃ dhṛtaṃ rūpam//
analyzed: sārdhāḥ tisraḥ guñjāḥ saptati mūlyam dhṛtam rūpam
guñjā trayasya mūlyam pañcāśat rūpakāḥ guṇa yutasya
rūpaka pañcatriṃśat trayasya guñjā ardha hīnasya

original: 80.13ab/ paladaśabhāgo dharaṇaṃ tad yadi muktās trayodaśa surūpāḥ/
analyzed: pala daśa bhāgaḥ dharaṇam tat yadi muktāḥ trayodaśa surūpāḥ
triśatī utriṃśatī sa pañcaviṃśā rūpaka saṅkhyā kṛtam mūlyam
ṣoḍaśakasya dviśatī viṃśati rūpasya saptatiḥ sa śatā
yat pañcaviṃśati dhṛtam tasya śatam triṃśatā sahitam
triṃśat saptati mūlyam catvāriṃśat śata ardha mūlyā aṃk mūlyā ca

original: 80.15cd/ ṣaṣṭiḥ pañconā vā dharaṇam pañca^aṣṭakaṃ mūlyam//
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ pañca ūnā vā dharaṇam pañca aṣṭakam mūlyam
mukta aśītyā triṃśat śatasya sā pañca rūpaka vihīnā
dvi tri catur pañca śatā dvādaśa ṣaṣ pañcaka tritayam
pikkā piccā aarghā ardhāḥ ravakaḥ siktham trayodaśa ādyānām
saṃjṇāḥ paratas nigarāḥ cūrṇāḥ ca aśīti pūrvāṇām
etad guṇa yuktānām dharaṇa dhṛtānām mūlyam
parikalpyam antarāle hīna guṇāṇām kṣayaḥ kāryaḥ
kṛṣṇa śvetaka pītaka tāmrāṇām īṣat api ca viṣamāṇām
tri aṃśa ūnam viṣamaka pītayoḥ ca ṣaṣ bhāga dala hīnam
airāvata kula jānām puṣya śravaṇa aindusūrya divaseṣu
ye ca uttarāyaṇa bhavāḥ grahaṇe arka indvoḥ ca bhadra ibhāḥ

original: 80.21ab/ teṣāṃ kila jāyante muktāḥ kumbheṣu saradakośeṣu/
analyzed: teṣām kila jāyante muktāḥ kumbheṣu sarada kośeṣu
bahavaḥ bṛhat pramāṇāḥ bahu saṃsthānāḥ prabhā yuktāḥ

original: 80.22ab/ naiṣām arghaḥ kāryo na ca vedho +atīva te prabhāyuktāḥ/
analyzed: na eṣām arghaḥ kāryaḥ na ca vedhaḥ atīva te prabhā yuktāḥ

analyzed: akāraṇe krośati ced anarthaḥ bhayāya rātrau vṛṣabhaḥ śivāya

original: 91.02cd/ bhṛśaṃ niruddhā yadi makṣikābhis tadā^āśu vṛṣṭiṃ saramātmajair vā//
analyzed: bhṛśam niruddhāḥ yadi makṣikābhiḥ tadā āśu vṛṣṭim saramātmajaiḥ vā
āgacchantyaḥ veśma bambhāraveṇa
saṃsevantyaḥ goṣṭha vṛddhyai gavām gāḥ
ārdra aṅgyaḥ vā hṛṣṭa romṇyaḥ prahṛṣṭā
dhanyāḥ gāvaḥ syuḥ mahiṣyaḥ api ca evam
aśveṅgita adhyāyaḥ
utsargāt na śubha dam āsanāt
vāme ca jvalanam atas aparam praśastam
sarva aṅga jvalanam avṛddhi dam hayānām

original: 92.01d dve varṣe dahana^kaṇāś ca dhūpanaṃ vā//
analyzed: dve varṣe dahana kaṇāḥ ca dhūpanam vā
antaḥpuram nāśam upaiti meḍhre

original: 92.02c pāyau ca pucche ca parājayaḥ syād
analyzed: pāyau ca pucche ca parājayaḥ syāt

skandha āsana aṃsa jvalanam jayāya
bandhāya pāda jvalanam pradiṣṭam
lalāṭa vakṣaḥ akṣi bhuje cakakṣi bhujeṣu dhūmaḥ

nāsā puṭa protha śiraḥ aśru pāta
netre caknetreṣu rātrau jvalanam jayāya
palāśa tāmra asita karburāṇām
nityam śuka ābhasya sitasya ca eṣṭam

original: 92.05a pradveṣo yavasa^ambhasāṃ prapatanaṃ svedo nimittād vinā
analyzed: pradveṣaḥ yavasa ambhasām prapatanam svedaḥ nimittāt vinā

original: 92.05b kampo vā vadanāc ca rakta^patanaṃ dhūmasya vā sambhavaḥ/
analyzed: kampaḥ vā vadanāt ca rakta patanam dhūmasya vā sambhavaḥ

original: 92.05c asvapnaś ca virodhināṃ[K.virodhitā] niśi divā nidrā^alasa^dhyānatā/
analyzed: asvapnaḥ ca virodhinām kvirodhi tā niśi divā nidrā alasa dhyāna tā

original: 92.05d sādo +adho^mukhatā viceṣṭitam idaṃ neṣṭaṃ smṛtaṃ vājinām//
analyzed: sādaḥ adhomukhatā viceṣṭitam idam na iṣṭam smṛtam vājinām
ārohaṇam anya vājinām paryāṇa ādi yutasya vājinaḥ
upavāhya turaṅgamasya vā kalpasya eva vipanna śobhanā
krauñca vat ripu vadhāya
grīvayā tu acalayā ca
snigdham uccam anunādi hṛṣṭavat
grāsa ruddha vadanaiḥ ca vājibhiḥ
gandha puṣpa phala kāñcana ādi vā

original: 92.08c dravyam iṣṭam atha vā paraṃ bhaved
analyzed: dravyam iṣṭam atha vā param bhavet
yadi samīpatas jayaḥ

patyuḥ aupayika nandinaḥ atha vā
savya pārśva gata dṛṣṭayaḥ atha vā
vāñchita artha phala dāḥ turaṅgamāḥ
vāmaiḥ ca pādaiḥ abhitāḍayantaḥ mahīm
pravāsāya bhavanti bhartuḥ
sandhyāsu dīptām avalokayantaḥ
ced bandha parājayāya
atīva kiranti vālān
nidrā ratāḥ ca pravadanti yātrām
romatyajaḥ dīna khara svarāḥ ca
pāṃśūn grasantaḥ ca bhayāya dṛṣṭāḥ
samudga vat dakṣiṇa pārśva śāyinaḥ
padam samutkṣipya ca dakṣiṇam sthitāḥ
jayāya śeṣeṣu api vāhaneṣu idam
phalam yathāsambhavam ādiśet budhaḥ
ārohati kṣitipatau vinayaupapanno
yātrā anugaḥ anya turagam ca
vaktreṇa vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātma pārśvam

original: 92.13d yo +aśvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm//
analyzed: yaḥ aśvaḥ sa bhartuḥ acirāt pracinoti lakṣmīm
muhur muhur mūtra śakṛt karoti
na tāḍyamānaḥ api anuloma yāyī
akārya bhītaḥ aśru vilocanaḥ ca
śivaṃkśubham na bhartuḥ turagaḥ abhidhatte

original: 92.15ab/ uktam idaṃ haya^ceṣṭitam ata ūrdhvaṃ dantināṃ pravakṣyāmi/
analyzed: uktam idam haya ceṣṭitam atas ūrdhvam dantinām pravakṣyāmi
teṣām tu danta kalpana bhaṅga mlāna ādi ceṣṭābhiḥ

original: 93.01ab/ dantasya mūla^paridhiṃ dvir āyataṃ prohya kalpayet^śeṣam/
analyzed: dantasya mūla paridhim dvis āyatam prohya kalpayet śeṣam

original: 93.01cd/ adhikam anūpa^carāṇāṃ nyūnaṃ giri^cāriṇāṃ kiñ cit//
analyzed: adhikam anūpa carāṇām nyūnam giri cāriṇām kim cit

chede dṛṣṭeṣu ārogya vijaya dhana vṛddhi saukhyāni

original: 93.03cd/ loṣṭe tu labdha^pūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ//
analyzed: loṣṭe tu labdha pūrvasya bhavati deśasya samprāptiḥ
strī rūpe bhṛṅgāre abhyutthite
kumbhena nidhi prāptiḥ yātrā vighnam ca daṇḍena
kṛkalāsa kapi bhujaṅgeṣu a subhikṣa vyādhayaḥ ripu vaśi tvam kvaśa tvam
gṛdhra aulūka dhvāṅkṣa śyena ākāreṣu jana marakaḥ

original: 93.06ab/ pāśe +atha vā kabandhe nṛpa^mṛtyur jana^vipat srute rakte/
analyzed: pāśe atha vā kabandhe nṛpa mṛtyuḥ jana vipad srute rakte

original: 93.06cd/ kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe ca^aśubhaṃ bhavati//
analyzed: kṛṣṇe śyāve rūkṣe durgandhe ca aśubham bhavati

original: 93.07ab/ śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaś ca śubha^āvaho bhavec chedaḥ/
analyzed: śuklaḥ samaḥ sugandhiḥ snigdhaḥ ca śubha āvahaḥ bhavet chedaḥ
galana mlāna phalāni ca dantasya samāni bhaṅgena
deva daitya manujāḥ kramāt tatas
sphīta madhya paripelavam phalam
śīghra madhya cira kāla sambhavam
danta bhaṅga phalam atra dakṣiṇe bhūpadeśa bala vidrava pradam
vāmatas hanti sa āṭavika dāra nāyakān
ādiśet ubhaya bhaṅga darśanāt pārthivasya sakalam kula kṣayam
saumya lagna tithi bha ādibhiḥ śubham vardhate aśubham atas anyathā
kṣīra mṛṣṭa kṣīravṛkṣa phala puṣpa pādapeṣu āpagā taṭa vighaṭṭitena vā
skhalita gatiḥ akasmāt trasta karṇaḥ ati dīnaḥ
śvasiti mṛdu su dīrgham nyasta hastaḥ pṛthivyām
druta mukulita dṛṣṭiḥ svapna śīlaḥ
bhaya kṛt ahita bhakṣī na ekaśas ca

original: 93.13b yāyād yātrā^anulomaṃ tvarita^pada^gatir vaktram unnāmya ca^uccaiḥ/
analyzed: yāyāt yātrā anulomam tvarita pada gatiḥ vaktram unnāmya ca auccais

original: 93.13c kakṣyā^sannāha^kāle janayati ca muhuḥ śīkaraṃ bṛṃhitaṃ vā

original: 93.13d tatkāle[K.tatkālaṃ] vā madāptir jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan dakṣiṇaṃ ca//
analyzed: vā mada āptiḥ jaya kṛt atha radam veṣṭayan dakṣiṇam ca
praveśanam vāriṇi vāraṇasya
grāheṇa nāśāya bhavet nṛpasya
grāham gṛhotvā ak grihītvā uttaraṇam nṛpasya kū dvipasya
toyāt sthalam vṛddhi karam nṛ bhartuḥ
vāyasaviruta adhyāyaḥ

original: 94.01ab/ prācyānāṃ dakṣiṇataḥ śubhadāḥ[K.śubhadaḥ] kākāḥ karāyikā vāmāḥ[K.vāmā]/
analyzed: prācyānām dakṣiṇatas śubha dāḥ śubha daḥ kākāḥ karāyikāḥ vāmāḥ kvāmā
viparītam anya deśeṣu avadhiḥ loka prasiddhyā eva
vaiśākhe nirupahate vṛkṣe nīḍaḥ subhikṣa śiva dātā
nindita kaṇṭaki śuṣkeṣu asubhikṣa bhayāni tad deśe

original: 94.03ab/ nīḍe prāk śākhāyāṃ śaradi bhavet prathama^vṛṣṭir aparasyām/
analyzed: nīḍe prāk śākhāyām śaradi bhavet prathama vṛṣṭiḥ aparasyām

original: 94.04cd/ pariśeṣayoḥ subhikṣaṃ mūṣaka^*sampac ca[K.sampat tu] vāyavye//
analyzed: pariśeṣayoḥ subhikṣam mūṣaka sampad caksampad tu vāyavye
śara darbha gulma vallī dhānya prāsāda geha nimneṣu

original: 94.07ab/ cauraka^varṇaiś caurāś citrair mṛtyuḥ sitais tu vahni^bhayam/
analyzed: cauraka varṇaiḥ caurāḥ citraiḥ mṛtyuḥ sitaiḥ tu vahni bhayam
vikalaiḥ durbhikṣa bhayam kākānām nirdiśet śiśubhiḥ

rodhaḥ cakra ākāraiḥ abhighātaḥ varga varga sthaiḥ

original: 94.09ab/ abhayāś ca tuṇḍa^pakṣaiś caraṇa^vighātair janān abhibhavantaḥ/
analyzed: abhayāḥ ca tuṇḍapakṣaiḥ caraṇa vighātaiḥ janān abhibhavantaḥ
kurvanti śatru vṛddhim niśi vicarantaḥ jana vināśam

original: 94.10ab/ savyena khe bhramadbhiḥ svabhayaṃ viparīta^maṇḍalaiś ca parāt/
analyzed: savyena khe bhramadbhiḥ sva bhayam viparīta maṇḍalaiḥ ca parāt
ati ākulam bhramadbhiḥ vāta audbhramaḥ bhavati kākaiḥ

original: 94.11ab/ ūrdhva^mukhāś cala^pakṣāḥ pathi bhayadāḥ kṣud^bhayāya dhānya^muṣaḥ/

sutasya janma api atha aṅganāyāḥ ca o janma anyathā aṅganāyāḥ ca

original: 94.13cd/ bhayado jana^saṃvāsād yadi bhāṇḍāny apanayet kākaḥ//

original: 94.15ab/ yad dravyam upanayet tasya labdhir apaharati cet praṇāśaḥ syāt/

original: 94.16cd/ prāvṛṣi vṛṣṭiṃ durdinam anṛtau snātāś ca pāṃśu^jalaiḥ//
analyzed: prāvṛṣi vṛṣṭim durdinam anṛtau snātāḥ ca pāṃśu jalaiḥ

original: 94.18cd/ rakta^dravyaṃ dagdhaṃ tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhe vidadhat//
analyzed: rakta dravyam dagdham tṛṇa kāṣṭham vā gṛhe vidadhat

original: 94.19ab/ aindrya^ādi^dig avalokī sūrya^abhimukho ruvan gṛhe gṛhinaḥ/
analyzed: aindrya ādi diś avalokī sūrya abhimukhaḥ ruvan gṛhe gṛhinaḥ
rāja bhaya cora bandhana kalahāḥ syuḥ paśu bhayam ca eti
śāntām aindrīm avalokayan ruyāt rāja puruṣa mitra āptiḥ

vāruṇyām māṃsa surā āsava dhānya samudra ratna āptiḥ
mārutyām śastra āyudha saroja vallī phala aśana āptiḥ ca

original: 94.24ab/ aiśānyāṃ samprāptir ghṛta^pūrṇānāṃ bhaved anaḍuhaś ca/
analyzed: aiśānyām samprāptiḥ ghṛta pūrṇānām bhavet anaḍuhaḥ ca

original: 94.25ab/ gamane karṇasamaś cet kṣemāya na kārya^siddhaye bhavati//
analyzed: gamane karṇa samaḥ ced kṣemāya na kārya siddhaye bhavati

original: 94.25cd/ abhimukham upaiti yātur viruvan vinivartayed yātrām//

original: 94.27ab/ yadi vāma eva viruvan[K.viruyāt] muhurmuhur yāyino +anuloma^gatiḥ/

original: 94.27cd/ arthasya bhavati siddhyai prācyānāṃ dakṣiṇaś ca^evam//

original: 94.30ab/ prativāśya pṛṣṭḥato dakṣiṇena yāyād drutaṃ kṣataja^kārī[K.kṣatajakartā]/
analyzed: prativāśya dakṣiṇena yāyāt drutam

original: 94.30cd/ ekacaraṇo +arkam īkṣan viruvaṃś ca puro rudhira^hetuḥ//
analyzed: eka caraṇaḥ arkam īkṣan viruvan ca puras rudhira hetuḥ

original: 94.31ab/ dṛṣṭvā^arkam ekapādas tuṇḍena likhed yadā svapicchāni/
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā arkam eka pādaḥ tuṇḍena likhet yadā sva picchāni

original: 94.31cd/ purato janasya mahato vadham abhidhatte tadā balibhuk//
analyzed: puratas janasya mahataḥ vadham abhidhatte tadā balibhuj
sasya aupete kṣetre viruvati śānte sa sasya bhū labdhiḥ
ākula ceṣṭaḥ viruvan sīmānte kleśa kṛt yātuḥ
su snigdha patra pallava kusuma phala ānamra surabhi madhureṣu
sa kṣīra avraṇa saṃsthita manojña vṛkṣeṣu ca artha siddhi karaḥ k ca artha karaḥ
niṣpanna sasya śādvala kśāḍvala
ks tr śādvala bhavana prāsāda harmya hariteṣu
dhanyak dhānya aucchraya maṅgalyeṣu ca eva viruvan dhana āgama daḥ
go puccha sthe valmīka ge atha vā darśanam bhujaṅgasya

original: 94.35cd/ sadyo jvaro mahiṣage viruvati gulme phalaṃ svalpam//
analyzed: sadyas jvaraḥ mahiṣa ge viruvati gulme phalam su alpam
kāryasya vyāghātaḥ tṛṇa kūṭe vāma ge ambu saṃsthā ikasthi saṃsthe vā
ūrdhva agni pluṣṭe aśani hate ca kāke vadhaḥ bhavati

original: 94.37ab/ kaṇṭaki^miśre saumye siddhiḥ kāryasya bhavati kalahaś ca/
analyzed: kaṇṭaki miśre saumye siddhiḥ kāryasya bhavati kalahaḥ ca
kaṇṭakini bhavati kalahaḥ vallī pariveṣṭite bandhaḥ
chinna agre aṅga chedaḥ kalahaḥ śuṣka druma sthite dhvāṃkṣe

original: 94.38cd/ purataś ca pṛṣṭhato vā gomaya^saṃsthe dhana^prāptiḥ//
analyzed: puratas ca pṛṣṭhatas vā gomaya saṃsthe dhana prāptiḥ
mṛta puruṣa aṅga avayava sthitaḥ karoti mṛtyu bhayam

original: 94.39cd/ bhañjann asthi ca cañcvā yadi viruvaty[K.vāśaty] asthi^bhaṅgāya//
analyzed: bhañjan asthi ca cañcvā yadi viruvati kva aśati asthi bhaṅgāya
rajju asthi kāṣṭha kaṇṭaki niḥsāra śiroruha ānane ruvati

original: 94.41cd/ *pakṣau dhunvann[K.dhunvan pakṣāv] ūrdhva^ānane ca vighnaṃ muhuḥ kvaṇati//
analyzed: pakṣau dhunvan kdhunvan pakṣau ūrdhva ānane ca vighnam muhur kvaṇati

original: 94.42ab/ yadi śṛṅkhalāṃ varatrāṃ vallīṃ vā^ādāya vāśate bandhaḥ/
analyzed: yadi śṛṅkhalām varatrām vallīm vā ādāya vāśate bandhaḥ
pāṣāṇa sthe ca bhayam kliṣṭa apūrva adhvika yutiḥ ca
anyonya bhakṣa saṃkrāmita ānane tuṣṭiḥ uttamā bhavati
vijñeyaḥ strī lābhaḥ dampatyoḥ viruvatoḥ kva aśatoḥ yugapad
ghaṭa kuṭṭane suta vipad ghaṭa aupahadane anna samprāptiḥ

original: 94.46cd/ aviruddhais taiḥ prītir dviṣatāṃ yuddhaṃ viruddhaiś ca//
analyzed: a viruddhaiḥ taiḥ prītiḥ dviṣatām yuddham viruddhaiḥ ca

original: 94.47cd/ kṣemaṃ khara^uṣṭra^saṃsthe ke cit prāhur vadhaṃ tu khare//
